well_activity_remarks_html:
WELL_NAME API12 WAR_START_DT TEXT_REMARK
0 001 608124004900 2011-10-09 10/09/2011: Pick up 36" jet-in inner string; engage 38" LPH modified running tool; and lower wellhead to moonpool area. Install bullseyes and 8" x 4" circulation valves. Lower to mud line and attempt to jet-in same. Made 95' of penetration; but unable to continue due to rig heave. Pull up 65' leaving 30' below mud line and wait on sea state to subside to manageable conditions. 10/10/2011: Monitor high seas. Move to alternate spud location approximately 50' away; and jet-in 36" casing to 5;926'. 10/11/2011: Drill 30" x 32" hole section from 5;926' to 6;471' on Fwd and pick up 28" casing on Aft. 10/12/2011: Run and land 28" casing in 38" LPH on Aft. Perform cement job; pick up 26" drilling assembly on Fwd. 10/13/2011: Finish 28" cement job; check floats. Release LPH running tool and trip out of hole. Wait on cement (WOC). 10/14/2011: Finish WOC. Drill out shoe track and clean out rathole. Drill ahead with 26" BHA from 6;471' to 7;985'. Swap to 10.5 ppg FWPAD mud at 7;500' from seawater. 10/15/2011: Drill ahead with 26" BHA from 7;985' to 8;076' with 10.5 ppg FWPAD. Observe flow at the wellhead. Pump 100 bbl 12.5 ppg FWPAD followed by 11.0 ppg FWPAD. Flow check with no flow. Drill ahead with 26" BHA from 8;076' to 9;520' with 11.0 ppg FWPAD.
1 001 608124004900 2011-10-16 10/16/2011: Drill to TD at 9;550'. Sweep hole with a 200 bbls of lignite pill and 200 bbls of 12.5 ppg FWPAD. Spot 16.0 ppg pad mud. POOH reaming through several tight spots with 48k max O/P. Clean gumbo from stabilizers with ROV and perform wiper to 9;550'. Sweep hole with 200 bbls 12.5 ppg FWPAD and circulate hole clean. Spot 16.0 ppg pad mud. POOH from 9;550' to 7;048'. 10/17/2011: POOH with 26" drilling assembly. Wash wellhead with PBL sub. TIH and land 22" casing. Cement 22" casing with 1;346 bbls of 14.1 ppg foamed Lead; 106 bbls of 14.6 ppg foamed Tail and 140 bbls of 16.4 ppg cement. Displace cement with seawater. Check floats; floats not holding. Hold pressure while waiting on cement. 10/18/2011: Wait on cement. Preload and release from WH. Displace seawater with 11.0 ppg mud. POOH; R/U to run riser; WOW. 10/19/2011: Wait on Weather (WOW) prior to running riser and BOP. 10/20/2011: Troubleshooting DP System. Skid BOP to well center; M/U and run double of riser. Pressure Test K/C and Boost Lines. Running BOP and riser. 10/21/2011: Running BOP and riser while making repairs to DP System. 10/22/2011: Run; land and latch BOP. Perform slump test. Perform ROV BSR test. Unlock slip joint; L/O landing joint; P/U diverter. R/D running tools.
2 001 608124004900 2011-10-23 10/23/2011: R/D riser equipment. Press test 22" csg/BSR to 250/3;700 psi for 30 minutes. Perform Deadman Test with CPU recovery time 2 min 39 sec. TIH with Drill/BOP test assembly. 10/24/2011: Continue to TIH with Drill/BOP test assy. Pressure test BOP to 250/10;500 psi for 5 minutes for all the rams and 250/7;000 psi for 5 minutes for annular. POOH to test plug and lay down same. TIH with drilling assembly. 10/25/2011: Cont'd TIH with drilling assembly to 9;355'. Displaced hole with 10.5 ppg SBM. Drilling cement and shoe track. Make 10' new hole. Circulate. Perform FIT to 11.7 ppg. Drilling ahead. 10/26/2011: Open NOV reamer; pull arms to 10k against shoe to verify open and drill 18-1/8" x 21" hole section. 10/27/2011: Drill to 11;284' and observed well flowing. Shut in well at 11;284'. Circulate influx out of hole; displace well with 11.3 ppg KWM. 10/28/2011: Open lower VBR and monitor well; well static. Monitor hole conditions and maintain mud weight at 11.3 ppg; circulate for hole cleaning and pumps sweeps. Resume drilling operations. 10/29/2011: Continue to drill 18-1/8" x 21" hole section. Circ at 1;200 gpm. Working pipe to simulate short trip; CBU. Well static. Weighted up to 11.5 ppg due to hole drag. Pull to 9;473'. Perform open hole LOT (12.0 ppg); circulate; TIH to 11;490'. Wash and ream to 11;616'. Drill ahead to 11;634'. Flow check at 11;634' (well static).
3 001 608124004900 2011-10-30 10/30/2011: Hole packed off and pipe stuck; worked free and resumed drilling. Raised mud weight to 11.7 ppg. Began noticing losses and mitigated with pumping LCM pill; short trip to 9;466' while monitoring the well; well static. 10/31/2011: Function tested BOP on Yellow Pod from Driller's panel and on the Blue pPod from the Toolpusher's panel. Flow checked well at 6;172'. Well static. POOH to surface. Function tested BSR/CSR from Driller's panel Yellow Pod and Toolpusher's panel Blue Pod. 11/01/2011: Rigged down drill pipe handling tools and rigged up casing handling tools. Ran 17-7/8" and 18" casing. 11/02/2011: Ran 4-1/2" inner string. Made up 18" hanger and running tool. Tripped in hole with 17-7/8" x 18" casing on landing string. Lost 30-40 bbls per stand and well was static when not running in the hole. 11/03/2011: Continued tripping in hole with 17-7/8" x 18" casing on landing string. Losses decreased from 40 bbls per stand to 15 bbls per stand. Washed down last 2 stands and landed hanger. Pumped 120 bbls of spacer and 145 bbls of 16.0 ppg cement slurry. Waited on cement for 6 hours. Opened well with casing set at 11;529' and the well was static. Set casing hanger seal assembly and tested to 2500 psig. Began to pull out of the hole with inner string. 11/04/2011: Continue to POOH with inner string. Pressure tested 17-7/8" x 18" casing to 2;500 psi for 30 minutes from the Toolpusher's panel Blue Pod. Pressure drop of 95 psi over the 30 minute test. Pumped 18-1/2 bbls and bled back 18-1/2 bbls. Pressure tested BSRs to 250 psi low and 2500 psi high for 5 minutes. Pumped 16 bbls and bled back 16 bbls. Function tested BSR/CSR from Toolpusher's panel on Yellow Pod and the Driller's panel on Blue Pod. Began to trip in hole with 16-1/2" x 19" BHA. 11/05/2011: Continue to trip in hole with 16-1/2" x 19" BHA. Perform accumulator draw down from Driller's panel with Blue Pod. Pressure tested BOPs (Rams & Annular) and all associated valves and surface equipment to 250 psi low and 6;100 psi high for 5 minutes each from Toolpusher's panel on Yellow Pod. Function tested BOPs from Toolpusher's panel Yellow Pod and Driller's panel Blue Pod. Performed a diverter function test from Toolpusher's panel. Tripped in hole and tagged top of cement. Displaced well to 12.0 ppg mud. Began to drill out shoe track.
4 001 608124004900 2011-11-06 11/06/2011: Drill out hard cement and shoe from 11;493' to 11;529' with 16-1/2" x 19" BHA. No cement found below casing shoe. Perform FIT to 12.5 ppg EMW. Perform LOT to 12.8 ppg EMW. Wash and ream open hole to 11;730'. Observe tight spot at 11;615'. Increase MW to 12.1 ppg. Begin losing mud when ECD exceeds 12.4 PPG. Drill from 11;730' to 11;758'; controlling ECD. Tight hole during simulated connection and high volume of cuttings returning at shakers indicate hole instability. 11/07/2011: Circulate bottoms up and pull out of hole to pick up cement stinger to squeeze. RIH with stinger; circulate string volume at 11;500'. 11/08/2011: Perform injectivity test. Spot balanced plug of 150 bbls of 16.0 ppg cement at 17-7/8" shoe. Approximately 62 bbls lost during displacement. Perform hesitation squeeze; with 76.5 bbls of cement pumped into the 17-7/8" shoe. Wait on cement. 11/09/2011: Wait on cement. Circulate bottoms up. Pull out of hole with cement stinger. 11/10/2011: Trip in hole with 16-1/2" drilling assembly. Inadvertently sheared the lockdown pins on wear sleeve while attempting to set it in the HPWH. Pull out of hole with 16-1/2" assembly to re-dress wear sleeve. Function test BSR/CSR. Trip back in hole to set wear sleeve in HPWH and continue to trip in hole. 11/11/2011: Function test BOPs on 6-5/8" drill pipe; function test diverter. Trip in hole with 16-1/2" drilling assembly. Drill hard cement from 11;332' to 11;482'. Wash and ream down to 11;559'; 30 ft below 17-7/8" shoe. Circulate bottoms up. Perform LOT 12.32 ppg EMW. Wash and ream to 11;630'. Circulate bottoms up. 11/12/2011: Circulate while waiting on EQ Squeeze pill to be built. Wash and ream the interval 11;250' to 11;617'. Spot 150 bbl EZ Squeeze pill into open hole at the suspected loss zone. Bullhead 61 bbls EZ Squeeze into the formation and begin hesitation squeeze.
5 001 608124004900 2011-11-13 11/13/2011: Finish hesitation squeeze of EZ Squeeze pill into suspected loss zone at approximately 11;628'; below the 17-7/8" casing shoe. Total volume pumped during hesitation squeeze 39.5 bbls. Hold pressure on EZ Squeeze for 4 hours; then bleed back pressure and monitor well. Circulate bottoms up; then clean the hole from 10;905' to 11;670'. 11/14/2011: Clean the hole from 11;670' to 11;730'. Circulate bottoms up. Pull bit into casing shoe and perform LOT to 12.4 ppg EMW. Circulate bottoms up; then clean the hole from 11;524' to 11;758'. 11/15/2011: Circulate bottoms up. Perform diverter function test; BOP function test; and accumulator drill. Perform BOP pressure test on annular and rams to 250 psi low and 6;000 psi high using 12.1 ppg SBM for 5 minutes each. 11/16/2011: Complete BOP pressure test on annular and rams to 250 psi low and 6;000 psi high using 12.1 ppg SBM for 5 minutes each. Trip out of hole and rack back BHA. Function test BSR/CSR. Trip in hole with diverter sub; install wear sleeve in HPWH; and continue to trip in hole to pump cement below 17-7/8" casing shoe. 11/17/2011: TIH with cement stinger. Washed down from 11;529' to 11;730'. Circulate bottoms up. Spot 260 bbl balanced cement plug @ 11;730'. Squeeze 40 bbls into the formation. Hold squeeze pressure and monitor while waiting on cement. 11/18/2011: Continue to hold and monitor squeeze pressure while waiting on cement to cure for 24 hrs. Attempted to test cement - pumped into formation. Pump 16.0 ppg riser cap to balance hydrostatic pressure on well. Open annular and monitor well. POOH with diverter sub. 11/19/2011: POOH with diverter sub. TIH with 16.5" x 19" BHA; install wear sleeve in HPWH and continue to TIH. Wash to 11;449' and circulate water cement spacer out of hole. Function test casing and blind shear rams.
6 001 608124004900 2011-11-20 11/20/2011: Perform FIT at 17-7/8" casing shoe with 12.1 ppg mud to 325 psi. Perform second FIT with 12.1 ppg mud to 421 psi; equivalent to 12.8 ppg. Drill out cement in open hole from 11;600' to 11;670'. 11/21/2011: Continued to drill cement in open hole from 11;670' to 11;730' with 16-1/2" bit and 12.1 ppg MW. Pumped 16.0 ppg mud into riser to simulate higher ECD's. Increased mud weight in well and riser from 12.1 to 12.3 ppg. Drilled from 11;758' to 11;873' - opened reamer at 11;850'. 11/22/2011: Completed BOP diverter function test. Drilled 16-1/2" x 19" OH from 11;873' to 11;982' (see details in significant well events) 11/23/2011: Drilled from 11;982' to 12;115'. Weighed up from 12.3 to 12.4 and then 12.5 ppg. Well flowing at 2 bbls/hr - shut-in well (see details in significant well events). Noticed increase in water phase and chlorides (water influx). Took decision to stop drilling operations and P&A Coronado #1 well. Run in hole with 23 joints of 22" casing from surface to 1;293'. 12/25/2013: Drill ahead with 26" drilling BHA to 10;284'. Increase MW to 12.0 ppg. ROV at seafloor monitoring for shallow flow during operations. Pump 13.0 ppg Hi-Vis sweeps to clean hole. Secondary Rotary: Run in hole with 22" casing to 4;806'; installing centralizers as per tally. Pick up and make up Dril-Quip 18-3/4" HPWH. 12/26/2013: Drill ahead with 26" drilling BHA to section TD of 10;700' with 12.0 ppg mud. ROV at seafloor monitoring for shallow flow. Circulate 100 bbl 13.0 ppg Hi-Vis sweep. Pump caliper pill and displace well to 13.0 ppg mud. Backream to 7;800' while pumping 13.0 ppg mud. Large amounts of gumbo observed at wellhead. Secondary Rotary: Trip in hole with 22" casing and Inner String on 6-5/8" landing string to 5;658'. 12/27/2013: Backream with 26" drilling BHA to above 28" casing shoe at 7;328'. Pull out of hole to above LPWH at 5;848'. ROV clean gumbo off of bit; BHA and stabilizers. Slight flowback observed at wellhead while cleaning BHA. Monitor wellhead: no increase in flowback. Trip in hole with 26" drilling BHA to 7;955'. Wash through tight spots with 13.0 ppg mud. Wash and ream to 9;868' with 13.0 ppg mud. Apparent flow confirmed to be result of hole collapse rather then formation influx. Suspend reaming to maintain quantity of 16.0 ppg S2PAD mud onboard. Flow check: static. Backream to 8;082' with 13.0 ppg mud and trip out to LPWH. Wait on 16.0 ppg S2PAD mud. Secondary Rotary: Standby with 22" casing at 5;658'. 12/28/2013: Inspect 22" casing and running tool with ROV. Take on 10;000 bbls of 16.0 ppg S2PAD mud. Stab 26" drilling BHA and trip in hole to 9;906'. Wash and ream to 10;452' with 13.5 ppg mud. Decision made to trip out of hole due to low mud stocks and difficulty to ream to bottom. Flow check: static. Pump out of hole to 9;868'; backreaming on tight spots. Trip out to 7;328'; filling stands and monitoring wellhead with ROV. Secondary Rotary: Standby with 22" casing at 5;658'.
60 003 608124008900 2013-12-29 12/29/2013: Pulled 26" drilling BHA from 7;328' MD to above the LPWH and positioned the rig 50' from the well. ROV cleaned "gumbo" from the bit and stabilizers. Pulled 26" assembly to surface; inspected; and cleaned. Cut and slip drill line; serviced MDDM; traveling block; and dolly rollers. Began installation of in-line tensioners through the rotary and into moonpool. 12/30/2013: Finished the tensioner installations. Laid down tensioner handling tools and rigged up drill pipe handling tools. Re-initialized MWD tools and tripped in the hole with 26" assembly to 10;382' MD. Pulled out of hole from 10;382' MD to 7;315' MD. Waited for additional PAD mud to arrive to rig. Tripped in hole from 7;315' MD to 9;359' MD. 12/31/2013: Tripped in hole from 9;359' MD to 10;375' MD. Reamed through tight spots with 13.5 ppg PAD mud from 10;375' MD to 10;505' MD. Pulled out of hole from 10;375' MD to 5;663' MD with no restrictions. Moved rig 50' off location. ROV cleaned excess gumbo from stabilizers and bit. Repositioned rig over well center and tripped in hole from 5;663' MD to 10;252' MD. Washed and reamed from 10;252' MD to 10;700' MD. Made a short trip washing out to 10;380' MD. Washed and reamed down to 10;700' MD. 01/01/2014: Pumped 150 bbl 13.5 ppg Hi-Vis spacer and 13.5 ppg 300 bbl lignite hole-caliper pills and circulated to the seafloor. Displaced hole to 14 ppg PAD mud and spotted 16 ppg PAD mud in the rat hole. Pulled out of the hole and washed the LPWH. Pulled 26" BHA above the LPWH; positioned Aft Rotary over well; and ran 22" casing on landing string from 5;658' MD to 5;960' MD. Displaced casing to 14 ppg PAD mud. Continued to trip in hole with 22" casing from 5;960' MD to 9;708' MD. 01/02/2014: Continued to trip in the hole with 22" casing on landing string to 10;341' MD. Washed casing down from 10;341' MD to 10;535' MD. Made up the cement head and landed HPWH in LPWHH with the 22" shoe at 10;651' MD. Rigged up surface lines to the cement head. Circulated and conditioned the hole with 14 ppg PAD mud. Pumped 1;353 bbls of 14.5 ppg nitrogen foamed lead cement slurry and 225 bbls of 16.7 ppg un-foamed tail cement slurry; confirming cement returns to the seafloor. Displaced tail slurry with seawater; bled off pressure; verified the floats held. Locked down HPWH to LPWH. Racked back the cement head; inserted an 8" nerf ball; and displaced 22" casing with 14 ppg PAD mud. Pulled out of the hole on landing string and washed the HPWH with seawater. Note: Thomas Ahlf (Chevron) gave 72 hour notification to Bobby Nelson and Josh Ladner (BSEE Houma District) for latching up and subsequent BOP testing. 01/03/2014: Secondary rotary pulled out of the hole with the MRLD and inner string to surface. Primary began riser rig up operations. Waited on weather due to rig motion and resumed when weather allowed. Picked up 2 joints of slick riser and made up to BOP in the moonpool. Splashed BOP and commenced pressure testing of Choke; Kill; and Boost lines. 01/04/2014: Ran BOP on riser from 192' to 1;017'. Encountered issues with the spider lock mechanism and replaced the assembly. Continued running BOP on riser from 1;017' to 2;217'. Tested Choke; Kill; Boost and Conduit at planned intervals. Encountered another issue with the spider lock mechanism and made repairs. Continued running riser from 2;217' to 3;417'.
61 003 608124008900 2014-01-05 01/05/2014: Run BOP on marine riser from 3;417' to 5;592'; pressure testing as per procedures. After 74 joints ran; pick up 10' pup. Ground fault observed on POD; decision to pull riser/BOP for troubleshooting. Pull riser from 5;592' to 4;017'. 01/06/2014: Pull BOP on riser from 4;017 ' to 792'. Wait on weather due to excessive rig motion. Continue BOP on riser from 792' to 267'. Wait on weather to continue operations. Note: Thomas Ahlf (Chevron) sent notice to Bobby Nelson and Josh Ladner (BSEE - Houma District) as follows: "Please be aware that due to an intermittent 15v ground fault; the DID is pulling the BOP back to surface for troubleshooting and repair. Due to time constraints (approaching 30 days since last official stump test); the DID will be conducting a stump test of the BOP prior to re-running the BOP. Please consider this note a 72 hour notice of that stump test." 01/07/2014: Monitoring weather conditions; vessel movement and sea state to pull BOP into moonpool. Pulling slick riser from 267' to 192'. Pull BOP into moonpool on double of slick riser. Land BOP on Beams. Disconnect double of slick riser and pull clear. Skid BOP to setback area. Troubleshoot 15V ground fault on BOP. 01/08/2014: Continue troubleshoot BOP ground fault on yellow pod. Begin stump test on BOP to 250 psi/ 14;700 psi on rams. 01/09/2014: Continue attempting to stump test BOP to 250 psi/ 14;700 psi on rams and 250 psi/ 7;000 psi on annular. Troubleshoot BOP due to pressure anomalies on variable bore rams during stump test. 01/10/2014: Continue to toubleshoot BOP pressure anomolies. Change out ram packers and inspect wear plates. 01/11/2014: Complete change out of ram packers and inspection. Resume stump test of BOP to 250 psi/ 14;700 psi on rams and 250 psi/ 7;000 psi on annular.
62 003 608124008900 2014-01-12 01/12/2014: Continue to stump test BOPs; Rams to 250 psi low/ 14;700 psi high; Annular to 250 psi low/ 7;000 psi high. Replace Lower Variable Bore Ram upper seal plate and Subsea Test Valve soft goods. Electronic Technicians troubleshoot ground fault on Blue Pod. 01/13/2014: Electronic Technicians troubleshoot ground fault on Blue Pod. Complete stump testing BOPs/Rams; tested to 250 psi low/ 14;700 psi high. BOP function test from Toolpusher's panel/Blue Pod. Prepare BOP for soak test. 01/14/2014: Perform BOP control system soak test as per Transocean procedure on Yellow Pod and Blue Pod. Inadvertently closed the BSRs on a test joint. Remove sheared test joint. Open Blind Shear Ram bonnets and perform required inspection of Blind Shear Rams. Installed Ram Blocks in the BOPs. Closed bonnet doors and torqued as required. Note: On 01/14/2014; Thomas Ahlf (Chevron) informed Bobby Nelson (BSEE - Houma District) of required 72 hour notification of BOP test after latch up. Return reply received from Josh Ladner (BSEE- Houma District). Note: On 01/14/2014; Frank Hillman (Chevron) informed Bobby Nelson of a delay in splashing BOP and an expected latch up date of 01/18/2014. 01/15/2014: Install test stump and fill BOPs with drill-water in preparation for BSR stump test. Perform BSR stump test at 250 psi low/ 14;700 psi high. Splash BOP and pressure test Choke and Kill lines at 250 psi low/ 10;000 psi high. Test Boost/Rigid Conduit lines to 4;700 psi high. Pull BOP back to surface due to pod mismatch alarm on Yellow Pod. Land BOP on beams and find fault; rectify pod mismatch alarm problem. Electronic Technicians troubleshoot ground fault on Blue and Yellow Pods. Note: On 01/15/2014; Frank Hillman informed Josh Ladner of expected pressure test on 01/19/2014. 01/16/2014: Electronic Technicians troubleshoot and repair ground fault on Blue Pod. Perform dry fire on Blue and Yellow Pods. Re-apply hydraulics to BOP stack and perform 20 min soak test on Blue and Yellow Pods. 01/17/2014: Lower BOP into splash zone to 192'. Land out double in gimbal. Test Choke and Kill lines with Halco to 250/ 10;000 psi. Test Boost/Rigid Conduit to 4;700 psi. Run BOPs on riser from 192' to 1;167'. Improper pressure reading from subsea manifold regulator readback on Blue pod - faulty pressure transducer. Trip out of hole with BOP from 1;167' to surface; setting same on beams. Move BOP to setback area. Troubleshoot pressure transducer problem on Blue Pod. Note: On 01/17/2014; Frank Hillman informed Bobby Nelson of the BOP issues and a possible latch up and pressure testing date of 01/21/2014. 01/18/2014: Troubleshoot and evaluate transducer problem.

Change out swivel packing on Forward MDDM. 01/24/2014: Displace wellbore from 14.0 ppg PAD mud and riser from seawater to 10.7 ppg SBM. Take slow circulating rates; choke line friction; and perform diverter drill followed by choke drill. Drill shoe track. Cleanout rathole and drill 10' new formation. Circulate high viscosity and heavy weight pill around to above BOP. Attempt FIT/ LOT unsuccessfully. Discuss options and monitor well. 97 bbls of 10.7 ppg SBM lost to hole during drilling shoe track; circulation; and FIT/ LOT tests. While monitoring well; record increase to trip tank. Shut in annular. No pressure build. Opened well to balloon back. Shut in as necessary and record pressures to ensure no influx. No pressure build. 01/25/2014: Continue monitoring well at 10;631'. Gains during monitoring = 58.8 bbls (ballooned back). Shut in well. No pressure build. Open well; wash to bottom; and circulate bottoms up. Pull bit into shoe and circulate bottoms up halfway up hole and flow check. Gains at 0.2 barrels per minute. Resume circulation and again flow check with bottoms up 1;000' below BOP. Gains at 0.2 barrels per minute. Close annular and circulate up choke and kill lines while evaluating returns and presence of any contamination. Bottoms up sample showed no sign of influx. Lost additional 36 bbls during this circulation. Net loss to hole 74.2 bbls. Monitor closed well on mini trip tank while boosting riser volume. No gains to mini trip tank. Open well and monitor well on main trip tank. Gain/ ballooning rate decreased from initial 4.4 barrels per hour to final 2.5 barrels per hour. Note: On 01/25/2014; Lindsay Hubbard (Chevron) informed Bobby Nelson that the 22" shoe was drilled and although competent cement was observed in the shoe track; a satisfactory LOT was not achieved. Losses were experienced while drilling 10 feet of new formation for the LOT and circulating with subsequent ballooning back. Currently working to get the well stabilized and will move forward with plans for a remedial cement squeeze at the shoe.

Circulate bottoms up with 10.7 ppg SBM at loss free rate stopping to flow check with bottoms up halfway up casing; 1;000' below wellhead; halfway up riser; and bottoms up. Pull out of hole from 10;638' to 9;934' wet. Pump slug and pull out of hole with 18-1/8" x 21" assembly with proper displacement. Well static during riser displacement. Perform remedial cement operations spotting 172 bbl 16.4 ppg cement plug from 10;705 to 10;300'. Close annular and perform hesitation squeeze with 10.7 ppg SBM. Squeezed 70 bbl total with final applied pressure 544 psi. Wait on cement and monitor pressure with annular closed. 01/29/2014: Continue waiting on cement while monitoring pressure. Circulate 1-1/2 drill string volume with 10.7 ppg SBM. Flow check well on trip tank (60 minutes - static). Pull out of hole with cement stinger to surface. Drill cement from 10;371' to 10;661' (10' below 22" casing shoe). Circulate cement cuttings to surface and until 10.7 ppg mud weight in and out. 01/31/2014: Attempt to pressure test to target 554 psi (10' of cement drilled below 22" casing shoe) with 10.7 ppg SBM for 11.7 ppg equivalent surface mud weight. Drop nerf ball and circulate 1.5 drill string volume with 10.7 ppg SBM. Pull out of hole with cement stinger from 9;645' to 6;012'.

Function test BOPs from Driller's panel; Blue pod. Trip in hole and tag top of cement in 13-3/4" x 14" tieback shoe track at 16;265'. Drill out cement and cement retainer from 16;265' to 16;378'. 04/29/2014: Continue drilling out 13-3/4" x 14" tieback shoe track from 16;378' to 16;607'. Trip in hole and tag upper float collar in 14" liner shoe track at 24;310'. Circulate and condition hole and pressure test casing to 5;300 psi with 14.4 ppg SBM. Continue to drill out 14" liner shoe track while raising mud weight to 15.0 ppg. 04/30/2014: Drill out 14" liner shoe track and cement beneath shoe to 24;502'. Wash and ream rat hole and drill 10 feet of new formation from 24;650' to 24;660'. Circulate bottoms up to 1;000' above BOP; trip out of hole into 14" casing shoe and perform FIT to 1;911 psi/ 16.5 ppg EMW with 15.0 ppg MW. Note: At 10:11 hrs on 4/30/2014; Muhammad Saleh (Chevron) notified Bobby Nelson (BSEE - Houma District) that the lower touch screen on the Driller's BOP control panel froze and will not update when a function is made. Diagnostics show that it is not a node lockup. The upper screen is 100% functional and works as designed. We maintain full control of the stack from the remaining MMI on the Driller's panel as well as the two screens on the Toolpusher's panel. 05/01/2014: Drill ahead with 12-1/4" assembly from 24;660' to 25;187'. Continue to drill ahead from 25;187' to 25;269'. Flow check drilling breaks; well static on every flow check. 05/02/2014: Drill ahead with 12-1/4" assembly from 25;269' to 26;228'. Flow check drilling breaks; well static on every flow check. Note: At 16:46 hrs on 05/02/2014; Muhammad Saleh (Chevron) received email confirmation from Paul Nelson (BSEE - Houma District) that the request for a 72 hr extension for function test of BSR/CSR (due by 24;00 hrs on 05/04/2014) was approved. 05/03/2014: Drill ahead with 12-1/4" assembly from 26;228' to 27;400'. Flow check drilling breaks; well static on every flow check.
78 003 608124008900 2014-05-04 05/04/2014: Drill ahead with 12-1/4" drilling assembly from 27;400' to final well depth at 28;430' with 15.0 ppg SBM; taking surveys and flow checking every connection. 05/05/2014: Circulate hole clean at 28;312' with 15.0 ppg SBM. Flow check well - static. Trip out of hole from 28;312' to 25;638'; working through tight spots. Backream from 25;638' to 25;128'. Trip out of hole from 25;128' to 24;355'. Function BOPs from Toolpusher's panel; Yellow Pod. Flow check well - static. Trip out of hole to 11;937'; monitoring well on trip tank. 05/06/2014: Trip out of hole with 12-1/4" drilling assembly from 11;937' to surface with 15.0 ppg SBM. Function test BSR and CSR from Driller's panel; Blue Pod. Run USIT wireline tool to 24;488'. USIT tool not functioning. Pull out of hole to 9;000'. Note: At 06:41 hrs on 05/06/2014; Muhammad Saleh (Chevron) informed Bobby Nelson (BSEE - Houma) that the lower touch screen on the Driller's panel is functional as of 05/06/2014. It has been rebooted in conjunction with the BSR/CSR function this morning and everything is back to normal. 05/07/2014: Pull out of hole with wireline from 9;000' to surface. Run in hole with USIT wireline tools to 24;470' and up-log to 21;689'. USIT tool not working. Pull out of hole with wireline from 21;689' to surface. Trip in hole with 14" scraper assembly to 9;614' in 15.0 ppg SBM; monitoring displacement on trip tank. 05/08/2014: Trip in hole with 14" scraper assembly from 9;614' to 24;352' with 15.0 ppg SBM; monitoring displacement on trip tank. Wash down to 24;474' and reciprocate scraper across EZSV setting depth. Trip out of hole with 14" scraper to 16;376' and reciprocate scraper across upper EZSV setting depth. Flow check well - static. Trip out of hole from 16;376' to 6;447'; monitoring displacement on trip tank. 05/09/2014: Trip out of hole with 14" scraper assembly from 6;447' to surface. Function check BSR and CSR from Toolpusher's panel; Yellow Pod. Trip in hole with EZSV from surface to 24;417'. Set lower EZSV. Test EZSV and release running tool. 05/10/2014: Pressure test EZSV to 1;000 psi. Squeeze 500' cement plug below EZSV. Spot 300' cement plug above EZSV. Trip out of hole to 16;900' and spot 500' balanced plug across 14" liner top; exposed 16.15" casing; and 13-3/4" tieback liner shoe. Trip out of hole to 15;000'. Flow check well- static. Trip out of hole to 9;013' with 15.0 ppg SBM; monitoring displacement on trip tank.
79 003 608124008900 2014-05-11 05/11/2014: Trip out of hole with 13-3/8" EZSV running tool from 9;013' to surface. Function BSR/CSR from Driller's panel; Blue Pod; and diverter from Driller's panel. Trip in hole with 13-3/8" EZSV to 15;283'. Encounter resistance and attempt to clear without success; setting EZSV pre-maturely. Shear running tool off of EZSV and commence circulating bottoms up with 15.0 ppg synthetic based mud. 05/12/2014: Circulate bottoms up with 15.0 ppg synthetic based mud; flow check static; and trip out of hole from 15;283' to surface with EZSV running tool. Function test BOPs on Driller's panel; Blue Pod; and function test BSR/CSR from Toolpusher's panel; Yellow Pod. Trip in hole with back-up 13-3/8" EZSV to 15;150' and set same. Positive test to 1;000 psi. Pump 75 bbls cement to spot plug above EZSV from 15;150' to 14;650'. Note: At 09:45 hrs; Bobby Nelson (BSEE) informed Lindsay Hubbard (Chevron) via email that permission to extend BOP testing 72 hours was granted due to current level of wellbore isolation. 05/13/2014: Displace to spot 75 bbl cement plug between 15;150' and 14;650'. Trip out of hole from 15;148' to 13;473' with EZSV running tool. Circulate full surface to surface volume of 15.0 ppg synthetic based mud. Conduct negative test to 2;178 psi. Monitor well for 60 minutes - well static. Trip out of hole from 13;473' to 6;474'; monitoring well on trip tank. Monitor well - static. Pick up seat protector retrieval tool and trip in hole to wellhead. Retrieve seat protector and pull out of hole to surface; with tailpipe at 6;474'. 05/14/2014: Trip in hole with lockdown sleeve retrieval tool. Monitor well on trip tank - static. Retrieve lockdown sleeve from wellhead and recover lockdown sleeve to surface (tailpipe at 6;480'). Spot high viscosity pill from 6;400' to 6;100'. Displace riser and well from 15.0 ppg synthetic based mud to 8.6 ppg seawater down to 6;100'. Trip out of hole with EZSV running tool to 1;776'. 05/15/2014: Trip out of hole from 1;776' to surface and laydown EZSV running tool. Trip in hole with cement stinger and riser brush cleaning assembly to 6;100'. Pump 23 bbls of 16.4 ppg cement to set surface plug from 6;100' to 5;950'. Pull out of hole to 5;840' and circulate seawater. Monitor well on trip tank: static. Trip out of hole with riser brush assembly from 5;840' to surface. Rig up riser handling tools. Note: At 12:53 hrs; Bobby Nelson informed Lindsay Hubbard via email that permission to extend BOP testing a further 12 hours was granted. 05/16/2014: Pull diverter. Unlatch BOP and pull riser from 5;608' to 4;108'. 05/17/2014: Pull riser from 4;108' to surface. Park BOP and commence between well maintenance workscope.

well_activity_remarks_dict.TEXT_REMARK:
10/09/2011: Pick up 36" jet-in inner string; engage 38" LPH modified running tool; and lower wellhead to moonpool area. Install bullseyes and 8" x 4" circulation valves. Lower to mud line and attempt to jet-in same. Made 95' of penetration; but unable to continue due to rig heave. Pull up 65' leaving 30' below mud line and wait on sea state to subside to manageable conditions.

10/10/2011: Monitor high seas. Move to alternate spud location approximately 50' away; and jet-in 36" casing to 5;926'.

10/11/2011: Drill 30" x 32" hole section from 5;926' to 6;471' on Fwd and pick up 28" casing on Aft.

10/12/2011: Run and land 28" casing in 38" LPH on Aft. Perform cement job; pick up 26" drilling assembly on Fwd.

10/13/2011: Finish 28" cement job; check floats. Release LPH running tool and trip out of hole. Wait on cement (WOC).

10/14/2011: Finish WOC. Drill out shoe track and clean out rathole. Drill ahead with 26" BHA from 6;471' to 7;985'. Swap to 10.5 ppg FWPAD mud at 7;500' from seawater.

10/15/2011: Drill ahead with 26" BHA from 7;985' to 8;076' with 10.5 ppg FWPAD. Observe flow at the wellhead. Pump 100 bbl 12.5 ppg FWPAD followed by 11.0 ppg FWPAD. Flow check with no flow. Drill ahead with 26" BHA from 8;076' to 9;520' with 11.0 ppg FWPAD.

10/16/2011: Drill to TD at 9;550'. Sweep hole with a 200 bbls of lignite pill and 200 bbls of 12.5 ppg FWPAD. Spot 16.0 ppg pad mud. POOH reaming through several tight spots with 48k max O/P. Clean gumbo from stabilizers with ROV and perform wiper to 9;550'. Sweep hole with 200 bbls 12.5 ppg FWPAD and circulate hole clean. Spot 16.0 ppg pad mud. POOH from 9;550' to 7;048'.

10/17/2011: POOH with 26" drilling assembly. Wash wellhead with PBL sub. TIH and land 22" casing. Cement 22" casing with 1;346 bbls of 14.1 ppg foamed Lead; 106 bbls of 14.6 ppg foamed Tail and 140 bbls of 16.4 ppg cement. Displace cement with seawater. Check floats; floats not holding. Hold pressure while waiting on cement.

10/18/2011: Wait on cement. Preload and release from WH. Displace seawater with 11.0 ppg mud. POOH; R/U to run riser; WOW.

10/19/2011: Wait on Weather (WOW) prior to running riser and BOP.

10/20/2011: Troubleshooting DP System. Skid BOP to well center; M/U and run double of riser. Pressure Test K/C and Boost Lines. Running BOP and riser.

10/21/2011: Running BOP and riser while making repairs to DP System.

10/22/2011: Run; land and latch BOP. Perform slump test. Perform ROV BSR test. Unlock slip joint; L/O landing joint; P/U diverter. R/D running tools.

10/23/2011: R/D riser equipment. Press test 22" csg/BSR to 250/3;700 psi for 30 minutes. Perform Deadman Test with CPU recovery time 2 min 39 sec. TIH with Drill/BOP test assembly. 

10/24/2011: Continue to TIH with Drill/BOP test assy. Pressure test BOP to 250/10;500 psi for 5 minutes for all the rams and 250/7;000 psi for 5 minutes for annular. POOH to test plug and lay down same. TIH with drilling assembly. 

10/25/2011: Cont'd TIH with drilling assembly to 9;355'. Displaced hole with 10.5 ppg SBM. Drilling cement and shoe track. Make 10' new hole. Circulate. Perform FIT to 11.7 ppg. Drilling ahead.

10/26/2011: Open NOV reamer; pull arms to 10k against shoe to verify open and drill 18-1/8" x 21" hole section.

10/27/2011: Drill to 11;284' and observed well flowing. Shut in well at 11;284'. Circulate influx out of hole; displace well with 11.3 ppg KWM.

10/28/2011: Open lower VBR and monitor well; well static. Monitor hole conditions and maintain mud weight at 11.3 ppg; circulate for hole cleaning and pumps sweeps. Resume drilling operations. 

10/29/2011: Continue to drill 18-1/8" x 21" hole section. Circ at 1;200 gpm. Working pipe to simulate short trip; CBU. Well static. Weighted up to 11.5 ppg due to hole drag. Pull to 9;473'. Perform open hole LOT (12.0 ppg); circulate; TIH to 11;490'. Wash and ream to 11;616'. Drill ahead to 11;634'. Flow check at 11;634' (well static).

10/30/2011: Hole packed off and pipe stuck; worked free and resumed drilling. Raised mud weight to 11.7 ppg. Began noticing losses and mitigated with pumping LCM pill; short trip to 9;466' while monitoring the well; well static.  

10/31/2011: Function tested BOP on Yellow Pod from Driller's panel and on the Blue pPod from the Toolpusher's panel. Flow checked well at 6;172'. Well static. POOH to surface. Function tested BSR/CSR from Driller's panel Yellow Pod and Toolpusher's panel Blue Pod.   

11/01/2011: Rigged down drill pipe handling tools and rigged up casing handling tools. Ran 17-7/8" and 18" casing.  

11/02/2011: Ran 4-1/2" inner string. Made up 18" hanger and running tool. Tripped in hole with 17-7/8" x 18" casing on landing string. Lost 30-40 bbls per stand and well was static when not running in the hole.  

11/03/2011: Continued tripping in hole with 17-7/8" x 18" casing on landing string. Losses decreased from 40 bbls per stand to 15 bbls per stand. Washed down last 2 stands and landed hanger. Pumped 120 bbls of spacer and 145 bbls of 16.0 ppg cement slurry. Waited on cement for 6 hours. Opened well with casing set at 11;529' and the well was static. Set casing hanger seal assembly and tested to 2500 psig. Began to pull out of the hole with inner string.

11/04/2011: Continue to POOH with inner string. Pressure tested 17-7/8" x 18" casing to 2;500 psi for 30 minutes from the Toolpusher's panel Blue Pod. Pressure drop of 95 psi over the 30 minute test. Pumped 18-1/2 bbls and bled back 18-1/2 bbls. Pressure tested BSRs to 250 psi low and 2500 psi high for 5 minutes. Pumped 16 bbls and bled back 16 bbls. Function tested BSR/CSR from Toolpusher's panel on Yellow Pod and the Driller's panel on Blue Pod. Began to trip in hole with 16-1/2" x 19" BHA.

11/05/2011: Continue to trip in hole with 16-1/2" x 19" BHA. Perform accumulator draw down from Driller's panel with Blue Pod. Pressure tested BOPs (Rams & Annular) and all associated valves and surface equipment to 250 psi low and 6;100 psi high for 5 minutes each from Toolpusher's panel on Yellow Pod. Function tested BOPs from Toolpusher's panel Yellow Pod and Driller's panel Blue Pod. Performed a diverter function test from Toolpusher's panel. Tripped in hole and tagged top of cement. Displaced well to 12.0 ppg mud. Began to drill out shoe track.

11/06/2011: Drill out hard cement and shoe from 11;493' to 11;529' with 16-1/2" x 19" BHA. No cement found below casing shoe. Perform FIT to 12.5 ppg EMW. Perform LOT to 12.8 ppg EMW. Wash and ream open hole to 11;730'. Observe tight spot at 11;615'. Increase MW to 12.1 ppg. Begin losing mud when ECD exceeds 12.4 PPG. Drill from 11;730' to 11;758'; controlling ECD. Tight hole during simulated connection and high volume of cuttings returning at shakers indicate hole instability.

11/07/2011: Circulate bottoms up and pull out of hole to pick up cement stinger to squeeze. RIH with stinger; circulate string volume at 11;500'.

11/08/2011: Perform injectivity test. Spot balanced plug of 150 bbls of 16.0 ppg cement at 17-7/8" shoe. Approximately 62 bbls lost during displacement. Perform hesitation squeeze; with 76.5 bbls of cement pumped into the 17-7/8" shoe. Wait on cement.

11/09/2011: Wait on cement. Circulate bottoms up. Pull out of hole with cement stinger.

11/10/2011: Trip in hole with 16-1/2" drilling assembly. Inadvertently sheared the lockdown pins on wear sleeve while attempting to set it in the HPWH. Pull out of hole with 16-1/2" assembly to re-dress wear sleeve. Function test BSR/CSR. Trip back in hole to set wear sleeve in HPWH and continue to trip in hole. 

11/11/2011: Function test BOPs on 6-5/8" drill pipe; function test diverter. Trip in hole with 16-1/2" drilling assembly. Drill hard cement from 11;332' to 11;482'. Wash and ream down to 11;559'; 30 ft below 17-7/8" shoe. Circulate bottoms up. Perform LOT 12.32 ppg EMW. Wash and ream to 11;630'. Circulate bottoms up.

11/12/2011: Circulate while waiting on EQ Squeeze pill to be built. Wash and ream the interval 11;250' to 11;617'. Spot 150 bbl EZ Squeeze pill into open hole at the suspected loss zone. Bullhead 61 bbls EZ Squeeze into the formation and begin hesitation squeeze.

11/13/2011: Finish hesitation squeeze of EZ Squeeze pill into suspected loss zone at approximately 11;628'; below the 17-7/8" casing shoe. Total volume pumped during hesitation squeeze 39.5 bbls. Hold pressure on EZ Squeeze for 4 hours; then bleed back pressure and monitor well. Circulate bottoms up; then clean the hole from 10;905' to 11;670'.

11/14/2011: Clean the hole from 11;670' to 11;730'. Circulate bottoms up. Pull bit into casing shoe and perform LOT to 12.4 ppg EMW. Circulate bottoms up; then clean the hole from 11;524' to 11;758'.

11/15/2011: Circulate bottoms up. Perform diverter function test; BOP function test; and accumulator drill. Perform BOP pressure test on annular and rams to 250 psi low and 6;000 psi high using 12.1 ppg SBM for 5 minutes each.

11/16/2011: Complete BOP pressure test on annular and rams to 250 psi low and 6;000 psi high using 12.1 ppg SBM for 5 minutes each. Trip out of hole and rack back BHA. Function test BSR/CSR. Trip in hole with diverter sub; install wear sleeve in HPWH; and continue to trip in hole to pump cement below 17-7/8" casing shoe.

11/17/2011: TIH with cement stinger. Washed down from 11;529' to 11;730'. Circulate bottoms up. Spot 260 bbl balanced cement plug @ 11;730'. Squeeze 40 bbls into the formation. Hold squeeze pressure and monitor while waiting on cement.

11/18/2011: Continue to hold and monitor squeeze pressure while waiting on cement to cure for 24 hrs. Attempted to test cement - pumped into formation. Pump 16.0 ppg riser cap to balance hydrostatic pressure on well. Open annular and monitor well. POOH with diverter sub.

11/19/2011: POOH with diverter sub. TIH with 16.5" x 19" BHA; install wear sleeve in HPWH and continue to TIH. Wash to 11;449' and circulate water cement spacer out of hole. Function test casing and blind shear rams.

11/20/2011: Perform FIT at 17-7/8" casing shoe with 12.1 ppg mud to 325 psi. Perform second FIT with 12.1 ppg mud to 421 psi; equivalent to 12.8 ppg. Drill out cement in open hole from 11;600' to 11;670'.

11/21/2011: Continued to drill cement in open hole from 11;670' to 11;730' with 16-1/2" bit and 12.1 ppg MW. Pumped 16.0 ppg mud into riser to simulate higher ECD's. Increased mud weight in well and riser from 12.1 to 12.3 ppg. Drilled from 11;758' to 11;873' - opened reamer at 11;850'.

11/22/2011: Completed BOP diverter function test. Drilled 16-1/2" x 19" OH from 11;873' to 11;982' (see details in significant well events)

11/23/2011: Drilled from 11;982' to 12;115'. Weighed up from 12.3 to 12.4 and then 12.5 ppg. Well flowing at 2 bbls/hr - shut-in well (see details in significant well events). Noticed increase in water phase and chlorides (water influx). Took decision to stop drilling operations and P&A Coronado #1 well. Pumped 249 bbls of a 16.0 ppg SBM riser cap to balance well; well static.

11/24/2011: POOH with BHA to surface while maintaining a riser cap with 16.0 ppg mud; well static. Picked up cement diverter sub assembly and TIH while maintaining a riser cap with 16.0 ppg mud.

11/25/2011: Continued to TIH with cement stinger to 12;050'. Pumped 170 bbls of cement for balanced plug. No returns while pumping cement; 26% returns during displacement. Wait on cement. Completed a BSR and CSR function test while WOC.

11/26/2011: WOC; POOH with cement stinger while maintaining riser cap with 16.0 ppg mud.

11/27/2011: Pull out of hole with cement stinger. Pick up inflatable packer assembly and trip in hole; adjusting riser cap as needed.

11/28/2011: Continue tripping in hole with inflatable packer assembly; adjusting riser cap as needed. Set inflatable packer at 11;429' and test to 1;000 psi with 12.5 ppg mud. Circulate bottoms up. Mix and pump P&A plug #2 on top of packer: 169 bbls / 948.9 cubic feet / 879 sx cement.

11/29/2011: POOH packer setting assembly. TIH with cement diverter and tag TOC at 10;998' with 15k lbs down. CBU and test cement plug #2 to 1;000 psi with 12.5 ppg mud. POOH with cement diverter to 9;350'. Mix and pump P&A plug #3 across 18" liner top: 136 bbls / 763.6 cubic feet / 676 sx cement.

11/30/2011: WOC. Tag TOC at 8;964' with 15k lbs down. CBU and test P&A plug #3 to 1;000 psi with 12.5 ppg mud. POOH to 6;250' to perform negative test.

12/01/2011: Perform negative test to seawater equivalent at displacement depth of 6;250'; no flow observed. Displace well at 6;250' from 12.5 ppg SBM to seawater. Mix and pump surface cement plug: 190 bbls / 1066.8 cubic feet / 989 sx (6;250' to 5;750'). POOH.

12/02/2011: Rig up riser handling equipment. Unlatch BOPs at 16:11 hrs and confirm lift off from wellhead. Move 600' off location to pull riser and BOP stack.

12/03/2011: Continue pulling riser and BOP stack.

12/04/2011: Continue pulling riser and BOP stack. Riser tilt cylinder on forward MDDM not retracting fully when activated. Troubleshoot mechanical and electrical systems without success. Revised operating procedure and resumed riser pull operation.

12/05/2011: Continue pulling riser and BOP stack. Recover BOP; skid and secure in storage area. Rig down riser handling equipment. Move 1 mile off location at 12:00 p.m.

06/01/2012: Troubleshot ACS issues. Tripped in open water. Obtained baseline pressures. Jetted to TD at 6;522' with 10' LPH stickup. Soaked 36"; waiting for visibility to clear.

06/02/2012: Un-jayed CADA tool and drilled with 30" x 32" BHA to 7;065'. TOH to repair TDX1250. Worked to release CADA. Observed shallow water flow; TIH and displaced to 11.0 ppg pad mud. Flow check ¿ well static. TOH to CADA with bit at 6;522'.

06/03/2012: Trip out of hole to 5654'. Repair TDX-1250 top drive.

06/04/2012: Repair TDX-1250 top drive. Trip in hole to 6;814'.

06/05/2012: Trip in hole to 7;065'. Drilled from 7;065' to 7;277'. Pumped Hi-Vis pill and Lignite pills and circulated out spotting 16.0 ppg pad mud in the rat hole and 11.0 ppg pad mud in open hole. Pull from 7;277' to 6;522'. Made several attempts to release CADA tool from low pressure housing; was successful after moving rig 65' @ 240° heading. Activated PBL sub and washed LPH for 30 minutes. Pull BHA above wellhead and moved rig off location 200' @ 045° heading. Deactivated PBL sub and pull to 366'. Prepare to lay out BHA.

06/06/2012: Laid down BHA; rigged up and ran 28" casing. Rigged down casing equipment. Rigged up and ran 4-1/2" inner string. Changed out bails and elevators.

06/07/2012: Run 28" casing; fill with water in moon pool and close snorkel valves. Trip in hole and land out 28" in LPH. Shoe depth = 7;221'.

06/08/2012: Rigged up and cemented 28" casing. Pulled out with landing string; 28" CHRT and inner string. Cleared and cleaned rig floor. Serviced rig.

06/09/2012: Picked up 26" BHA. Tripped in with 26" BHA; moved rig over well and stabbed into 36" LPWHH at 16:00 hrs and continued trip in the hole. Tagged top of cement at 7;128'. Drill cement in shoe track from 7;128' to 7;220'.

06/10/2012: Drilled out shoe track and 28" casing shoe. Washed and reamed rathole from 7;221' to 7;277' with seawater; 9.0 ppg sweeps. Drilled 26" hole section from 7;277' to 8;652'. Weighted up to 10.0 ppg. Flow checked well during each connection; well static.

06/11/2012: Drilled from 8;652' to 8;734'. Damaged pipe handler during connection at 8;734'. Pulled 1 stand and spotted 13.0 ppg pad mud in well -- well static. Pulled to 6;238' and pumped additional 143 bbls of 13.0 ppg pad mud before pulling BHA out of well -- well static. Moved 500' off location and disassembled pipe handler. Pull out of hole with BHA to 1;036'.

06/12/2012: Pulled out of the hole from 1;036' to surface. Changed out batteries in the Sonic tool and downloaded MWD data. Broke off 26" PDC bit and made up new 26" Rock bit. Tripped in with 26" BHA to 6;039'. 

06/13/2012: Repaired pipe handler. Positioned rig over the wellhead and tripped in to 6228'. Displaced drill string with 10.5 ppg. Tripped in hole and tagged up with 25k at 8;495'. Washed and reamed from 8;495' to 8;734'. Drilled from 8;734' to 9;760' with 10.5 ppg.

06/14/2012: Drilled from 9;760' to 11;132'; pumping 50 bbl Hi-Vis weighted sweeps (12.5 ppg) every 3rd stand. Raised mud weight from 10.5 to 10.8 ppg at 9;991' and from 10.8 to 11.0 ppg at 10;293'.

06/15/2012: Drilled from 11;132' to 11;259' MD/TVD. Pump 13.0 ppg Hi-Vis/Lignite sweeps and circulate out with 13.0 ppg pad mud at 1;000 gpm (3.5 hrs). Observed large amounts of gumbo once 13.0 ppg was around. Pump additional 200 bbl Hi-Vis sweep and continue circulating at 1;200 gpm until wellbore clean and no gumbo observed in the returns. Spot 50 bbls of 16.0 ppg pad from 11;259' to 11;184' MD/TVD. Pulled out of the hole.

06/16/2012: Run 22" casing from surface to 3;923'.

06/17/2012: Finished picking up 22" casing and tripped in the hole with 4-1/2" inner string and 6-5/8" landing string to 8;818'.

06/18/2012: Tripped in with landing string and landed out in Low Pressure Housing. 22" casing shoe at 11;198' / top High Pressure Housing at 6;197'. Attempted to cement 22" casing but aborted job due to issues with LAS system; nitrogen unit; and air delivery for bulk system. Pumped 3;290 cu ft of cement out of the hole with 13.0 ppg PAD mud. Monitored well with ROV; breaking circulation every hour with 100 bbls of 13.0 ppg PAD mud (10.56 ppg EMW). Finished BOP stump test.

06/19/2012: Waited on additional chemicals and nitrogen for 22" cement job. Broke circulation every hour with 100 bbls of 13.0 ppg PAD mud.

06/20/2012: Attempted to mix and pump 22" cement job. Had issues maintaining consistent slurry density due to slurry design. Pumped 2;583 cu ft of cement out of the hole with 13.0 ppg PAD mud. Waited on updated slurry design test results.

06/21/2012: Pumped 1;684 bbls 14.2 ppg foamed lead slurry; 93 bbls 14.8 ppg foam tail slurry; and 132 bbls 16.4 ppg non foamed tail slurry. Total volume of cement pumped was 1;909 bbls (10;719 cu ft). Cement returns confirmed at surface (visual and PH meter) with 36% open hole excess. Total cement volume pumped equates to 122% open hole excess. Displaced cement with seawater to leave 83 bbls of cement inside the 22" casing shoe. Locked high pressure wellhead housing with 2 million pounds preloaded with the MRLD. Displace casing to 13.0 ppg PAD mud. Trip out of the hole with landing string.

06/22/2012: Rig up riser handling equipment. Skid stack to well center and make up double to LMRP. 

06/23/2012: Standby to monitor Tropical Storm Debby.

06/24/2012: Standby; monitoring development of Tropical Storm Debby.

06/25/2012: Resumed operations. Splashed BOP stack and began running riser.

06/26/2012: Continued running riser testing lines at pre-determined intervals. 

06/27/2012: Continued running riser testing lines at pre-determined intervals. 

06/28/2012: Continue running riser. Installed slip joint; landing joint; and drape hoses.

06/29/2012: Landed and latched BOP to Coronado 2 well. Unlatched and re-latched wellhead connector as per rig acceptance criteria. 10/22/2012: Continued drilling ahead with 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" BHA from 20;622' MD/TVD to 22;925' MD/TVD with 14.0 SBM.

Unable to build angle with rotary steerable assembly. Circulate bottoms up at 23;625' MD/TVD and POOH to replace PowerDrive.

10/24/2012: Continue to POOH with directional BHA and rack back in derrick. Function BSRs/CSRs. Conduct maintenance on TDX-1250 top drive and slip and cut drill line. RIH with new directional BHA from surface to 6;202' MD/TVD. 

10/25/2012: Continue to TIH from 6;202' MD/TVD to 16;166' MD/TVD and pull test reamer against shoe. TIH from 16;166' MD/TVD to 23;625' MD/TVD. Drilled ahead with 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" directional BHA from 23;625' MD/TVD to 23;884' MD/TVD while building angle as per directional program. 

10/26/2012: Drilled 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" hole from 23;884' MD/TVD to hole section TD at 24;550' MD / 24;535' TVD with 15 deg inclination at 14.4 deg azimuth. Performed a short trip from 24;550' MD to 23;925' MD with no overpull or drag observed. Circulated 14.2 ppg bottoms up with short trip gas reaching a maximum of 126 units.

10/27/2012: Spotted a 32-bbl; 16.4-ppg SBM pill in the 14-1/2" rat hole. TOH wet from 24;550' MD to 23;707' MD and pumped a slug. 10/28/2012: POOH with 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" BHA from 256' to surface. Rigged up 14" x 13-3/4" liner running equipment and ran 14" 115.53# Q-125 HP SLSF casing from surface to 3;618' MD/TVD.

10/29/2012: Continued to run 14" casing from 3;618' to 6;501' MD/TVD. Crossed over to 13-3/4" 98.58 ppf Q-125 HP SLSF casing and continued RIH to 8;874' MD/TVD. Observed mud loss of 690 bbls of 14.2 ppg SBM while RIH.

10/30/2012: Continued running 14" x 13-3/4" casing from 9;195' to 18;427' MD/TVD on 6-5/8" landing string while monitoring losses and filling pipe every 10 stands. Mud loss was 1;276 bbls for day and 1;966 bbls cumulative.

10/31/2012: Continued running 14" x 13-3/4" liner from 18;427' to 22;286' MD/TVD on 6-5/8" landing string while monitoring losses. Mud loss was 506 bbls (2;468 bbls cumulative losses). 11/01/2012: Continued stripping casing to planned depth at 24;390' MD/ 24;381' TVD. Attempted to circulate Drillers Method with no returns. Bled off drill pipe to keep stand pipe pressure below 3;400 psi.

11/02/2012: Continued waiting on cement for a total of 24 hours while monitoring well. Bled pressure off to cement unit. Slacked off 350 kips and set hanger @ 15;495' MD/TVD. Circulated bottoms up from hanger through choke; observed max gas of 1;938 units. Conducted stack sweep; opened up and monitored well. Well static. Circulated bottoms up through the riser.

11/03/2012: Continued circulating bottoms up with 14.2 ppg SBM. Laid out cement head and POOH with landing string to 11;670' MD/TVD. Rigged up to test BOPs to 250/7;300 psi on rams and 250/5;500psi on annulars on 6-5/8" 40# DP.

11/04/2012: Tripping out the hole from 11;540' to 4;770' MD/TVD. Tested surface equipment to 250/10;000 psi and function tested blind shear rams and casing shear rams from Toolpusher's panel on Yellow pod; recording times and gal count.

11/05/2012: Completed pressure testing IBOP and choke manifold. POOH from 4;770' to surface; laid out liner running tool. Rigged up casing running equipment for running tieback. 11/06/2012: Continued running tieback casing from 6;688' to 9;224' MD/TVD. Made up casing hanger and ran tieback on 6-5/8" 50 lb/ft landing string to 14;316' MD/TVD.

11/07/2012: Continued running 13-5/8" 88.2 lb/ft HP Q-125 SLSF; 13-3/4" 98.58 lb/ft HP Q-125 SLSF casing tieback to 15;345' MD/TVD. Cemented tieback in place with 1025 cu ft of cement in annulus. Set and tested seal assembly 10;000 psi. POOH with landing string and rigged down casing equipment.

11/08/2012: Made up 12-1/4" x 14-1/2" BHA with wear bushing running tool and TIH from surface to set wear bushing in wellhead at 6;201' MD/TVD. POOH to wear bushing running tool and laid down same. 11/09/2012: Continued TIH from 6;040' to 14;755' MD/TVD. Washed down to 15;120' MD/TVD and tagged soft cement. Drilled out tieback shoe track to 15;527' MD/TVD. 11/10/2012: Continued TIH from 19;511' to 23;020' MD/TVD. Tested 14" liner and tieback against VBRs to 3;000 psi for 30 min with 14.2 ppg SBM. Tested upper and lower annular preventers against 5-7/8" drill pipe to 250/5;500 psi. Continued to TIH and spaced out to test against 6-5/8" 40# drill pipe to 250/8;200 psi from Toolpusher's panel; Yellow pod.

11/11/2012: All BOP tests completed. Performed BOP function test from Driller's panel Blue Ppod. Functioned Diverter from Toolpusher's panel. Tipped in hole from 23;404' and tagged cement at 23;975'. Drilled out rat hole from 24;381' to TD at 24;550'.

11/12/2012: Drilled out 10' of new formation to 24;560' with 14.2 ppg SBM. Pumped 50 bbl Hi-Viscosity sweep. 11/13/2012: Drilled to 24;949'. Gamma ray spike at 24;930' MD by PowerDrive (possible base of salt or suture). Weighted surface pits up to 14.9 ppg; pumped at 30 spm using Weight and Wait method. Max gas 1324 units. Continued well kill procedure through the night.

11/14/2012: Continued circulating 14.9 ppg SBM into the well. After second bottoms up with 14.9 ppg MW; gas dropped from 500 to 120 units. 11/15/2012: Swept the stack for any gas below the annular. Monitored well; bled back 1 bbl in 20 mins; then 1 bbl in 10 mins. SICP = 94 psi and SIDPP = 20 psi. Monitored pressures and bled back 1.1 bbls in 1 hour. Swept the stack below the annular for any gas.

11/16/2012: Swept the stack and monitored the well on the riser. Gained 2 bbls in 25 minutes. Weighted up and circulated a new KWM of 15.5 ppg; taking returns up the choke and kill lines. Stopped circulation due to losses. Determined riser cap pressure and loss rate.

11/17/2012: Sweep the stack below the annular. Spotted 610 bbls of 17.5 ppg riser cap in the top of the riser. TOH from 24;910' to 23;233'; monitoring losses and pressures. Displaced riser cap up the riser and added 17.5 ppg to manage losses at 6 bbls/hr.

11/18/2012: Adjusted 17.5 ppg riser mud cap while POOH with 12-1/4" x 14-1/2" BHA from 22;549' to 21;150' MD/TVD. Continued adjusting riser cap as necessary to control losses. Shut in and replace riser cap. Daily Mud Loss Total = 31 bbls.

11/19/2012: Spotted new 17.5 ppg riser cap and POOH from 21;150' to 18;315' MD/TVD. Adjusted riser cap as necessary to control losses. Daily Mud Loss Total = 477 bbls.

11/20/2012: Continue POOH with 12-1/4" x 14-1/2" BHA from 18;315' to 6;424' MD/TVD; adjusting 17.5 ppg riser cap as required. Daily Mud Loss Total = 667 bbls.

11/21/2012: POOH from 6;424' MD/TVD to surface and function tested BSRs and CSRs from Toolpusher's panel; Yellow pod. Slipped and cut drill line. Rigged up 11-7/8" casing equipment. Adjusted 17.5 ppg riser cap as necessary to control losses. Daily Mud Loss Total = 321 bbls.

11/23/2012: Continued TIH with 11-7/8" liner on 6-5/8" drill pipe from 6;653' to 20;410' MD/TVD; monitoring losses and adjusting 17.5 ppg riser cap as needed. Daily Mud Loss Total = 2;350 bbls.

11/24/2012: Tripped in with 11-7/8" liner from 20;410' MD/TVD to 24;912' MD and washed down to 24;949' MD/ 24;917' TVD. Drilled ahead with 11-7/8" liner from 24;949' MD to 25;050' MD/ 25;012' TVD with no returns. Daily Mud Loss Total = 930 bbls (2;982 bbls including drilling).

11/25/2012: Rigged up and cemented 11-7/8" liner at 25;050' MD. Pumped 236 bbls 16.6 ppg Class H cement slurry. No indication of wiper plugs launching. Did not bump plug. Functioned diverter from Driller's panel Yellow pod.

11/26/2012: Continued waiting on cement for 12 hours. Opened and monitored well. Well static. Released 11-7/8" setting tool from hanger. Rigged down cement head. Pulled 2 stands. Rigged up Double Dutch. Attempted to test BOPs. Test rams did not hold. 

11/27/2012: Function tested BOPs. POOH from 22;244' to 21;865' MD/TVD. Added 100 bbls 17.5 ppg to riser cap. Continued pull out of hole (POOH) to 17;920' MD/TVD. Monitored well on trip tank. 11/28/2012: Added riser mud cap to a total of 1;467 bbls 17.5 ppg SBM. Wellhead pressure 5;430 psi. Displaced well over to 15.5 ppg through the choke. Max gas 544 units; and max MW cut to 15.1 ppg. 

11/29/2012: Finished displacing wellbore on choke with 15.5 ppg SBM. Monitor well on trip tank. Well taking 0.5 bbl/hr. Displaced riser with 15.5 ppg and swept BOP stack. Opened well and monitored - well static. Pumped slug and POOH from 22;410' to 12;253' MD/TVD. Total losses: 42 bbls SBM

11/30/2012: POOH to above BOP. Functioned BSR from Driller's panel Yellow pod. Continued POOH and laid out 11-7/8" setting tool. Both cement wiper plugs recovered. Slipped and cut drill line. 12/1/2012: Finished tripping with 11-7/8" 2nd trip isolation hanger. Landed out in PBR of the primary 11-7/8" liner hanger (liner top 22;542' MD/TVD) and set the 2nd trip hanger at 22;392' MD/TVD. 12/03/2012: Completed BOP testing at 05:00 hrs. Unseated BOP test tool and pulled out of the hole. Pulled 11-7/8" running tool out of the hole. Racked back 6-5/8" drill pipe. 12/04/2012: Tripped in hole with 11-7/8" lower hanger and set same at 16;250'. Tripped out of the hole with liner hanger setting tool and laid down the liner hanger setting tool.

12/05/2012: Ran in 1;553' 11-7/8"; 71.80#; HPQ-125 scab liner casing with Halliburton Versaflex hanger assembly. Stung into anchor assembly TBR at 16;250' with 30 klb down. 12/06/2012: Completed cementing the 11-7/8" 71.80 scab liner. Filled entire annulus with 140.9 cu ft of cement. Set the Versaflex hanger at 14;700'. 12/07/2012: Tripped out of the hole and laid down the 11-7/8" liner hanger setting tool. Function tested Blind Shear Ram from Driller's panel; Blue pod. 12/08/2012: Completed BOP pressure testing. Function test BOPs on Blue pod from Toolpusher's panel. Unseated the Dril-Quip test plug and pulled out of the hole. 12/17/2012: Tripped in hole with diverter and cement stinger. Prior to beginning the balanced plug cement job; the drill pipe was exhibiting trapped pressure. Conditioned and circulated B/U until 15.4 ppg SBM was circulated throughout the wellbore. 

12/18/2012: Pumped 80 bbls of 16.6 ppg cement and spotted the cement at 25;055'. POOH from 25;055' to 23;528'. Squeezed cement with 1;050 psi and it appeared that no cement squeezed into the formation. Circulated bottoms up; conducted flow check and POOH from 23;528' to 5;122'.

12/21/2012: Finished conducting negative test from 15.4 ppg to 15.0 ppg EMW; then to 14.8 ppg EMW. Circulated bottoms up and POOH from 25;023' to 6;998'.

12/23/2012: Tested BOPs on 5-7/8" and 6-5/8" DP to 250/8400 psi on rams and 250/5100 psi on annulars with 15.4 ppg SBM. Functioned BOPs from Toolpusher's panel Yellow Pod. 12/24/2012: Continued tripping in hole to 23;229' with proper displacement. Monitored well - static. Displaced choke; kill and boost lines from 15.4 to 14.8 ppg. Continued tripping in hole to 24;808'. Started displacing well from 15.4 to 15.1 ppg to keep ECD below 15.6 ppg.

12/25/2012: Completed cutting mud weight to 15.1 ppg. Removed cracked pinion gear from Drawworks Motor B. Drilled 10' new formation from 25;060' to 25;070' and cut mud weight from 15.1 to 14.8 ppg.

12/26/2012: Performed FIT to 15.6 ppg EMW (16.05 ppg ESD). Drilled from 25;070' to 25;231'. Activated reamer at 25;206' and continued drilling ahead to 25;281'. 12/28/2012: Drilled from 26;837' to 27;575'. Ceased drilling to run Lock Down Sleeve in 14" tieback casing hanger for Worst Case Discharge scenarios. Circulated and raised mud weight from 15.0 to 15.2 ppg; with background gas continuing to run 150-250 units. Decided to increase MW again to 15.4 ppg to reduce background gas and increase trip margin. Began observing losses while circulating 15.4 ppg around. Staged pumps down to stabilize losses and finished circulating 15.4 ppg around. Total losses 231 bbls. 

12/29/2012: Monitored well with pumps shut off. Gained 14 bbls. Brought pumps back on at 320 gpm to stabilize well. Shut down and monitored well on trip tank. Well static after flowing back 64 bbls (78 bbls total). Pumped out of hole at 150 gpm from 27;575' to 22;325'; monitoring displacement. Circulated bottoms up at 22;325' above 11-7/8" liner. Max gas 141 units. Total losses while pumping out and circulating were 178 bbls.

Ongoing MWD/LWD and/or Mudlog Operations 12/30/2012: Performed BOP function test from Driller's panel on Blue pod. Diverter function test performed from Driller's panel. Pulled out of the hole from 22;325' MD to 3;089' MD. Crew A1 and E1 performed a trip drill. Function test on blind and casing shear rams from Driller's Panel on Blue pod. Made up and tripped in the hole from 3;089' MD to 6;663' MD with the Multi-Purpose Tool for wear bushing removal. Weekly fire drill was conducted.

12/31/2012: Continued TIH to 9;242' MD and pulled the wear sleeve out from the wellhead. Tripped out of the hole to 6;534' MD and activated the PBL to wash the wellhead profile. Deactivated the PBL and continued to trip out of the hole to surface. Tripped in the hole with dumb iron bottom hole assembly and lead impression tool (LIT) to 3;438' MD. 

01/01/2013: Continued TIH with LIT to 8;327' MD; landed and activated LIT. Retracted LIT; pumped a slug and POOH from 8;327' MD to 2;181' MD and laid out LIT. Made up lock down sleeve (LDS); confirmed spaceout; and TIH from 2;181' to 8;296' MD. Landed and set the LDS in the wellhead and pulled out of the hole from 8;327' MD to surface. Rigged up wireline on the rig floor and prepared for wireline run #1 (of 4).

01/02/2013: Ran wireline into hole for run #1 with HP-MSIP; HP-Dual OBMI; HTGC; GPIT tools. Pulled wireline out of the hole and rigged up tools for run #2. Ran wireline into the hole for run #2 with ZAIT; HLDS; and QCNT tools.

01/03/2013; Completed wireline run #2. Ran in the hole with wireline run #3 MDT tool. 

01/04/2013: Crew E1 performed a trip drill. Completed run #3; with the MDT tool. Commenced run #4 with HP-MSCT

01/05/2013: Crew E1 performed a trip drill. Coring tool motor drew too much current to operate properly. Pulled out of the hole with HP-MSCT and changed out for back up tool. Ran in the hole; collected 50 sidewall core samples and pulled out of the hole - 39/50 successful cores. Rigged down wireline and function tested Blind Shear Rams and Casing Shear Rams from the Driller's panel on the Blue pod.

01/06/2013: Crew D performed a pit drill. Function tested Blind Shear Rams/Casing Shear Rams from the Toolpusher's panel on the Yellow pod. Made up Dril-Quip special BOP test tool (SBOPTT) and Nominal Bore Protector (NBP). Tripped into the hole. Landed and set NBP and SBOPTT. Function tested diverter from the Driller's control panel. Commenced BOP pressure test with 15.4 ppg SBM on 5-7/8" drill pipe. Annulars tested to 250/5;100 psi; rams tested to 250/8;400 psi; kelly hose tested to 250/6;500 psi. Performed BOP function test from Toolpusher's panel on the Yellow pod. Weekly fire drill conducted.

01/07/2013: Completed BOP pressure test on the 5-7/8" drill pipe and POOH with SBOPTT. Made up SBOPTT; and Dual Cam on 6-5/8" drill pipe. Pressure tested choke and kill manifold to 250/7;500psi and 10;000psi. Tripped in hole and landed the SBOPTT and tested BOPs from the Toolpusher's Panel on the Yellow pod. Test performed with 15.4 ppg SBM. Rams tested to 250/8;400 psi. Function tested BOPs from the Driller's panel on the Blue pod. Dropped the dart; released the Dual Cam and performed Blind Shear Ram pressure test at 250/3;600 psi from Toolpusher's panel; Yellow pod. Made up string to Dual Cam; fished the dart and tripped out of hole to surface. 

Note: Obtained approval from Bobby Nelson (BSEE Houma District) on 01/07/13 for 48 hr casing test extension in order to get liner run and cemented in place. New due date: 01/11/13 at midnight.

01/08/2013: Crew D1 performed a trip drill. Functioned diverter from Driller's panel and Toolpusher's panel. Slipped and cut drill line. Functioned blind and casing shear ram from the Driller's panel on the Blue pod. Made up and RIH with 2;7425 ft of 9-3/8" casing on a Halliburton Versaflex liner hanger from surface to 8;645' MD on 5-7/8" x 6-5/8" landing string.

01/09/2013: Crew E1 Held trip drill. Continued to TIH with 9-3/8" liner on 5-7/8" x 6-5/8" landing string from 8;645' MD to 27;570' MD/ 27;120' TVD. Dropped surge tool conversion ball and converted and tested surge tools. Brought pumps up to 7 bpm and converted auto-fill float equipment. Mixed and pumped 118 bbls of 16.6 ppg Class H lead slurry followed by 117 bbls of 16.6 ppg Class H tail slurry. Total slurry pumped: 249 bbls/ 1398 cu ft; total annular volume of cement: 154 bbls/ 864 cu ft. Displaced cement with 15.4 ppg SBM with approx 25% returns throughout job. Bumped top plug and pressured up to expand Versaflex liner hanger. Cement in place at 23:45 hrs. 

01/10/2013: Verified hanger was set with 100 klb overpull and released hanger running tool. Racked back cement head and circulated bottoms up to below the stack. Shut the lower annular and circulated out the choke - max gas of 250 units. Swept the stack and opened up lower annular; pumped a slug and pulled out of the hole from 24;346' MD to 10;352' MD.

01/11/2013: Continued POOH from 10;352' MD to surface. Picked up 8-1/2" drilling BHA and tripped into the hole to 2;343'. Slipped and cut drill line and attempted casing test at 1;900 psi with 15.4 ppg SBM. The test pressure broke over at 1;300 psi. Function tested the diverter from the Driller's panel and Toolpusher's panel. TIH to obtain MWD surveys between 7;090' to 7;590' while WOC. Tripped out of the hole to 5;631' in preparation to repeat casing test.

Note: Obtained approval from Bobby Nelson (BSEE Houma District) on 01/11/13 for an additional 48 hr casing test extention to WOC following failed initial test. New due date: 01/13/13 at midnight. Achieved good 30 min test on 01/12/13.

01/12/2013: Closed Blind Shear Rams from the Driller's panel on the Blue pod. Preformed Casing and Blind Shear Ram pressure tests to 250/1900 psi with 15.4 ppg SBM. The test was satisfactory. Tripped in hole with 8-1/2" drilling BHA from 5;631' MD to 9;342' MD. The drill pipe float would not convert. Tripped out of the hole to surface and changed the float.

01/13/2013: Completed weekly fire drill. Crew E1 performed a trip drill. Function tested the Blind and Casing Shear Rams from the Toolpusher's panel on the Yellow pod. Tripped in hole with 8-1/2" drilling BHA from surface to 26;998' MD and float converted; last 11 stands were left dry. Performed a cased hole negative test to 14.8 ppg equivalent mud weight. 

01/14/2013: Crew E1 performed a choke drill. Function tested the BOPs from the Toolpusher's panel on the Yellow pod. Function tested the diverter from the Driller's panel. Cut mud weight from 15.4 ppg to 15.1 ppg. Drilled out the plugs and float collar from 27;323' to 27;327' MD with the 8-1/2" drilling BHA. Began cutting mud weight back to 14.8 ppg while drilling shoe track. Drilled out of shoe and drilled another 10 feet to 27;585'. Pumped a 14.8 ppg high viscosity sweep to prepare for the leak off test.

01/15/2013: Performed leak off test to 1300 psi with 14.8 ppg MW to achieve a 15.7 ppg EMW surface (16.12 ppg EMW downhole). Drilled ahead with 8-1/2" RSS BHA from 27;585' to 28;187' at 36 deg inclination; with 14.8 ppg MW. 

01/16/2013: Continued to drill from 28;187' to 28;801' MD with 8-1/2" RSS BHA at 36 deg inclination; 14.8 ppg MW; 396 gpm; 15.5 ppg ECD. Troubleshot and repaired upper proximity switch for main traveling block.

01/17/2013: Continued to drill ahead from 28;801' to 29;465' MD with 8-1/2" RSS BHA at 36 deg inclination; 14.8 ppg MW; 396 gpm; 15.5 ppg ECD; 30-40 fph average ROP.

01/18/2013: Continued to drill ahead from 29;465' to 30;005' MD with 8-1/2" RSS BHA at 36 deg inclination; 14.8 ppg MW; 396 gpm; 15.5 ppg ECD; 30 fph average ROP. Obtained stethoscope reading at 29;342' MD and achieved a 14.92 ppg downhole EMW.

01/19/2013: Continued to drill ahead from 30;005' to 30;401' MD with 8-1/2" RSS BHA at 36 deg inclination; 14.8 ppg MW; 396 gpm; 15.6 ppg ECD; 25 fph average ROP. Circulated the hole clean at 396 gpm with 14.8 ppg MW in preparation to POOH for BOP testing.

01/20/2013: POOH for BOP testing. Slip and cut 180' of drill line. Functioned CSR and BSR from Driller's panel Blue pod with 21 & 19 second closing time; respectively.

01/21/2013: Functioned diverter from Toolpusher's panel (33 sec closing time). BOP testing on 5-7/8" drill pipe at 5300 psi for annulars; 8000 psi for rams; and 10;000 psi for surface equipment using 14.8 ppg SBM. Continued to test BOP equipment on 6-5/8" drill pipe at same pressures. Performed emergency disconnect drill by simulating ship blackout drift-off scenario; crew performance SAT.

01/22/2013: Completed BOP testing; POOH and layed out test assembly. Made up 8-1/2" BHA and TIH from surface to 5;631' MD/TVD. 

01/23/2013: Continued to TIH from 5;631' to 18;833' MD/TVD. Functioned BSR & CSR on Yellow pod from Toolpusher's panel prior to running BHA across BOP stack. 

01/24/2013: Continued to TIH from 18;833' MD/TVD to 30;019' MD. Obtained SCRs and conducted MAD pass for LWD. Tagged bottom with BHA at 30;401' and drilled ahead with 14.8 ppg mud (~15.6 ECD) to 30;690' MD.

01/25/2013: Drilled ahead with 8-1/2" RSS BHA from 30;690' MD to 31;000' MD and circulated bottoms up to check lithology with cuttings samples. Continued drilling ahead to 31;093' MD with 14.8 ppg MW.

01/26/2013: Continued drilling ahead with 8-1/2" RSS BHA from 31;098' MD to 31;532' MD and circulated bottoms up to verify lithology with cuttings samples.

01/27/2013: Continued drilling ahead with 8-1/2" RSS BHA and 14.8 ppg mud weight (~15.56 ECD) from 31;585' to 31;866' MD. Stopped drilling to circulate bottoms up and check cuttings for TD markers.

01/28/2013: Circulated wellbore for wireline logging operations. Began POOH from 31;866' MD (30;580' TVD) to 30;399' MD while taking stethoscope readings on open hole section.

01/29/2013: Completed stethoscope formation pressure readings and continued POOH from 30;399' MD to surface. Performed a trip drill with Crew B1 and Crew A1. Functioned the Blind and Casing Shear Rams from the Toolpusher's panel on the Yellow pod.

01/30/2013: Rigged up wireline equipment and completed wireline run #1: cement evaluation (MSIP/IBC). Pulled cement evaluation tools out of the hole. POOH with wireline run #2 for wiper trip. No logging was performed on run #2.

01/31/2013: Made up 8-1/2" wiper trip BHA. Tripped in hole with the same from surface to 26;997' MD.

Performed a flow check; and the well was static. POOH from 31;866' to 29;834' MD with proper fluid displacement. Decision made to TA well pending replacement of LMRP bolts per BSEE Safety Alert #303.

02/02/2013: Crew A1 performed a trip drill. Continued to POOH with the 8-1/2" BHA from 29;834' MD to surface and laid down the same. TIH with 4-1/2" cement stinger; 9-3/8" and 11-7/8" scraper assemblies from surface to 5;847' for TA operations.

02/03/2013: Crew B1 performed a trip drill. Function tested the Blind and Casing Shear Rams from the Toolpusher's panel on the Blue pod. Weekly fire drill was completed. Began pumping spacer for Cement Plug #1.

02/04/2013: Spotted a 75 bbl (421 cu ft) cement plug across hydrocarbon bearing zone from 31;850' to 30;850'. POOH to 28;570' and spotted a 75 bbl (421 cu ft) cement plug from 28;570' to 27;570'. Circulated bottoms up and pulled out of the hole.

02/05/2013: Tripped out of the hole from 27;530' MD to surface with cement stinger. Made up and tripped in the hole with the 9-3/8" EZSV from surface to 9;774' MD/TVD. Note: Lindsay Hubbard (CVX) received a waiver from Bobby Nelson (BSEE) on 02/05/2013 to not perform a BOP pressure test while preparing to TA the well. The pressure tests will be required prior to returning to operations.

02/06/2013: Tripped out of the hole to above the BOP stack and function tested Blind and Casing Shear Rams from the Driller's panel on the Yellow pod. Trip drill performed with crew A1. Note: Approval was received for the temporary abandonment APM from Bobby Nelson (BSEE) on 02/06/2013.

02/08/2013: Tripped out of the hole from 10;127' to surface. Performed a partial blackout/EDS drill. Made up 11-7/8" FASDrill and tripped in the hole from surface to 24;010' MD.

Note: Lindsay Hubbard (CVX) received a waiver on 02/08/2013 to not perform the BSR/Casing pressure test due to the TA'd condition of the well for BOP unlatch. The BSR/Casing test must be performed once returning to operations.

02/09/2013: Set 11-7/8" FASDrill at 24;006'. Spotted a 45 bbl (253 cu ft) balanced cement plug from 23;989' to 23;589'. Tripped out of the hole to 22;200' MD and spotted a high viscosity pill. 02/10/2013: Tripped out of the hole from 5;130' to surface with 11-7/8" FASdrill setting tool. Fire and abandon drill completed. 2/11/2013: Spotted a 23 bbl (129 cu ft) balanced cement plug from 15;572' to 15;372' MD/TVD. Tripped out of the hole to 14;709' MD/TVD and circulated BU. Continued TOH from 14;709' to 2;443'. 02/12/2013: Finished successful negative test on 11-7/8" EZSV. TOH with 11-7/8" EZSV setting tool. TIH with riser brush and 4-1/2" diverter to 6;600'. Began displacing surface lines; surface equipment and wellbore from 14.8 ppg SBM to seawater.

02/13/2013: Completed displacement to seawater. Spotted 23 bbls (129 cu ft) balanced surface plug from 6;600' to 6;450' MD/TVD and picked up to 6;276' MD/TVD to circulate bottoms up. 02/14/2013: Pulled and laid down diverter. Conducted 100k lbs overpull test on BOP connector. Unlatched BOP and moved ship to safe zone. Installed TA cap and injected preservation fluid into the wellhead. Secured tensioner ring. Disconnected storm loops and coil flex hose lines. 

02/15/2013: Laid out pup joint and slick joint. Began pulling riser and rigging down to the deck. 

02/16/2013: Completed riser pull. Parked BOP at transporter. Commenced rig move workscope.

04/21/2013: Tested BOP acoustic control system by closing BSRs. Tested BSRs to 250/4600 psi for 35 minutes. 05/30/2013: Continued taking pressures with HTGC/HP-MDT between 32;252' and 33;422' MD and took one fluid sample at 32;958' MD. POOH with HTGC/HP-MDT wireline toolstring and RIH with HTGC/HP-MSCT coring tool to 30;948' MD.

05/31/2013: Continued RIH with HTGC/HP-MSTC coring tool from 30;948' to 33;200' MD. Took core samples from 33;420' to 28;835' MD and POOH to surface with toolstring. RIH with HTGC/GPIT/HP-MSIP/HP-Dual OBMI wireline tool to 27;570' MD. POOH with tool to 26;400' MD to troubleshoot.

06/03/2013: Finished pressure testing BOPs on 5-7/8" drill pipe. TIH from 6;282' to 6;625'. Pressure tested BOPs on 6-5/8" drill pipe on the Yellow pod from the Toolpusher's panel. RIH with HTGC/QCNT/HLDS/ZAIT/HP-CMR+/HP-ECS wireline tools. Repaired damaged wireline. Continued RIH with wireline tools to 26;000' MD.

06/04/2013: Continue RIH with wireline tools to 27;300' MD. Logged from 27;370' to 33;497' MD. Performed acoustic pod test. POOH with wireline tools. 06/05/2013: Continue RIH to 19;100' MD. Worked scrapers inside 11-7/8" scab liner from 15;620' to 15;580' MD. TIH to 27;524' MD. Worked scrapers inside 9-3/8" liner from 27;470' to 27;510' MD. Pumped 100 bbl 14.8 ppg hi-vis sweep and circulated to surface. TOH from 27;524' to 22;259' MD.

06/07/2013: Continue TIH with 9-3/8" EZSV to 27;500' MD. Set 9-3/8" EZSV @ 27;500' MD. Tested EZSV to 1;000 psi with good test. Note: On 06/07/2013; Lindsay Hubbard (CVX) received approval from Bobby Nelson (BSEE Houma District) to proceed with plugging and abandonment of WR98 #1 ST01 OCS-G 21841 according to the required changes per BSEE for final approval of the permit.

06/08/2013: Continued circulating pill to surface. TOH from 26;672' to 25;200' MD. Pumped and spotted a 40 bbl 14.8 ppg hi-vis pill from 24;700' to 25;200' MD. TOH from 25;200' to 24;700' MD. 06/12/2013: Continue TOH with 11-7/8" assembly to 3;085'. Picked up and TIH with BOP test plug to 9;290' MD/TVD. Set BOP test plug in HPWH. 06/13/2013: Continue TOH with BOP test plug to surface. Picked up and TIH with riser brush assembly to 6;490' MD/TVD. Displaced choke; kill; boost lines with 50 bbls of riser wash and seawater. 06/14/2013: Continued circulating @ 15 BPM. POOH with riser brush assembly to surface. Rigged up to pull riser. Installed diverter running tool and pulled diverter. Unlatched BOPs from wellhead @ 18:15 hrs. Installed wellhead preservation fluid and TA cap. Laid out landing joint.

12/09/2013: Continue waiting on Revised EP approval and received same at 12:00 hrs. Run 36". Run innerstring and latch 36" running tool to wellhead. 

12/10/2013: Continue run 36" on 6-5/8" V-150 DP to mudline at 5;853'. Jet 36" conductor to 317' BML and soak same. Release WHRT and pull above 36" LPWHH.
