06/12/2012: Pulled out of the hole from 1;036' to surface. Changed out batteries in the Sonic tool and downloaded MWD data. Broke off 26" PDC bit and made up new 26" Rock bit. Tripped in with 26" BHA to 6;039'. 

06/13/2012: Repaired pipe handler. Positioned rig over the wellhead and tripped in to 6228'. Displaced drill string with 10.5 ppg. Tripped in hole and tagged up with 25k at 8;495'. Washed and reamed from 8;495' to 8;734'. Drilled from 8;734' to 9;760' with 10.5 ppg.

06/14/2012: Drilled from 9;760' to 11;132'; pumping 50 bbl Hi-Vis weighted sweeps (12.5 ppg) every 3rd stand. Raised mud weight from 10.5 to 10.8 ppg at 9;991' and from 10.8 to 11.0 ppg at 10;293'.

06/15/2012: Drilled from 11;132' to 11;259' MD/TVD. Pump 13.0 ppg Hi-Vis/Lignite sweeps and circulate out with 13.0 ppg pad mud at 1;000 gpm (3.5 hrs). Observed large amounts of gumbo once 13.0 ppg was around. Pump additional 200 bbl Hi-Vis sweep and continue circulating at 1;200 gpm until wellbore clean and no gumbo observed in the returns. Spot 50 bbls of 16.0 ppg pad from 11;259' to 11;184' MD/TVD. Pulled out of the hole.

06/16/2012: Run 22" casing from surface to 3;923'.
"},{"   ":12,"WELL_NAME":"  001a","API12":608124007600,"WAR_START_DT":"2012-06-17","TEXT_REMARK":"06/17/2012: Finished picking up 22" casing and tripped in the hole with 4-1/2" inner string and 6-5/8" landing string to 8;818'.

06/18/2012: Tripped in with landing string and landed out in Low Pressure Housing. 22" casing shoe at 11;198' / top High Pressure Housing at 6;197'. Attempted to cement 22" casing but aborted job due to issues with LAS system; nitrogen unit; and air delivery for bulk system. Pumped 3;290 cu ft of cement out of the hole with 13.0 ppg PAD mud. Monitored well with ROV; breaking circulation every hour with 100 bbls of 13.0 ppg PAD mud (10.56 ppg EMW). Finished BOP stump test.

06/19/2012: Waited on additional chemicals and nitrogen for 22" cement job. Broke circulation every hour with 100 bbls of 13.0 ppg PAD mud.

06/20/2012: Attempted to mix and pump 22" cement job. Had issues maintaining consistent slurry density due to slurry design. Pumped 2;583 cu ft of cement out of the hole with 13.0 ppg PAD mud. Waited on updated slurry design test results.

06/21/2012: Pumped 1;684 bbls 14.2 ppg foamed lead slurry; 93 bbls 14.8 ppg foam tail slurry; and 132 bbls 16.4 ppg non foamed tail slurry. Total volume of cement pumped was 1;909 bbls (10;719 cu ft). Cement returns confirmed at surface (visual and PH meter) with 36% open hole excess. Total cement volume pumped equates to 122% open hole excess. Displaced cement with seawater to leave 83 bbls of cement inside the 22" casing shoe. Locked high pressure wellhead housing with 2 million pounds preloaded with the MRLD. Displace casing to 13.0 ppg PAD mud. Trip out of the hole with landing string.

06/22/2012: Rig up riser handling equipment. Skid stack to well center and make up double to LMRP. 

06/23/2012: Standby to monitor Tropical Storm Debby.

"},{"   ":13,"WELL_NAME":"  001a","API12":608124007600,"WAR_START_DT":"2012-06-24","TEXT_REMARK":"06/24/2012: Standby; monitoring development of Tropical Storm Debby.

06/25/2012: Resumed operations. Splashed BOP stack and began running riser.

06/26/2012: Continued running riser testing lines at pre-determined intervals. 

06/27/2012: Continued running riser testing lines at pre-determined intervals. 

06/28/2012: Continue running riser. Installed slip joint; landing joint; and drape hoses.

06/29/2012: Landed and latched BOP to Coronado 2 well. Unlatched and re-latched wellhead connector as per rig acceptance criteria. Performed slump test and then attempted a controlled LMRP disconnect. After lifting the LMRP from the BOP; the retractable choke stab receptacle was noticed hanging from the LMRP. An attempt was made to inspect the male stabs on the BOP stack. The decision was made to re-latch the BOP stack and pull it to surface for inspection and/or repair.

06/30/2012: Removed choke stab receptacle from the LMRP. Re-latched LMRP to BOP stack. Unlatched BOP from wellhead and begin pulling out of the hole with riser.
"},{"   ":14,"WELL_NAME":"  001a","API12":608124007600,"WAR_START_DT":"2012-07-01","TEXT_REMARK":"07/01/2012: Pulled riser 5;143' to 2;443'.

07/02/2012: Pulled riser 2;443' to surface.

07/03/2012: Prepped and landed BOP on transporter. Secured BOP and moved to setback area. Rig down riser handling equipment. Slip and cut 140' of drill line. Rig up 6-5/8" handling equipment. Make up wireline sub with ROV operable hook for choke stab recovery. Trip in to 6;040'. Wait on ROV to make repairs - ROV lost sonar and camera at 21:30 hrs and returned to surface.

07/04/2012: Wait at 6;040' while finishing ROV repairs. Jump ROV and attach hook to recovery sling on choke stab. Pulled out with the recovered choke stab. Held Safety Stand Down Meetings. General Housekeeping and PM's on TDX 1250. Change out tugger lines on utility tugger and man rider on the rig floor. Subsea continued with stack repairs.

07/05/2012: Change out man rider and tugger cables. Repaired riser running tool. PM's on HPS 1000; Main & AUX Rackers. Installed rotary sock in AUX rotary. Made up and racked back 18-1/4" X 21" BHA. Continue BOP repairs and maintenance.

07/06/2012: Troubleshoot choke stab alignment issues. Wait on alignment shims. Rebuild leaking solenoid valves. Check choke and kill stab measurements in retract and extend positions. Lifted and landed the LMRP and checked tolerances. Land LMRP in maintenance stand. Begin installation of gas bleed dual block valves and choke isolation valve. Installed shim pack in choke and kill stabs. Installed Gimbal & Spider. Make up and rack back double dutch test stand. General PM's and housekeeping.

07/07/2012: Install choke line flex loop. Prep fine alignment components on choke & kill connectors. NOV alignment checks. Rig up hotline and establish pilot pressure to control pods. Stack up LMRP onto BOP. Perform NOV inspections. Begin NOV test procedure; testing choke and kill lines. Drilling - PM's and housekeeping. Assist Hampco in moonpool. Change out damaged hydraulic lines on the riser spider.

"},{"   ":15,"WELL_NAME":"  001a","API12":608124007600,"WAR_START_DT":"2012-07-08","TEXT_REMARK":"07/08/2012: Continued with NOV test procedure; pressure testing choke and kill lines to 15k psi. Performed EDS tests with lift off. Continued testing procedures.

07/09/2012: Function tested BOP. Set up for EHBS (Emergency Hydraulics Backup System) testing. Functioning and troubleshooting EHBS. Worked on punch list from BOEM/USCG inspection. 

07/10/2012: Function tested on Blue Pod from Driller's Panel. Pressure tested Upper Annular to 10;000 psi / 15 minutes (Integrity test for Gas Relief Valve). Function tested on Yellow Pod from Toolpusher's Panel and pressure tested Upper Annular to 7;000 psi / 15 minutes (Integrity test for Gas Relief valve). 

07/11/2012: Tested BSRs to 15;000 psi / 15 minutes. Soak tested both pods and redressed solenoid valves as required. Transported BOP to well center and prepared to splash.

07/12/2012: Splashed BOP; calibrated bulls eyes; installed mux clamps; and calibrated ERA (electronic riser angle). Tested both conduits and boost line to 5;000 psi and choke/kill lines 250 psi low / 10;000 psi high. Run riser - total joints ran 24; depth 2;173'.

07/13/2012: Continue to run riser and test conduits and boost line to 5;000 psi and choke and kill line 250 psi low / 10;000 psi high; total joints ran 52.

07/14/2012: Continued to run riser; testing conduits and boost line to 5;000 psi and choke and kill line 250 psi low / 10;000 psi high. P/U and M/U slip joint and landing joint; installed drape hoses; and pressure tested choke; kill at 250 psi low / 10;000 psi high and boost line at 5;000 psi. Latched up tensioner ring with 50k overpull. 
"},{"   ":16,"WELL_NAME":"  001a","API12":608124007600,"WAR_START_DT":"2012-07-15","TEXT_REMARK":"07/15/2012: Positioned ship over well center. Landed and latched BOP. Successfully performed planned LMRP disconnect. Latched LMRP back onto BOP and locked connector. Installed diverter. Successfully completed EDS sequence #3.

07/16/2012: Re-latched LMRP to BOP and tested against blind shear rams to 250 psi/ 5 min and 3100 psi/ 5 min each on chart to verify that EDS #3 blind shear ram closure was successful; good test. Line up BOP for drilling operations (34.2 gallons) to open BSR. Close BSR with ROV. Test down C/K lines with CMT unit to 250 psi/ 5 min. and 3100 psi/ 5 min to verify BSR closed. Good test. Open BSR with 34.6 gallons 29 sec. Note: Took ROV 7 mins 38 sec to close BSR. Line up BOP for testing BSR with acoustic pod. Subsea attempted to arm the system; the function would time out. Subsea attempted numerous times without success. Test aborted. Line up BOP to perform EHBS system test on BSR. Test 250 psi/ 5 min and 3100 psi/ 5 min on chart; good test. Subsea troubleshooting Yellow Pod pilot pressure for lower and upper annular regulator; unsuccessful. 

07/17/2012: Unlatched BOP. Latched tension ring in diverter housing. Released slip joint from same. Removed goosenecks and storm loops from the slip joint. Laid out the landing joint. Pulled 23 joints of riser from 6;197' to 4;063'.

07/18/2012: Continued pulling BOP/LMRP on riser from 4;063' to surface. Set BOP/LMRP in setback area. Commenced trouble shooting BOP issues and repair as required.

07/19/2012: Continued troubleshooting BOP issues upper and lower annular regulator increase and decrease. Performed acoustic function testing. Changed out chamber compensated solenoid valve (CCSV) on upper annular increase and lower annular decrease.
NOTE: Notified Mr. Bobby Nelson (BSEE Houma District) that we were experiencing issues with the current meter.

07/20/2012: Continued troubleshooting BOP issues and repairing as required. 

07/21/2012: Performed final inspection of LMRP to BOP interfaces. Stacked up LMRP. Reassembled acoustic pod and pressured up BOP; lined up in drill mode. Began initial testing of acoustic pod system. Found NPT connection on check valve to be cracked. 
"},{"   ":17,"WELL_NAME":"  001a","API12":608124007600,"WAR_START_DT":"2012-07-22","TEXT_REMARK":"07/22/2012: Continued troubleshooting BOP issues and repairing as required. Began testing BOP.

07/23/2012: Continued troubleshooting BOP issues and repairing and testing as required.

07/24/2012: Continued troubleshooting BOP issues; testing; and locating equipment to reface forward door seal surface on BSR. Began installation of Riser Running Tool (RRT) upgrades.

07/25/2012: Preparing BOP for upcoming seal refacing on BSR cavity. 

07/26/2012: Preparing BOP for upcoming seal refacing on BSR cavity. Performed riser running tool software upgrade.

07/27/2012: Preparing BOP for upcoming seal refacing on BSR cavity. Performed NOV software upgrades on RRT and troubleshooting same.

07/28/2012: Preparing BOP for upcoming seal refacing on BSR cavity. NOV performing upgrades on drilling equipment.

"},{"   ":18,"WELL_NAME":"  001a","API12":608124007600,"WAR_START_DT":"2012-07-29","TEXT_REMARK":"07/29/2012: Prepared BOP for milling operations and installed mill and jig. Installed nitrogen bottles in U-deck port moon pool area. Continued to upgrade and service drilling equipment control system.

07/30/2012: Performed 1st pass with mill on BOP. Continued to upgrade and service drilling equipment control system.

07/31/2012: Made 2nd and 3rd mill pass on BSR cavity door seal. Continued to upgrade and service drilling equipment control system.

08/01/2012: Completed milling operations on BOP and began installation of choke and kill failsafe valves. Continued to upgrade and service drilling equipment control system.

08/02/2012: Installed both doors on Pipe Ram #1 and forward Casing Shear Ram door on BOP. Continued to upgrade and service drilling equipment control system.

08/03/2012: Installed Aft Casing Ram Door and Aft Blind Shear Ram door. Functioned drilling equipment.

08/04/2012: Installed forward Blind Shear Ram and performed BSR pressure test. Continued to upgrade and service drilling equipment control system.
"},{"   ":19,"WELL_NAME":"  001a","API12":608124007600,"WAR_START_DT":"2012-08-05","TEXT_REMARK":"08/05/2012: Installed accumulator Bottles. Re-torqued flange bolts. Continued to upgrade and service drilling equipment control system.

08/06/2012: Installed accumulator piping; latched LMRP onto BOP; and performed full function test. Continued to upgrade and service drilling equipment control system.

08/07/2012: Perform BOP pressure test with 4-1/2" and 6-5/8" DP. Continued to upgrade and service drilling equipment control system.

08/08/2012: Tested top outer fail-safes; isolation valves and mud boost valve on BOP. Drift tested BOP. Replaced faulty flow meter on Yellow Pod. Conducted acoustic function test. Rigged up riser running/handling equipment. Picked up pup joint and slick joint of riser.

08/09/2012: Completed function testing BOP using ROV Hot Stab (Good). Performed EHBS test (Good). Performed EDS #3 Dry Fire (Good). Performed soak test on BOP. Replace leaking (CCSV) valves. Rebuilt and replaced wellhead connector regulators. Resumed soak test.

08/10/2012: Complete BOP soak test. Transport BOP to well center. Make up riser to BOP; run two riser joints and perform test. Run BOP on riser to 373'.

08/11/2012: Continue to run BOP on riser to 1453'. Troubleshoot Yellow Pod regulator on Upper Annular. Ran 5 riser joints to 1903'. Troubleshoot/analyze data on Yellow Pos Upper Annular regulator. Continue running BOP on riser to 3613'.
"},{"   ":20,"WELL_NAME":"  001a","API12":608124007600,"WAR_START_DT":"2012-08-12","TEXT_REMARK":"08/12/2012: Continue to run BOP on riser from 3;613' to 6;174'. Pressure test choke and kill line as required; 250 psi low and 10;000 psi high for 5 minutes on chart; as well as two conduit and mud boost lines to 5;000 psi for 5 minutes on chart. M/U slip jnt and landing jnt. M/U drape hoses. 
NOTE: Troubleshoot and stop leak on EHBS; while running the BOP; the EHBS system was set in "block" instead of "disarm" mode allowing hydrostatic pressure to shift the SPM valve where control fluid was constantly filling the EHBS accumulator and venting at the EHBS SPM valve. When the SPM valve was shifted from "block" to "disarm"; the venting fluid stopped.

08/13/2012: Land and latch BOP to Coronado 2 wellhead. Tested WH connector with 100k overpull on both Yellow and Blue pods. Conduct acoustic test and tested BSR to verify closed by acoustic test. Pressure tested 22" casing against BSR to 250 psi low for 5 min. and 3;100 psi for 30 min. Conduct EHBS test. Pick up and install diverter. Conduct ERA test.

08/14/2012: Rigged down riser running equip. Cleaned out diverter pollution pan and seal. Performed mechanical bearing test. Changed out wash pipe. Ran in the hole BOP test plug. Tested choke manifold to 250 psi/ 10;000 psi

08/15/2012: Set test plug in wellhead and performed accumulator draw down test. Ending pressure was 2;100 psi. Recovery time was 2 min 15 sec. Tested BOPs with seawater on 6-5/8" drill pipe. Tested annulars to 250 psi low/ 7;000 psi high for 5 minutes each. Tested rams to 250 psi low/ 10;000 psi high for 5 minutes each. Performed ROV function on middle pipe ram. Closing time was 7.5 minutes. Successful test on ram to 10;000 psi. Ram was opened with the proper gallon count of 8 gallons.  Functioned diverter and overboard valves. Closing time on diverter was 53 seconds. Unseated test plug and tripped out of the hole. Functioned BSR and CSR on Blue and Yellow pods from Toolpusher's panel. 

08/16/2012: Continued tripping out of the hole with test plug. Slip and cut drill line. Trip in the hole with 18-1/8" x 21" BHA. Displaced choke; kill and mud boost lines with 10.6 ppg SBM. Continued to trip in the hole and tagged top of cement at 11;068'.

08/17/2012: Displaced choke and kill manifold and wellbore with 10.6 ppg SBM. Took SCRs and CLFs. Performed choke drill. Drilled shoe track.

08/18/2012: Drill 13 ft new formation (11;272' MD). Circulated and conditioned mud to bring bottoms up into the riser. Performed LOT (test pressure 770 psi; EMW = 11.9 ppg). Drilled ahead with 18-1/8" x 21" rotary steerable BHA to 11;531'. Experienced 34 bbls lost circulation while drilling. Shut down pumps and monitored well. Lost 2.3 bbls in 30 minutes.
"},{"   ":21,"WELL_NAME":"  001a","API12":608124007600,"WAR_START_DT":"2012-08-19","TEXT_REMARK":"08/19/2012: Spotted 100 bbl Loss Circulation Mud pill on bottom for losses. Circulated above pill; staging pumps to drilling rate. Losses stopped. Drilled 18-1/8" x 21" hole from 11;531' to 11;905'. Occasionally stopped and cleaned cuttings from auger.

08/20/2012: Drilled from 11;905' to 12;017'. Weighted up from 10.7 to 11.1 ppg for hole conditions. Continued drilling to 12;098'.

08/21/2012: Drilled ahead from 12;098' to 12;126' followed by circulating and cleaning hole. POOH from 12;126' to 550'.

08/22/2012: Continued POOH from 550' to surface with 18-1/8" x 21" BHA. TIH with 18-1/8" x 21" clean-out assembly. Opened 18-1/8" hole to 21" from 11;997' to 12;110'.
 
08/23/2012: Swept and circulated the hole clean. Spotted 16.0 ppg pad mud in rat hole and began POOH with 18-1/8" x 21" clean-out BHA.

08/24/2012: Finished POOH with clean-out 18-1/8" x 21" BHA. Began rigging up to run 17-7/8" x 18" liner. Made decision to rig down casing equipment to secure well for T.S. Isaac. Picked up 18-1/8" x 21" BHA; BOP Test Tool; and Dual Cam followed by TIH to 10;407'.

08/25/2012: TIH and landed the BOP Test Tool in the HPWH placing the 18-1/8" bit 258' from the 22" casing shoe; tested BOP test tool against closed annular preventer to 250/1000 psi for 5 min to verify seal. Opened annular; released the Dual Cam tool; and picked up above the BOP stack. Closed the upper VBR and BSR for storm suspension. Tripped out of the riser with landing string. Displaced riser and surface lines to seawater. Rigged up to pull riser and prepared to unlatch LMRP. Unlocked and laid down the diverter; and rigged up the landing joint. 
"},{"   ":22,"WELL_NAME":"  001a","API12":608124007600,"WAR_START_DT":"2012-08-26","TEXT_REMARK":"08/26/2012: Lay down the diverter. Picked up the Landing Joint as well as closed and lock the slip joint. Unlatched the LMRP and rig down goose necks and drape hoses. Pulled riser 6;142' - 5;143'.

08/27/2012: Pulled riser from 5;143' to surface; disconnected the LMRP from riser and latched sea fasteners. The Santa Ana is underway to avoid Tropical Storm Isaac.

08/28/2012: Santa Ana in transit to avoid Hurricane Isaac and afterwards set to arrive back to Coronado 2 well location. Placed LMRP in setback area and began work scope for LMRP.

08/29/2012: Santa Ana in transit back to location at Walker Ridge 98 and waiting on weather in order to run riser. Performed general maintenance; housekeeping; slip and cut drill line; and commenced subsea workscope for LMRP. 
 
08/30/2012: Santa Ana in dynamic positioning mode; 500 feet from Coronado 2 well location. Completed work scope on the LMRP and transported the LMRP from setback area to well center. Picked up riser double and ran LMRP to 193'. Prepared to pressure test riser lines.

08/31/2012: Santa Ana in dynamic positioning mode; 500 feet from Coronado 2 well location. Ran riser from 193' to 4;333'. 

09/01/2012: Ran riser from 4;333' to 6;053'. Ran telescopic joint; installed and tested moonpool drape hoses. Moved the Santa Ana to 100 feet from Coronado 2 well location. ROV removed Temporary Abandonment cap; replaced VGX-2 gasket on BOP LMRP connector; and returned to surface to make repairs to jetting assembly. 
"},{"   ":23,"WELL_NAME":"  001a","API12":608124007600,"WAR_START_DT":"2012-09-02","TEXT_REMARK":"09/02/2012: Latched LMRP onto BOP. Test riser connector with 50 klbs overpull on Blue & Yellow pod. Installed diverter. Displaced BOP; Riser; Choke; Kill & Boost Lines to 11.1 ppg SBM. 

09/03/2012: Screwed into Dual Cam tool; pressure tested across tool; unscrewed due to failed high test at 1;000 psi. Troubleshoot BOP fault on Blue pod. Lower annular would not open on Blue POD. Open lower annular on Yellow pod. Re-stab Dual Cam. Close upper annular. Make up Dual Cam tool and pressure tested across tool; unscrewed due to failed test high at 460 psi due to Dual Cam seals leaking. Pull out of hole and re-dress Dual Cam tool with new seals. Trip in hole to 3;814'. (Perform diverter function test). 

09/04/2012: TIH and make up Dual Cam tool. Closed annular and tested riser connector to 250 psi/ 6;300 psi for 5 minutes. TOH with Dual Cam tool. P/U wear sleeve and TIH with 18-1/8" x 21" BHA. Perform drawdown test on BOPs with Blue pod from Driller's panel. Rig up lines and attempt to test BOPS with test ram.

09/05/2012: Unsuccessful attempt to test BOPs utilizing test rams from Toolpusher's panel on Blue pod. TOH from 10;555' to 4;340'. Lay out wear sleeve and TIH with Dril-Quip BOP Test Tool to 10;860'.

09/06/2012: Landed BOP Test Tool @ 6;202' (10;865' bit depth). Test BOPs on 6-5/8" DP at 250 psi/ 8;100p si with 11.1 ppg SBM on pipe rams (equivalent to 7900 psi with 11.5 ppg as in APD) and 250 psi/ 6;500 psi on annulars with 11.1 SBM (equivalent to 6300 psi with 11.5 ppg MW) on Toolpusher's panel; Blue pod for 5 min per BSEE & CVX. POOH with BOP Test Tool. M/U double dutch stand and test top drive upper/lower IBOPs.

09/07/2012: Continue testing upper/lower IBOPs and Kelly hose. TIH with 18-1/8" x 21" to 11;791'. Function test BOPs from Driller's Panel; Blue pod. Wash and ream from 11;791' to TD 12;126'. Circulate and condition mud.

09/08/2012: TOH from 12;126' to surface and rack back 18-1/8" x 21" BHA. Repair Pipe Handler. Rig up Frank's casing equipment to run 18" casing. 
"},{"   ":24,"WELL_NAME":"  001a","API12":608124007600,"WAR_START_DT":"2012-09-09","TEXT_REMARK":"09/09/2012: Rigged up 17-7/8" x 18" casing equipment. Ran 34 joints 17-7/8" x 18" casing and inner string on 6-5/8" drill pipe from surface to 8;964'. Functioned diverter bag.

09/10/2012: TIH with 17-7/8" x 18" liner. Landed liner hanger in 18" SA and cemented in place. Pumped 110 bbls (617 cu ft) of 16.4 ppg Class H cement. Displaced cement with 11.1 ppg SBM to leave 27 bbls in shoe track; and calculated TOC in the annulus at 11;399' MD/TVD. A total of 447 bbls lost to formation during cement job (569 bbls pumped total). Set hanger and seal assembly and pressure tested same to 2;550 psi with 11.1 ppg SBM. Released from hanger and POOH with landing string to surface.

09/11/2012: Slipped and cut drill line. Tested casing and BSR to 250/2550 psi with 11.1 ppg SBM (equivalent of 2300 psi with 11.5 ppg SBM as in APD). Displace riser; choke; kill and boost lines to 11.5 ppg SBM. TIH to 10;735' MD/TVD with the 16-1/2" x 19" BHA.

09/12/2012: Continue TIH and tagged TOC at 12;012' MD/TVD. Held a well control choke drill. Displaced well to 11.5 ppg SBM. Drilled cement to 12;103' MD/TVD. Reamed to TD @ 12;126' MD/TVD. Drilled 10' new formation to 12;136' MD/TVD and performed LOT to 802 psi with 11.5 ppg SBM (12.77 ppg EMW). Drilled ahead to 12;261' MD/TVD.

09/13/2012: Drilled ahead with 16-1/2" x 19" BHA to 12;527' MD/TVD; encountered top of salt at 12;350' MD/TVD. TOH to 17-7/8" shoe to repair top drive pipe handler. Installed parts and troubleshot pipe handler software.

09/14/2012: Performed BOP and diverter function tests. Resolved NOV software issue with the pipe handler. TIH and drilled 16-1/2" x 19" hole to 13;488' MD/TVD.

09/15/2012: Increased MW to 11.7 ppg to stay at 85% of overburden gradient. Drilled ahead to 14;066' MD/TVD. Changed out liner seal on #3 mud pump and pot seal on #2 mud pump. Increased MW to 11.9 ppg and continued drilling ahead in salt to 14;970' MD/TVD with 16-1/2" x 19" BHA.
"},{"   ":25,"WELL_NAME":"  001a","API12":608124007600,"WAR_START_DT":"2012-09-16","TEXT_REMARK":"09/16/2012: Drilled to 15;220' weighting up from 11.9 to 12.1 ppg SBM. Circulated and conditioned mud while screening down shakers. Drilled to 15;778' with 12.1 ppg SBM. Changed out valve cap gasket on #1 mud pump. Drilled to section TD at 16;200'. Pumped a 14.1 ppg hi-vis sweep and began to circulate and condition mud for the 16" casing run.

09/17/2012: Pumped weighted hi-vis sweep. Circulated hole clean and conditioned mud for casing and cement. TOH to the 16" SA and washed same. DP yellow alert due to localized weather. TOH and pull the wear sleeve. TOH to BHA and laid down same to 159'.

09/18/2012: Racked back the BHA. Cleaned and serviced the rig floor equipment. R/U casing handling and running equipment. Ran 16" casing to 3;824'.

09/19/2012: Finished running the 16" casing to 9569'. M/U the casing hanger and seal assembly running tool. TIH on 6-5/8" landing string to 12;488'.

09/20/2012: TIH with 16" casing. Landed 16" casing in hanger at 6;453' with shoe at 16;033'. Proper hole displacement while tripping in with casing. Cemented 16" casing with 1224 cu ft cement; 836 cu ft to be left in annulus. Tested annulus seal assembly to 5100 psi; and released running tool. Pumped 187 bbls of 102.1 ppg SBM to flush the landing string. TOH to 1;616'; well taking proper fill.

09/21/2012: Completed POOH with casing hanger running tool. Slip and cut drill line. Tested Choke and Kill manifold. TIH with BOP test tool and seat same. Begin BOP pressure testing. Upper pipe ram failed testing. 

09/22/2012: Completed troubleshooting and testing BOP and surface equipment. Upper and middle pipe rams did not pass high pressure tests. TOH with test plug and BHA. 
"},{"   ":26,"WELL_NAME":"  001a","API12":608124007600,"WAR_START_DT":"2012-09-23","TEXT_REMARK":"09/23/2012: Performed casing test to 3100 psi with 12.1 ppg SBM. TIH with RTTS in preparation to pull BOP for repair. Set RTTS at 7;570'. Performed positive test on RTTS to 1;200 psi.

09/24/2012: Performed negative test on RTTS to 1;200 psi. Displaced riser and BOP to seawater. TOH. Rig up for riser and BOP pull.

09/25/2012: Continue rigging up riser equipment. Picked up landing joint and unlatched BOP. Secured tensioner ring and removed goosenecks. Laid out landing joint; slip joint; pup joint; slick joint. Pulled riser from 5;943' to 3;343'.

09/26/2012: Pulled BOP from 3;343' to surface. Transported BOP to setback area. Installed 6-5/8" test joint. Performed function test.

09/27/2012: Completed function testing BOP. Split BOP/LMRP. Opened Ram #'s 1; 2;3 and 4. Completed wet mate repair. Troubleshoot upper annular regulator issue.

09/28/2012: Tested upper annular regulator. Installed 5" x 7" VBR rams and 6-5/8" fixed rams. Reconnected surface accumulator. Prepared to change lower annular open solenoid. Began changing BOP fluid from stack magic to Erifon 603.

09/29/2012: Continued changing BOP fluid. Cleaned and inspected stabs connectors. Removed SEA domes on Blue pod. Overhauled hydraulic swivel on hotline. Checked surface accumulator pre-charges. Installed ram door face seals. Greased ram cavities. Set up to pressure test SEA dome seals.
"},{"   ":27,"WELL_NAME":"  001a","API12":608124007600,"WAR_START_DT":"2012-09-30","TEXT_REMARK":"09/30/2012: Completed pressure testing subsea electronic dome seals. Completed vacuum test on Blue pod compensated chamber. Closed Accumulator rack on BOP and installed relevant piping. Refilled comp. chamber with di-electric fluid. Replaced the increase chamber compensated Solenoid Valve for Riser Connector Regulator on the Yellow pod.

10/01/2012: Stack LMRP on to BOP. Functioned VBR rams on 5" and 6-5/8" test joints. Conducted Accumulator drawdown test. Began stump testing BOP as per program.

10/02/2012: Stump testing BOP as per program.

10/03/2012: Completed Stump testing BOPs. While preparing to skid BOP to centerline; a leak was discovered on the Blue pod gripper assembly. Prepare to split stack to make repairs on the Blue pod gripper assembly.

10/04/2012: Rebuild Blue pod gripper; function test and reinstall. Prepare and stack up LMRP/BOP. Fill BOP with water. Test choke & kill stabs and LMRP connector.

10/05/2012: Transported BOP to Well Center. Lifted off transporter. Zeroed slope indicators and recalibrated load pin weight indicator. Splashed BOPs at 04:30 hrs. Ran riser to 193'. Tested C&K to 250 psi Low/ 10;000 psi High. Tested Boost Line and BOP system conduits to 5;000 psi. Ran riser from 193' to 3;073' (34 of 66 jts). Tested C&K to 250 psi Low/ 10;000 psi High. Tested Boost Line and BOP system conduits to 5;000 psi.

10/06/2012: Tested C&K to 250 psi Low/ 10;000 psi High. Tested Boost Line and Rigid Conduits to 5;000 psi. Ran riser from 3;073' to 4;423' (49 of 66 jts). Tested C&K Lines; Boost Line and Rigid Conduits. Ran riser from 4;423' to 6;053' (66 of 66 jts + 2 pups). Tested C&K Lines; Boost Line and Rigid Conduits. Made up slip joint and landing joint.
"},{"   ":28,"WELL_NAME":"  001a","API12":608124007600,"WAR_START_DT":"2012-10-07","TEXT_REMARK":"10/07/2012: Installed and tested drape hoses. Positioned rig over wellhead; landed stack and latched connector. Tested connector to 1;000 psi. Flushed conduits; scoped out slip joint; and installed diverter. Rigged down riser handling equipment. Tripped in the hole with the BOP Test Plug Assembly to 6;271'.

10/08/2012: Tripped in with BOP Test Plug. Landed in wellhead and pressure tested BOPs on 6-5/8" drillpipe. Tested wellhead connector; rams; related failsafes and surface equipment to 250 psi/ 10;000 psi with 8.6 ppg seawater. Tested Upper and Lower Annulars; related failsafes and Kelly hose from 250 psi to 7;000 psi from the Toolpusher's panel Blue Pod. Performed Accumulator Drawdown Test from Toolpusher's panel and Yellow Pod. Pulled out of hole with BOP Test Plug Assembly. Troubleshoot top drive IBOP valve. Changed elevators inserts on 1000T elevators. Cleaned rotary pollution pan and sealed with foam prior to riser displacement.

10/09/2012: Troubleshoot and resolve leaking diverter flow line seal. Displaced surface lines; choke; kill; boost and riser to 13.0 ppg SBM. Changed out dual actuators IBOP on TDX 1250. Troubleshoot issues with actuators on IBOPs. Successfully tested IBOPs to 10;000 psi. Tripped in hole with RTTS retrieval BHA.

10/10/2012: Retrieved RTTS and 14-1/2" BHA. Performed casing/BSR test to 250/4810 psi with 13.0 ppg SBM in riser and 12.1 ppg SBM below mud line (equivalent to 5100 psi with 12.1 ppg SBM). Began picking up 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" BHA.

10/11/2012: Continued tripping in hole with 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" BHA. Set wear sleeve. Washed down last 2 stands and tagged firm cement with 15 klb at 15;535'. Function tested BOP from the Toolpusher's panel Blue Pod. Performed choke drill from Driller's and remote panel. Established drilling parameters and drilled cement from 15;535' to 15;640'. Displaced well to 13.0 ppg SBM while drilling cement.

10/12/2012: Drilled cement and shoe track. Cleaned out rathole and drilled 10 ft of new formation to 16;210'. Pumped sweep and circulated hole clean. Pulled back into 16" shoe and performed FIT to 15.2 ppg EMW (surface pressure @ 1835 psi with 13.0 ppg SBM). 
NOTE: Received RPD approval from Bobby Nelson for the ram change and update on 28" casing grade (X56).

10/13/2012: Activated reamer and drilled ahead from 16;210' to 16;841'. Tripped out of hole due to low ROP; poor directional control and high vibrations. Circulated bottoms up. Flow checked well at TD; well static. Pulled wet to shoe at 16;020'. Flow checked; well static. Pumped a slug and tripped out of hole to 14;757'.
"},{"   ":29,"WELL_NAME":"  001a","API12":608124007600,"WAR_START_DT":"2012-10-14","TEXT_REMARK":"10/14/2012: POOH from 14;757' to surface. Picked up a new bit and BHA. Functioned Blind Shear Rams and Casing Shear Rams. Tripped back into hole to 5;517'. Slip and cut drill line. 

10/15/2012: Continued TIH; activated and confirmed reamer was open. TIH to section TD. Reamed the last 40' of open hole; established new drilling parameters and drilled 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" hole from 16;841' to 17;279' with 13.2 ppg MW. 

10/16/2012: Drilled 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" hole from 17;279' to 19;229'. Weighted up per plan from 13.2 ppg to 13.8 ppg SBM. 

10/17/2012: Drilled 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" hole from 19;229' to 19;891'. Weighted up per plan from 13.8 ppg to 14.0 ppg SBM. Identified leak in BOP control fluid system. Circulated hole clean and POOH to 10;348' to troubleshoot leak.

10/18/2012: POOH from 10;348' to surface to re-pin wear sleeve. Continued troubleshooting BOP fluid leak. TIH to 6;031'.

10/19/2012: Continued troubleshooting BOP fluid leak. 

10/20/2012: Finished troubleshooting BOP fluid leak. TIH to 15;998' while testing the Choke and Kill manifold. Started BOP test against the Test Rams on 6-5/8" 34# drill pipe to 250/7;300 psi on rams and 250/5;500 psi on annulars with 14.0 ppg SBM; using IPT's SureTec software. Received endorsement from DNV and approval from BSEE to continue operations with mitigations in place to isolate leak.
"},{"   ":30,"WELL_NAME":"  001a","API12":608124007600,"WAR_START_DT":"2012-10-21","TEXT_REMARK":"10/21/2012: Finished BOP test. Open reamer and pull test. TIH and reamed down from 19;635' MD/TVD to 19;891' MD/TVD. Drilled ahead on 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" BHA from 19;891' MD/TVD to 20;622' MD/TVD with 14.0 ppg SBM.

10/22/2012: Continued drilling ahead with 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" BHA from 20;622' MD/TVD to 22;925' MD/TVD with 14.0 SBM.

10/23/2012: Drilled 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" hole section from 22;925' MD/TVD to 23;625' MD/TVD with 14.0 ppg SBM. Attempted to kick off build section at 1.5 deg/100 ft at 23;350' MD/TVD. Unable to build angle with rotary steerable assembly. Circulate bottoms up at 23;625' MD/TVD and POOH to replace PowerDrive.

10/24/2012: Continue to POOH with directional BHA and rack back in derrick. Function BSRs/CSRs. Conduct maintenance on TDX-1250 top drive and slip and cut drill line. RIH with new directional BHA from surface to 6;202' MD/TVD. 

10/25/2012: Continue to TIH from 6;202' MD/TVD to 16;166' MD/TVD and pull test reamer against shoe. TIH from 16;166' MD/TVD to 23;625' MD/TVD. Drilled ahead with 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" directional BHA from 23;625' MD/TVD to 23;884' MD/TVD while building angle as per directional program. 

10/26/2012: Drilled 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" hole from 23;884' MD/TVD to hole section TD at 24;550' MD / 24;535' TVD with 15 deg inclination at 14.4 deg azimuth. Increased mud weight from 14.0 to 14.2 ppg; pumped a high viscosity sweep and circulated and conditioned the well. Performed a short trip from 24;550' MD to 23;925' MD with no overpull or drag observed. Circulated 14.2 ppg bottoms up with short trip gas reaching a maximum of 126 units.

10/27/2012: Spotted a 32-bbl; 16.4-ppg SBM pill in the 14-1/2" rat hole. TOH wet from 24;550' MD to 23;707' MD and pumped a slug. TOH from 23;707' MD to 15;824' MD/TVD and performed a flow check (static). Functioned BOPs and Diverter and then continued POOH from 15;824' MD/TVD to 12;187' MD/TVD. Changed out saver sub on TDX-1250 and continued POOH from 12;187' MD/TVD to surface. Functioned BSRs and CSRs. 
"},{"   ":31,"WELL_NAME":"  001a","API12":608124007600,"WAR_START_DT":"2012-10-28","TEXT_REMARK":"10/28/2012: POOH with 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" BHA from 256' to surface. Rigged up 14" x 13-3/4" liner running equipment and ran 14" 115.53# Q-125 HP SLSF casing from surface to 3;618' MD/TVD.

10/29/2012: Continued to run 14" casing from 3;618' to 6;501' MD/TVD. Crossed over to 13-3/4" 98.58 ppf Q-125 HP SLSF casing and continued RIH to 8;874' MD/TVD. Converted auto-fill floats and displaced 1x casing volume with 14.2 ppg SBM. Continued running 14" x 13-3/4" liner from 9;000' to 9;195' MD/TVD on 6-5/8" 50# drill pipe. Observed mud loss of 690 bbls of 14.2 ppg SBM while RIH.

10/30/2012: Continued running 14" x 13-3/4" casing from 9;195' to 18;427' MD/TVD on 6-5/8" landing string while monitoring losses and filling pipe every 10 stands. Mud loss was 1;276 bbls for day and 1;966 bbls cumulative.

10/31/2012: Continued running 14" x 13-3/4" liner from 18;427' to 22;286' MD/TVD on 6-5/8" landing string while monitoring losses. Mud loss was 506 bbls (2;468 bbls cumulative losses). Noted flowback at 22;286' MD/TVD. Shut in and monitored well. Bled mud in controlled increments. Shut down and monitored pressures each time. Total volume bled back was 375 bbls. Pressure stabilized @ 637 psi on choke. Stripped in hole against closed upper annular from 22;286' to 23;656' MD/TVD while monitoring wellbore. 

11/01/2012: Continued stripping casing to planned depth at 24;390' MD/ 24;381' TVD. Attempted to circulate Drillers Method with no returns. Pumped 201 bbls (1;129 cu ft) 16.4 ppg class H cement with the well shut in. Total fluids loss during cement job was 2;084 bbls. Waited on cement while holding stand pipe pressure and well shut in. Bled off drill pipe to keep stand pipe pressure below 3;400 psi.

11/02/2012: Continued waiting on cement for a total of 24 hours while monitoring well. Bled pressure off to cement unit. Slacked off 350 kips and set hanger @ 15;495' MD/TVD. Circulated bottoms up from hanger through choke; observed max gas of 1;938 units. Conducted stack sweep; opened up and monitored well. Well static. Circulated bottoms up through the riser.

11/03/2012: Continued circulating bottoms up with 14.2 ppg SBM. Laid out cement head and POOH with landing string to 11;670' MD/TVD. Rigged up to test BOPs to 250/7;300 psi on rams and 250/5;500psi on annulars on 6-5/8" 40# DP.
"},{"   ":32,"WELL_NAME":"  001a","API12":608124007600,"WAR_START_DT":"2012-11-04","TEXT_REMARK":"11/04/2012: Tripping out the hole from 11;540' to 4;770' MD/TVD. Tested surface equipment to 250/10;000 psi and function tested blind shear rams and casing shear rams from Toolpusher's panel on Yellow pod; recording times and gal count.

11/05/2012: Completed pressure testing IBOP and choke manifold. POOH from 4;770' to surface; laid out liner running tool. Rigged up casing running equipment for running tieback. TIH with 13-5/8" 88.2 lb/ft HP Q-125 SLSF; and 13-3/4" 98.58 lb/ft HP Q-125 SLSF casing tieback from surface to 6;688' MD/TVD 

11/06/2012: Continued running tieback casing from 6;688' to 9;224' MD/TVD. Made up casing hanger and ran tieback on 6-5/8" 50 lb/ft landing string to 14;316' MD/TVD.

11/07/2012: Continued running 13-5/8" 88.2 lb/ft HP Q-125 SLSF; 13-3/4" 98.58 lb/ft HP Q-125 SLSF casing tieback to 15;345' MD/TVD. Cemented tieback in place with 1025 cu ft of cement in annulus. Set and tested seal assembly 10;000 psi. POOH with landing string and rigged down casing equipment.

11/08/2012: Made up 12-1/4" x 14-1/2" BHA with wear bushing running tool and TIH from surface to set wear bushing in wellhead at 6;201' MD/TVD. POOH to wear bushing running tool and laid down same. Tested casing tieback against BSR with 14.2 ppg SBM to 5;300 psi for 30 min and 5 min BSR test. Functioned BSR and CSR from Driller's panel on Blue pod. Continued TIH with 12-1/4" x 14-1/2" BHA to 6;040' MD/TVD.

11/09/2012: Continued TIH from 6;040' to 14;755' MD/TVD. Washed down to 15;120' MD/TVD and tagged soft cement. Drilled out tieback shoe track to 15;527' MD/TVD. Washed down to 15;838' MD/TVD and circulated bottoms up. Tested surface equipment to 250/10;000 psi. Continued to TIH to 19;511' MD/TVD. 

Note: Friday; November 9; 2012; 1:34 PM: Linday Hubbard (CVX) received an email from Casey Kavanaugh (BSEE Houma District) stating; "Verbal approval granted to test 14x16" liner to 3000psi. Chevron must not drill out until the RPD and revised screening tool is approved."

Note: Friday; November 9; 2012; 3:44 PM: Linday Hubbard (CVX) received an email from Casey Kavanaugh (BSEE Houma District) stating; "Verbal approval is granted to continue operations and drill out of the 14x16 inch liner. A RPD must be submitted to capture running the scab liner. A revised WCST must be included in the RPD."

11/10/2012: Continued TIH from 19;511' to 23;020' MD/TVD. Tested 14" liner and tieback against VBRs to 3;000 psi for 30 min with 14.2 ppg SBM. Tested surface equipment to 250 psi low/ 10;000 psi high. Tested BOPs against 5-7/8" drill pipe and the test ram with 14.2 ppg SBM to 250/8;200 psi for 5 min from Toolpusher's panel; Yellow pod. Tested upper and lower annular preventers against 5-7/8" drill pipe to 250/5;500 psi. Continued to TIH and spaced out to test against 6-5/8" 40# drill pipe to 250/8;200 psi from Toolpusher's panel; Yellow pod. 
"},{"   ":33,"WELL_NAME":"  001a","API12":608124007600,"WAR_START_DT":"2012-11-11","TEXT_REMARK":"11/11/2012: All BOP tests completed. Performed BOP function test from Driller's panel Blue Ppod. Functioned Diverter from Toolpusher's panel. Tipped in hole from 23;404' and tagged cement at 23;975'. Recorded slow pump rates and choke line friction pressure with 14.2 ppg mud. Performed choke drill. Drilled out firm cement. Drilled through shoe at 24;377'. Flow check; well was static. Drilled out rat hole from 24;381' to TD at 24;550'.

11/12/2012: Drilled out 10' of new formation to 24;560' with 14.2 ppg SBM. Pumped 50 bbl Hi-Viscosity sweep. Encountered 30 klb overpull at 24;250' tripping out in preparation for formation integrity test; slacked off weight and pumped to free pipe. Washed and reamed between 24;520' - 24;560'. Tripped out into the shoe; performed a satisfactory flow check. Performed FIT to 2;283 psi; 16.0 ppg equivalent mud weight with 14.2 ppg SBM. Washed and reamed down to 24;516'. Replaced damaged saver sub after threads galled during a connection. Opened reamer at 24;560'. Drilled down to 24;740' and flushed choke and kill line with 14.3 ppg SBM. Circulated out gas from lag depth of 24;621'. Drilled down to 24;860'.

11/13/2012: Drilled to 24;949'. Gamma ray spike at 24;930' MD by PowerDrive (possible base of salt or suture). Performed a flow check and observed 8 bbl flow into trip tank; shut well in at 04:56 hrs. Observed SIDPP = 670 psi and SICP = 675 psi. Weighted surface pits up to 14.9 ppg; pumped at 30 spm using Weight and Wait method. Max gas 1324 units. Continued well kill procedure through the night.

11/14/2012: Continued circulating 14.9 ppg SBM into the well. After second bottoms up with 14.9 ppg MW; gas dropped from 500 to 120 units. Monitored pressures and bled back to mini Trip Tank while weighting up the riser to 14.9 ppg. SICP = 328 psi and SIDPP = 197 psi. Circulated new KWM of 15.1 ppg SBM into the well. Monitored pressures and bled back to the mini Trip Tank while weighting up the riser to 15.1 ppg.

11/15/2012: Swept the stack for any gas below the annular. Monitored well; bled back 1 bbl in 20 mins; then 1 bbl in 10 mins. SICP = 94 psi and SIDPP = 20 psi. Weighted up the active pits to a new KWM of 15.3 ppg and displaced the well while taking returns up the choke and kill lines and through the Mud Gas Separator. Max gas 772 units. Monitored pressures and bled back 1.1 bbls in 1 hour. Swept the stack below the annular for any gas.

11/16/2012: Swept the stack and monitored the well on the riser. Gained 2 bbls in 25 minutes. Weighted up and circulated a new KWM of 15.5 ppg; taking returns up the choke and kill lines. Stopped circulation due to losses. Determined riser cap pressure and loss rate.

11/17/2012: Sweep the stack below the annular. Spotted 610 bbls of 17.5 ppg riser cap in the top of the riser. TOH from 24;910' to 23;233'; monitoring losses and pressures. Displaced riser cap up the riser and added 17.5 ppg to manage losses at 6 bbls/hr.
"},{"   ":34,"WELL_NAME":"  001a","API12":608124007600,"WAR_START_DT":"2012-11-18","TEXT_REMARK":"11/18/2012: Adjusted 17.5 ppg riser mud cap while POOH with 12-1/4" x 14-1/2" BHA from 22;549' to 21;150' MD/TVD. Continued adjusting riser cap as necessary to control losses. Shut in and replace riser cap. Daily Mud Loss Total = 31 bbls.

11/19/2012: Spotted new 17.5 ppg riser cap and POOH from 21;150' to 18;315' MD/TVD. Adjusted riser cap as necessary to control losses. Daily Mud Loss Total = 477 bbls.

11/20/2012: Continue POOH with 12-1/4" x 14-1/2" BHA from 18;315' to 6;424' MD/TVD; adjusting 17.5 ppg riser cap as required. Daily Mud Loss Total = 667 bbls.

11/21/2012: POOH from 6;424' MD/TVD to surface and function tested BSRs and CSRs from Toolpusher's panel; Yellow pod. Slipped and cut drill line. Rigged up 11-7/8" casing equipment. Adjusted 17.5 ppg riser cap as necessary to control losses. Daily Mud Loss Total = 321 bbls.

Note: on 11/21/2012; Justine Bevern (CVX) received verbal approval from Bobby Nelson (BSEE Houma District) to run the 11-7/8" liner shallow and set at 25;050' MD/ 25;012' TVD.

11/22/2012: Adjusted 17.5 ppg riser cap as necessary for running casing. Ran 2;508' of 11-7/8" 71.8 ppf Q-125 HP SLSF casing. Rigged down casing equipment and rigged up landing string equipment. Converted floats and TIH with 11-7/8" liner closed-ended on 6-5/8" drill pipe to 6;653' MD/TVD; monitoring losses and adjusting 17.5 ppg riser cap as needed. Daily Mud Loss Total = 406 bbls.

11/23/2012: Continued TIH with 11-7/8" liner on 6-5/8" drill pipe from 6;653' to 20;410' MD/TVD; monitoring losses and adjusting 17.5 ppg riser cap as needed. Daily Mud Loss Total = 2;350 bbls.

11/24/2012: Tripped in with 11-7/8" liner from 20;410' MD/TVD to 24;912' MD and washed down to 24;949' MD/ 24;917' TVD. Drilled ahead with 11-7/8" liner from 24;949' MD to 25;050' MD/ 25;012' TVD with no returns. Daily Mud Loss Total = 930 bbls (2;982 bbls including drilling). 
"},{"   ":35,"WELL_NAME":"  001a","API12":608124007600,"WAR_START_DT":"2012-11-25","TEXT_REMARK":"11/25/2012: Rigged up and cemented 11-7/8" liner at 25;050' MD. Pumped 236 bbls 16.6 ppg Class H cement slurry. No indication of wiper plugs launching. Did not bump plug. Displaced with calculated volume plus compressibility and ½ shoe track. Attempted to set hanger with no success. Waited on cement for 12 hours with well shut in. Functioned diverter from Driller's panel Yellow pod.

11/26/2012: Continued waiting on cement for 12 hours. Opened and monitored well. Well static. Released 11-7/8" setting tool from hanger. Rigged down cement head. Pulled 2 stands. Rigged up Double Dutch. Attempted to test BOPs. Test rams did not hold. 

11/27/2012: Function tested BOPs. POOH from 22;244' to 21;865' MD/TVD. Added 100 bbls 17.5 ppg to riser cap. Continued pull out of hole (POOH) to 17;920' MD/TVD. Monitored well on trip tank. Observed 0.3 to 0.5 bbl/min gain. Adjusted riser cap by adding 614 bbls of 17.5 ppg SBM. Pumped 25 bbls 17.5 ppg slug in drill pipe. Monitored well - static. POOH to 17;792' MD/TVD and observed inconsistent hole-fill volumes. A total of 1;117 bbls 17.5 ppg mud cap was in riser. Well had 15.3 ppg below mud cap; 15.7 ppg in choke and kill lines; and 15.5 ppg SBM in drill pipe.

11/28/2012: Added riser mud cap to a total of 1;467 bbls 17.5 ppg SBM. Wellhead pressure 5;430 psi. Tripped in from 17;792' to 22;428' MD/TVD (117' above top of 11-7/8" liner); lowering mud cap in the riser as needed to allow for displacement while tripping in. Displaced well over to 15.5 ppg through the choke. Max gas 544 units; and max MW cut to 15.1 ppg. 

11/29/2012: Finished displacing wellbore on choke with 15.5 ppg SBM. Monitor well on trip tank. Well taking 0.5 bbl/hr. Displaced riser with 15.5 ppg and swept BOP stack. Opened well and monitored - well static. Pumped slug and POOH from 22;410' to 12;253' MD/TVD. Total losses: 42 bbls SBM

11/30/2012: POOH to above BOP. Functioned BSR from Driller's panel Yellow pod. Continued POOH and laid out 11-7/8" setting tool. Both cement wiper plugs recovered. Slipped and cut drill line. Made up Versaflex 11-7/8" 2nd trip isolation hanger assembly on landing string and tripped in the hole to 7;768' MD/TVD with proper displacement. 

12/1/2012: Finished tripping with 11-7/8" 2nd trip isolation hanger. Landed out in PBR of the primary 11-7/8" liner hanger (liner top 22;542' MD/TVD) and set the 2nd trip hanger at 22;392' MD/TVD. Performed 5 min diagnostic test on 11-7/8" casing to 1;800 psi with 15.5 ppg SBM to confirm isolation packer set. Pumped slug and POOH to 15;330' MD/TVD. Made up Dril-Quip BOP Test Tool. Tripped in hole to 21;221' MD/TVD with BOP Test Tool.
"},{"   ":36,"WELL_NAME":"  001a","API12":608124007600,"WAR_START_DT":"2012-12-02","TEXT_REMARK":"12/02/2012: Tripped in hole to 21;378'. Landed Dril-Quip BOP test tool in BOP test tool profile. Seated test plug. Pressure tested BOPs from Toolpusher's panel; Blue pod; on 6-5/8" drill pipe; 15.5 ppg SBM; with IPT software. Tested upper/lower annulars to 250 psi/ 5;000 psi. Tested pipe rams; related valves; and surface equipment to 250 psi/ 8;300 psi. Tested choke and kill manifold to 250 psi/ 10;000 psi & 7;500 psi. Kelly hose from 250 psi/ 6;500 psi. Function tested BOPs on Blue pod from Driller's panel. Function tested diverter from the Toolpusher's panel.

12/03/2012: Completed BOP testing at 05:00 hrs. Unseated BOP test tool and pulled out of the hole. Pulled 11-7/8" running tool out of the hole. Racked back 6-5/8" drill pipe. Pulled out of the hole and laid setting tool out. Function tested casing and blind shears. Performed casing test with blind shears to 250 psi/ 1;800 psi for 30 minutes with 15.5 ppg MW. Made up 11-7/8" scab liner lower hanger assembly and tripped in the hole. 

12/04/2012: Tripped in hole with 11-7/8" lower hanger and set same at 16;250'. Tripped out of the hole with liner hanger setting tool and laid down the liner hanger setting tool.

12/05/2012: Ran in 1;553' 11-7/8"; 71.80#; HPQ-125 scab liner casing with Halliburton Versaflex hanger assembly. Stung into anchor assembly TBR at 16;250' with 30 klb down. Closed Allamon diverter and successfully tested. Circulated 15.5 ppg SBM at 2.2 bpm with 1;800 psi. Held pre-job safety meeting on cementing the 11-7/8" scab liner; and commenced cement job.

12/06/2012: Completed cementing the 11-7/8" 71.80 scab liner. Filled entire annulus with 140.9 cu ft of cement. Set the Versaflex hanger at 14;700'. Circulated cement off the top of the liner and boosted the riser. Racked back the Blackhawk cement stand and pumped 2 wiper balls. Functioned BOPs to clean any debris from the ram cavities. Flushed the choke and kill lines. Performed a flow check. Well static. While tripping out of the hole; noticed cement ring in drill pipe box connections. Pumped 3 more wiper balls and circulated two string volumes. Tripped out of hole and broke each connection to check for and remove cement rings from the box. 

12/07/2012: Tripped out of the hole and laid down the 11-7/8" liner hanger setting tool. Function tested Blind Shear Ram from Driller's panel; Blue pod. Tripped in hole with BHA; Dril-quip jet sub; BOP test tool; and Nu Tec 5-7/8" x 6-5/8" test joint. Washed wellhead and landed out in wellhead with BOP isolation test tool. Rigged up chicksans and lined up to test BOPs. Tested BOPs from Driller's panel on Yellow pod. Test with 15.5 ppg SBM. Rams tested to 250/ 8;400 psi; annulars tested to 250/ 5;100 psi; and Kelly hose tested to 250/ 6;500 psi. 

12/08/2012: Completed BOP pressure testing. Function test BOPs on Blue pod from Toolpusher's panel. Unseated the Dril-Quip test plug and pulled out of the hole. Continued pressure testing the choke/kill manifold to 250 psi/ 10;000 psi. Function tested the BSR and CSR from the Toolpusher's panel on the Blue pod. Performed casing test against 11-7/8" scab liner shoe track to 250 psi/ 3;600 psi on the BSR ram.
"},{"   ":37,"WELL_NAME":"  001a","API12":608124007600,"WAR_START_DT":"2012-12-09","TEXT_REMARK":"12/09/2012: Trip drill held with crew D1. Fire and Abandon drill completed. Tripped in the hole with 10-5/8" x 12-1/4" Bottom Hole Assembly. Flow checked the well prior to crossing BHA through the BOP. Tagged 11-7/8" scab liner top at 14;700'. Tagged top of cement in 11-7/8" scab liner at 15;836'. Drilled plugs and upper float collar from 16;108' to 16;114'. Drilled lower float collar at 16;197'; and drilled out of cement at 16;238'.

12/10/2012: Trip drill conducted with crew B1. Performed satisfactory casing test on full wellbore to 1;800 psi. Washed and reamed down to 24;128' MD. Performed negative test to simulate 15.2 ppg SBM. Negative test was satisfactory. Commenced displacing well to 15.2 ppg. 

12/11/2012: Completed displacing well to 15.2 ppg. Tripped out of hole and tripped back in dry. Performed negative test to 14.2 ppg EMW. The well flowed back 0.5 bbls over 1 hour. Performed another negative test to 14.5 ppg EMW. The well was static. Displaced base oil and tagged float collar at 24;829' MD prior to any indications of hard cement.

12/12/2012: Drilled out upper float collar at 24;829' MD and lower float collar at 24;916' MD. Tagged shoe at 25;047' MD/ 25;009' TVD. Drilled out EZCase bit shoe and drilled 10 ft of new formation to 25;060' MD/ 25;019' TVD. Performed flow check for 10 minutes. Well was static. Pumped Hi-Vis sweep and circulated bottoms up.

12/13/2012: Flow checked well. Observed 5 bbls over 5 hrs. Circulated bottoms up to 7;700' MD/TVD; closed lower annular and continued circulating bottoms up through choke and kill lines. Max gas was 265 units. Swept the stack. Circulated and conditioned mud while preparing for LOT. 

12/14/2012: Pit Drill performed on Crew B1. Circulated and conditioned mud. Performed a LOT with 15.2 ppg MW to 521 psi for a 15.6 ppg EMW. Weighted up to 15.4 ppg SBM and began to trip out of the hole to pick up a shoe squeeze assembly. Pumped out of the hole from 25;050' MD to 23;227' MD due to swab effects. Well static on flow checks.

12/15/2012: Performed Diverter function test from Driller's panel - 36 sec to close. BOP function test on Yellow pod from Driller's panel. Trip drill was performed on Crew A1. Pumped out of hole due to swab effects from 25;050' to 18;854' MD/TVD. Flow checked the well multiple times during TOH; hole static on all flow checks. POOH without pumping from 18;854' MD/TVD to 10;513' MD/TVD; hole taking proper fill. Note: Lindsay Hubbard (CVX) received 24 hr extension on BSR/CSR function test via e-mail from Bobby Nelson (BSEE Houma District).
"},{"   ":38,"WELL_NAME":"  001a","API12":608124007600,"WAR_START_DT":"2012-12-16","TEXT_REMARK":"12/16/2012: Trip drill performed on Crew B1. Weekly fire drill conducted. Pulled out of the hole with 10-5/8" x 12-1/4" BHA. Slip and cut drill line. Functioned Blind Shear Rams and Casing Shear Rams from Driller's Panel Yellow Pod. Tripped in the hole with 4-1/2" cement stinger with diverter to conduct 11-7/8" shoe squeeze due to a wet shoe track and low LOT.

12/17/2012: Tripped in hole with diverter and cement stinger. Prior to beginning the balanced plug cement job; the drill pipe was exhibiting trapped pressure. Conditioned and circulated B/U until 15.4 ppg SBM was circulated throughout the wellbore. 

12/18/2012: Pumped 80 bbls of 16.6 ppg cement and spotted the cement at 25;055'. POOH from 25;055' to 23;528'. Squeezed cement with 1;050 psi and it appeared that no cement squeezed into the formation. Circulated bottoms up; conducted flow check and POOH from 23;528' to 5;122'.

12/19/2012: POOH from 5;122' to surface. Function CSRs/BSRs and flushed Choke and Kill lines. TIH with 10-5/8" Rock Bit & Razorback Scraper cleanout assembly from surface to 5;976'. Slip and cut drill line. TIH with 10-5/8" cleanout assembly from 5;976' to 16;472'. Circulate bottoms up with 15.4 ppg SBM. TIH from 16;472' to 18;923'.

12/20/2012: TIH from 18;923' to 23;941'. Wash and ream from 23;941' to 25;060'. Short trip from 25;023' to 24;150' and began negative test from 15.4 ppg to a 15.0 ppg EMW.

12/21/2012: Finished conducting negative test from 15.4 ppg to 15.0 ppg EMW; then to 14.8 ppg EMW. Circulated bottoms up and POOH from 25;023' to 6;998'.

12/22/2012: Continue to POOH from 16;998' to surface with 10-5/8" cleanout BHA. TIH 10-5/8" x 12-1/4" BHA; jetting sub; test plug and Nutec test tool from 1;325' to 7;247'. Jetted BOPs with 500 gpm; 660 psi and landed out test plug. Rigged up lines and began testing BOPs to 250/8400 psi on the rams and 250/5100 psi on the annulars.
"},{"   ":39,"WELL_NAME":"  001a","API12":608124007600,"WAR_START_DT":"2012-12-23","TEXT_REMARK":"12/23/2012: Tested BOPs on 5-7/8" and 6-5/8" DP to 250/8400 psi on rams and 250/5100 psi on annulars with 15.4 ppg SBM. Functioned BOPs from Toolpusher's panel Yellow Pod. Pull out of hole with BOP test tool. Functioned BSR and CSR from Driller's panel Blue Pod. Tripped in hole with 10-5/8" x 12-1/4" BHA from 919' to 4;117'.

12/24/2012: Continued tripping in hole to 23;229' with proper displacement. Monitored well - static. Displaced choke; kill and boost lines from 15.4 to 14.8 ppg. Continued tripping in hole to 24;808'. Started displacing well from 15.4 to 15.1 ppg to keep ECD below 15.6 ppg.

12/25/2012: Completed cutting mud weight to 15.1 ppg. Removed cracked pinion gear from Drawworks Motor B. Drilled 10' new formation from 25;060' to 25;070' and cut mud weight from 15.1 to 14.8 ppg.

12/26/2012: Performed FIT to 15.6 ppg EMW (16.05 ppg ESD). Drilled from 25;070' to 25;231'. Activated reamer at 25;206' and continued drilling ahead to 25;281'. Circulated out background and connection gas at 25;281' while weighting up to 14.9 ppg. Max gas 3;980 units with max mud weight gas cut to 13.7 ppg. Drilled from 25;281' to 25;542' while weighting up to 15.0 ppg. Circulated out 4;779 units connection gas with max mud weight cut to 13.8 ppg at 25;442'. Drilled to 25;671'. 

12/27/2012: Circulated out background gas at 25;671'. Average gas was 691 units with maximum gas of 1;775 units. Drilled from 25;671' to 26;837' with 15.0 ppg SBM. Max gas was 2;861 units. Max mud weight cut to 14.3 ppg.

12/28/2012: Drilled from 26;837' to 27;575'. Ceased drilling to run Lock Down Sleeve in 14" tieback casing hanger for Worst Case Discharge scenarios. Circulated and raised mud weight from 15.0 to 15.2 ppg; with background gas continuing to run 150-250 units. Decided to increase MW again to 15.4 ppg to reduce background gas and increase trip margin. Began observing losses while circulating 15.4 ppg around. Staged pumps down to stabilize losses and finished circulating 15.4 ppg around. Total losses 231 bbls. 

12/29/2012: Monitored well with pumps shut off. Gained 14 bbls. Brought pumps back on at 320 gpm to stabilize well. Shut down and monitored well on trip tank. Well static after flowing back 64 bbls (78 bbls total). Pumped out of hole at 150 gpm from 27;575' to 22;325'; monitoring displacement. Circulated bottoms up at 22;325' above 11-7/8" liner. Max gas 141 units. Total losses while pumping out and circulating were 178 bbls.
"},{"   ":40,"WELL_NAME":"  001a","API12":608124007600,"WAR_START_DT":"2012-12-30","TEXT_REMARK":"Ongoing MWD/LWD and/or Mudlog Operations 12/30/2012: Performed BOP function test from Driller's panel on Blue pod. Diverter function test performed from Driller's panel. Pulled out of the hole from 22;325' MD to 3;089' MD. Crew A1 and E1 performed a trip drill. Function test on blind and casing shear rams from Driller's Panel on Blue pod. Made up and tripped in the hole from 3;089' MD to 6;663' MD with the Multi-Purpose Tool for wear bushing removal. Weekly fire drill was conducted.

12/31/2012: Continued TIH to 9;242' MD and pulled the wear sleeve out from the wellhead. Tripped out of the hole to 6;534' MD and activated the PBL to wash the wellhead profile. Deactivated the PBL and continued to trip out of the hole to surface. Tripped in the hole with dumb iron bottom hole assembly and lead impression tool (LIT) to 3;438' MD. 

01/01/2013: Continued TIH with LIT to 8;327' MD; landed and activated LIT. Retracted LIT; pumped a slug and POOH from 8;327' MD to 2;181' MD and laid out LIT. Made up lock down sleeve (LDS); confirmed spaceout; and TIH from 2;181' to 8;296' MD. Landed and set the LDS in the wellhead and pulled out of the hole from 8;327' MD to surface. Rigged up wireline on the rig floor and prepared for wireline run #1 (of 4).

01/02/2013: Ran wireline into hole for run #1 with HP-MSIP; HP-Dual OBMI; HTGC; GPIT tools. Pulled wireline out of the hole and rigged up tools for run #2. Ran wireline into the hole for run #2 with ZAIT; HLDS; and QCNT tools.

01/03/2013; Completed wireline run #2. Ran in the hole with wireline run #3 MDT tool. 

01/04/2013: Crew E1 performed a trip drill. Completed run #3; with the MDT tool. Commenced run #4 with HP-MSCT

01/05/2013: Crew E1 performed a trip drill. Coring tool motor drew too much current to operate properly. Pulled out of the hole with HP-MSCT and changed out for back up tool. Ran in the hole; collected 50 sidewall core samples and pulled out of the hole - 39/50 successful cores. Rigged down wireline and function tested Blind Shear Rams and Casing Shear Rams from the Driller's panel on the Blue pod. 
"},{"   ":41,"WELL_NAME":"  001a","API12":608124007600,"WAR_START_DT":"2013-01-06","TEXT_REMARK":"01/06/2013: Crew D performed a pit drill. Function tested Blind Shear Rams/Casing Shear Rams from the Toolpusher's panel on the Yellow pod. Made up Dril-Quip special BOP test tool (SBOPTT) and Nominal Bore Protector (NBP). Tripped into the hole. Landed and set NBP and SBOPTT. Function tested diverter from the Driller's control panel. Commenced BOP pressure test with 15.4 ppg SBM on 5-7/8" drill pipe. Annulars tested to 250/5;100 psi; rams tested to 250/8;400 psi; kelly hose tested to 250/6;500 psi. Performed BOP function test from Toolpusher's panel on the Yellow pod. Weekly fire drill conducted.

01/07/2013: Completed BOP pressure test on the 5-7/8" drill pipe and POOH with SBOPTT. Made up SBOPTT; and Dual Cam on 6-5/8" drill pipe. Pressure tested choke and kill manifold to 250/7;500psi and 10;000psi. Tripped in hole and landed the SBOPTT and tested BOPs from the Toolpusher's Panel on the Yellow pod. Test performed with 15.4 ppg SBM. Rams tested to 250/8;400 psi. Function tested BOPs from the Driller's panel on the Blue pod. Dropped the dart; released the Dual Cam and performed Blind Shear Ram pressure test at 250/3;600 psi from Toolpusher's panel; Yellow pod. Made up string to Dual Cam; fished the dart and tripped out of hole to surface. 

Note: Obtained approval from Bobby Nelson (BSEE Houma District) on 01/07/13 for 48 hr casing test extension in order to get liner run and cemented in place. New due date: 01/11/13 at midnight.

01/08/2013: Crew D1 performed a trip drill. Functioned diverter from Driller's panel and Toolpusher's panel. Slipped and cut drill line. Functioned blind and casing shear ram from the Driller's panel on the Blue pod. Made up and RIH with 2;7425 ft of 9-3/8" casing on a Halliburton Versaflex liner hanger from surface to 8;645' MD on 5-7/8" x 6-5/8" landing string.

01/09/2013: Crew E1 Held trip drill. Continued to TIH with 9-3/8" liner on 5-7/8" x 6-5/8" landing string from 8;645' MD to 27;570' MD/ 27;120' TVD. Dropped surge tool conversion ball and converted and tested surge tools. Brought pumps up to 7 bpm and converted auto-fill float equipment. Mixed and pumped 118 bbls of 16.6 ppg Class H lead slurry followed by 117 bbls of 16.6 ppg Class H tail slurry. Total slurry pumped: 249 bbls/ 1398 cu ft; total annular volume of cement: 154 bbls/ 864 cu ft. Displaced cement with 15.4 ppg SBM with approx 25% returns throughout job. Bumped top plug and pressured up to expand Versaflex liner hanger. Cement in place at 23:45 hrs. 

01/10/2013: Verified hanger was set with 100 klb overpull and released hanger running tool. Racked back cement head and circulated bottoms up to below the stack. Shut the lower annular and circulated out the choke - max gas of 250 units. Swept the stack and opened up lower annular; pumped a slug and pulled out of the hole from 24;346' MD to 10;352' MD.

01/11/2013: Continued POOH from 10;352' MD to surface. Picked up 8-1/2" drilling BHA and tripped into the hole to 2;343'. Slipped and cut drill line and attempted casing test at 1;900 psi with 15.4 ppg SBM. The test pressure broke over at 1;300 psi. Function tested the diverter from the Driller's panel and Toolpusher's panel. TIH to obtain MWD surveys between 7;090' to 7;590' while WOC. Tripped out of the hole to 5;631' in preparation to repeat casing test.

Note: Obtained approval from Bobby Nelson (BSEE Houma District) on 01/11/13 for an additional 48 hr casing test extention to WOC following failed initial test. New due date: 01/13/13 at midnight. Achieved good 30 min test on 01/12/13.

01/12/2013: Closed Blind Shear Rams from the Driller's panel on the Blue pod. Preformed Casing and Blind Shear Ram pressure tests to 250/1900 psi with 15.4 ppg SBM. The test was satisfactory. Tripped in hole with 8-1/2" drilling BHA from 5;631' MD to 9;342' MD. The drill pipe float would not convert. Tripped out of the hole to surface and changed the float.	
"},{"   ":42,"WELL_NAME":"  001a","API12":608124007600,"WAR_START_DT":"2013-01-13","TEXT_REMARK":"01/13/2013: Completed weekly fire drill. Crew E1 performed a trip drill. Function tested the Blind and Casing Shear Rams from the Toolpusher's panel on the Yellow pod. Tripped in hole with 8-1/2" drilling BHA from surface to 26;998' MD and float converted; last 11 stands were left dry. Performed a cased hole negative test to 14.8 ppg equivalent mud weight. 

01/14/2013: Crew E1 performed a choke drill. Function tested the BOPs from the Toolpusher's panel on the Yellow pod. Function tested the diverter from the Driller's panel. Cut mud weight from 15.4 ppg to 15.1 ppg. Drilled out the plugs and float collar from 27;323' to 27;327' MD with the 8-1/2" drilling BHA. Began cutting mud weight back to 14.8 ppg while drilling shoe track. Drilled out of shoe and drilled another 10 feet to 27;585'. Pumped a 14.8 ppg high viscosity sweep to prepare for the leak off test.

01/15/2013: Performed leak off test to 1300 psi with 14.8 ppg MW to achieve a 15.7 ppg EMW surface (16.12 ppg EMW downhole). Drilled ahead with 8-1/2" RSS BHA from 27;585' to 28;187' at 36 deg inclination; with 14.8 ppg MW. 

01/16/2013: Continued to drill from 28;187' to 28;801' MD with 8-1/2" RSS BHA at 36 deg inclination; 14.8 ppg MW; 396 gpm; 15.5 ppg ECD. Troubleshot and repaired upper proximity switch for main traveling block.

01/17/2013: Continued to drill ahead from 28;801' to 29;465' MD with 8-1/2" RSS BHA at 36 deg inclination; 14.8 ppg MW; 396 gpm; 15.5 ppg ECD; 30-40 fph average ROP.

01/18/2013: Continued to drill ahead from 29;465' to 30;005' MD with 8-1/2" RSS BHA at 36 deg inclination; 14.8 ppg MW; 396 gpm; 15.5 ppg ECD; 30 fph average ROP. Obtained stethoscope reading at 29;342' MD and achieved a 14.92 ppg downhole EMW.

01/19/2013: Continued to drill ahead from 30;005' to 30;401' MD with 8-1/2" RSS BHA at 36 deg inclination; 14.8 ppg MW; 396 gpm; 15.6 ppg ECD; 25 fph average ROP. Circulated the hole clean at 396 gpm with 14.8 ppg MW in preparation to POOH for BOP testing.
	
"},{"   ":43,"WELL_NAME":"  001a","API12":608124007600,"WAR_START_DT":"2013-01-20","TEXT_REMARK":"01/20/2013: POOH for BOP testing. Slip and cut 180' of drill line. Functioned CSR and BSR from Driller's panel Blue pod with 21 & 19 second closing time; respectively.

01/21/2013: Functioned diverter from Toolpusher's panel (33 sec closing time). BOP testing on 5-7/8" drill pipe at 5300 psi for annulars; 8000 psi for rams; and 10;000 psi for surface equipment using 14.8 ppg SBM. Continued to test BOP equipment on 6-5/8" drill pipe at same pressures. Performed emergency disconnect drill by simulating ship blackout drift-off scenario; crew performance SAT.

01/22/2013: Completed BOP testing; POOH and layed out test assembly. Made up 8-1/2" BHA and TIH from surface to 5;631' MD/TVD. 

01/23/2013: Continued to TIH from 5;631' to 18;833' MD/TVD. Functioned BSR & CSR on Yellow pod from Toolpusher's panel prior to running BHA across BOP stack. 

01/24/2013: Continued to TIH from 18;833' MD/TVD to 30;019' MD. Obtained SCRs and conducted MAD pass for LWD. Tagged bottom with BHA at 30;401' and drilled ahead with 14.8 ppg mud (~15.6 ECD) to 30;690' MD.

01/25/2013: Drilled ahead with 8-1/2" RSS BHA from 30;690' MD to 31;000' MD and circulated bottoms up to check lithology with cuttings samples. Continued drilling ahead to 31;093' MD with 14.8 ppg MW.

01/26/2013: Continued drilling ahead with 8-1/2" RSS BHA from 31;098' MD to 31;532' MD and circulated bottoms up to verify lithology with cuttings samples.
	"},{"   ":44,"WELL_NAME":"  001a","API12":608124007600,"WAR_START_DT":"2013-01-27","TEXT_REMARK":"01/27/2013: Continued drilling ahead with 8-1/2" RSS BHA and 14.8 ppg mud weight (~15.56 ECD) from 31;585' to 31;866' MD. Stopped drilling to circulate bottoms up and check cuttings for TD markers.

01/28/2013: Circulated wellbore for wireline logging operations. Began POOH from 31;866' MD (30;580' TVD) to 30;399' MD while taking stethoscope readings on open hole section.

01/29/2013: Completed stethoscope formation pressure readings and continued POOH from 30;399' MD to surface. Performed a trip drill with Crew B1 and Crew A1. Function tested the BOPs on 6-5/8" drill pipe from the Toolpusher's Panel on the Yellow pod. Function tested the diverter from the Toolpusher's panel. Functioned the Blind and Casing Shear Rams from the Toolpusher's panel on the Yellow pod.

01/30/2013: Rigged up wireline equipment and completed wireline run #1: cement evaluation (MSIP/IBC). Pulled cement evaluation tools out of the hole. Picked up and ran in the hole with tools for wireline run #2: dip and image tools (HTGC/GPIT/HP-MSIP/Dual OBMI) in the hole. Took weight at 27;676' - wireline tools unable to pass. POOH with wireline run #2 for wiper trip. No logging was performed on run #2.

01/31/2013: Made up 8-1/2" wiper trip BHA. Tripped in hole with the same from surface to 26;997' MD.

02/01/2013: Crew B1 performed a trip drill. Tripped in hole to the base of the 9-3/8" liner shoe. Broke circulation prior to entering the open hole. Tripped in to 30;000' and logged down to 30;342'. TIH from 30;342' MD to 30;950' MD; then broke circulation and logged from 30;950' MD to 31;866'. Pumped weighted sweep and observed partial losses; reduced flow rate to stabilize losses. Performed a flow check; and the well was static. POOH from 31;866' to 29;834' MD with proper fluid displacement. Decision made to TA well pending replacement of LMRP bolts per BSEE Safety Alert #303.

02/02/2013: Crew A1 performed a trip drill. Continued to POOH with the 8-1/2" BHA from 29;834' MD to surface and laid down the same. TIH with 4-1/2" cement stinger; 9-3/8" and 11-7/8" scraper assemblies from surface to 5;847' for TA operations.
"},{"   ":45,"WELL_NAME":"  001a","API12":608124007600,"WAR_START_DT":"2013-02-03","TEXT_REMARK":"02/03/2013: Crew B1 performed a trip drill. Function tested the Blind and Casing Shear Rams from the Toolpusher's panel on the Blue pod. Weekly fire drill was completed. Tripped in the hole with 4-1/2" cement stinger; 9-3/8" scraper assembly; and 11-7/8" scraper assembly from 5;847' to 31;787' MD. Circulated 1.5 drill pipe volumes with 14.8 ppg SBM. Began pumping spacer for Cement Plug #1.

02/04/2013: Spotted a 75 bbl (421 cu ft) cement plug across hydrocarbon bearing zone from 31;850' to 30;850'. POOH to 28;570' and spotted a 75 bbl (421 cu ft) cement plug from 28;570' to 27;570'. Circulated bottoms up and pulled out of the hole.

02/05/2013: Tripped out of the hole from 27;530' MD to surface with cement stinger. Made up and tripped in the hole with the 9-3/8" EZSV from surface to 9;774' MD/TVD. Function tested the diverter from the Driller's panel. BOPs function tested from the Toolpusher's panel on the Blue pod on 6-5/8" drill pipe.

Note: Lindsay Hubbard (CVX) received a waiver from Bobby Nelson (BSEE) on 02/05/2013 to not perform a BOP pressure test while preparing to TA the well. The pressure tests will be required prior to returning to operations.

02/06/2013: Tripped out of the hole to above the BOP stack and function tested Blind and Casing Shear Rams from the Driller's panel on the Yellow pod. Trip drill performed with crew A1. Slipped and cut drill line. Tripped in the hole from 5;780' to 27;500' MD and set 9-3/8" EZSV. Tested the EZSV to 1;000' psi for 15 min. 

Note: Approval was received for the temporary abandonment APM from Bobby Nelson (BSEE) on 02/06/2013.

02/07/2013: Spotted a 14 bbl (80.2 cu ft) cement plug on top of EZSV from 27;491' to 27;291'. Tripped out of the hole to 24;895' and spotted a high viscosity pill to 24;700' MD. Spotted a 56 bbl (315 cu ft) cement plug from 24;700 to 24;200' MD. Tripped out to 23;998' MD and circulated bottoms up. Tripped out of the hole to 10;127'

02/08/2013: Tripped out of the hole from 10;127' to surface. Performed a partial blackout/EDS drill. Made up 11-7/8" FASDrill and tripped in the hole from surface to 24;010' MD.

Note: Lindsay Hubbard (CVX) received a waiver on 02/08/2013 to not perform the BSR/Casing pressure test due to the TA'd condition of the well for BOP unlatch. The BSR/Casing test must be performed once returning to operations.

02/09/2013: Set 11-7/8" FASDrill at 24;006'. Spotted a 45 bbl (253 cu ft) balanced cement plug from 23;989' to 23;589'. Tripped out of the hole to 22;200' MD and spotted a high viscosity pill. Tripped out of the hole and spotted a 75 bbl (421 cuft) balanced cement plug from 22;000' to 21;500'. Tripped out of the hole to 20;907' MD and circulated bottoms up.
"},{"   ":46,"WELL_NAME":"  001a","API12":608124007600,"WAR_START_DT":"2013-02-10","TEXT_REMARK":"02/10/2013: Tripped out of the hole from 5;130' to surface with 11-7/8" FASdrill setting tool. Fire and abandon drill completed. Function tested BSRs/CSRs from the Toolpusher's panel on the Yellow pod. Made up 11-7/8" EZSV and tripped in the hole from surface to 15;585' MD/TVD. Set EZSV and tested same to 1000 psi for 15 min. Tripped out of the hole with setting tool to 15;752' MD/TVD.

2/11/2013: Spotted a 23 bbl (129 cu ft) balanced cement plug from 15;572' to 15;372' MD/TVD. Tripped out of the hole to 14;709' MD/TVD and circulated BU. Continued TOH from 14;709' to 2;443'. BOP and Diverter function test performed on 5-7/8" drill pipe from the Driller's panel on the Yellow pod. Made up Special BOP Test Tool and circulating sub and tripped in the hole from surface to 8;524'. Landed out Special BOP Test Tool and commenced a 2;365 psi negative test to simulate displacing 14.8 ppg SBM with seawater to 6;600'.

02/12/2013: Finished successful negative test on 11-7/8" EZSV. TOH with 11-7/8" EZSV setting tool. TIH with riser brush and 4-1/2" diverter to 6;600'. Began displacing surface lines; surface equipment and wellbore from 14.8 ppg SBM to seawater.

02/13/2013: Completed displacement to seawater. Spotted 23 bbls (129 cu ft) balanced surface plug from 6;600' to 6;450' MD/TVD and picked up to 6;276' MD/TVD to circulate bottoms up. POOH from 6;276' to 3;052' and circulated one riser volume. TOH from 3;052' to surface and circulated one riser volume. Cleaned rotary pan and prepared for pulling riser.

02/14/2013: Pulled and laid down diverter. Conducted 100k lbs overpull test on BOP connector. Unlatched BOP and moved ship to safe zone. Installed TA cap and injected preservation fluid into the wellhead. Secured tensioner ring. Disconnected storm loops and coil flex hose lines. 

02/15/2013: Laid out pup joint and slick joint. Began pulling riser and rigging down to the deck. 

02/16/2013: Completed riser pull. Parked BOP at transporter. Commenced rig move workscope.
"},{"   ":47,"WELL_NAME":"  001a","API12":608124007600,"WAR_START_DT":"2013-04-16","TEXT_REMARK":"04/16/2013: Run BOP/Riser from surface to 1;813'.

04/17/2013: Run BOP/Riser from 1;813' to 4;693'.

04/18/2013: Run BOP/Riser from 4;693' to 6;053'. Wait on weather.

Note: Lindsay Hubbard (Chevron) received approval from Bobby Nelson (BSEE) on 04/18/13 to latch up BOPs once weather permits.

04/19/2013: Continued to wait on weather.   

04/20/2013: Picked up slip joint and landing joint. Landed BOP. Installed diverter. Performed mechanical bearing test and E.R.A offset test. Tested failsafe valves on choke and kill lines to 250/ 4600 psi for 5 minutes each with good test.
"},{"   ":48,"WELL_NAME":"  001a","API12":608124007600,"WAR_START_DT":"2013-04-21","TEXT_REMARK":"04/21/2013: Tested BOP acoustic control system by closing BSRs. Tested BSRs to 250/4600 psi for 35 minutes. Performed EHBS function test; functioned BSRs closed and tested to 250/1000 psi for 10 minutes each. Performed diverter flow test and sequence test. Tripped in hole with BOP test tool. Tested BOP rams to 250/10;000 psi and annulars to 250/7;000 psi on 6-5/8" with Toolpusher's Blue pod and seawater. 

04/22/2013: Continue testing BOP on Blue pod from Toolpusher's panel. ROV functioned MVBR 2 and pressure tested to 250/10;000 psi. Function tested BOP with Yellow pod from Driller's panel and performed accumulator drawdown test. Trip out from 6;380' to 6;166'.

Note: Lindsay Hubbard (Chevron) received an email at 5:16 pm from Bobby Nelson (BSEE Houma District) with approval to drill out isolation plugs (up to step 10) of AST.

04/23/2013: Trip out from 6;166' to surface. Slipped and cut drill line and replaced lower manual IBOP on top drive. Tested IBOP to 250/10;000 psi for 5 minutes.
Trip in hole with 12-1/4" BHA to 6;387'. Performed trip drill and secured well in 6 minutes. Functioned BSR and CSR from Driller's panel and Yellow pod. Began displacing riser with 14.8 ppg SBM.

04/24/2013: Completed displacement of riser; choke; kill and boost lines with 14.8 ppg SBM. Trip in hole and wash/reamed surface cement plug from 6;387'to 6;441'. Drilled through surface cement plug from 6;447 to 6;600'. Flow checked and continued reaming hole from 6;600' to 6;767' and performed dynamic flow check. POOH with 12-1/4" BHA from 6;767' to surface. Trip in hole with 10-5/8" x 12-1/4" BHA to 9;884'. Functioned diverter.

04/25/2013: Trip in hole from 9;884' to 11;970'. Drilled cement from 11;970' to 11;980'. Reamed from 11;980' to 12;026'. Trip in hole to 15;374' and performed choke drill with both drill crews. Drilled cement from 15;374' to 15;588' and began drilling EZSV at 15;588'.

04/26/2013: Continued drilling EZSV from 15;588' to 15;592'. Flow Check. Pull out of hole from 15;592' to 4;341' with 10-5/8" x 12-1/4" BHA.

04/27/2013: Tripped out of hole from 4;341' to surface with 10-5/8" x 12-1/4" BHA. Replaced bit; tripped in hole with 10-5/8" x 12-1/4" BHA to 5;238'. Functioned CSR/BSR with Blue pod from Toolpusher's panel. Tripped in hole to 15;591'. Pushed EZSV free. Continued tripping to 19;736'.
"},{"   ":49,"WELL_NAME":"  001a","API12":608124007600,"WAR_START_DT":"2013-04-28","TEXT_REMARK":"04/28/2013: Tripped in hole to 21;122'. Washed down from 21;122' to 21;297'. Reamed and drilled cement from 21;297' to 22;000'. Trip to 22;432'. Reamer would not deactivate. Could not enter 11-7/8" liner top while pumping. Pumped a weighted high viscosity sweep and circulated bottoms up.

04/29/2013: Tripped out of hole with 10-5/8" x 12-1/4" Bottom Hole Assembly to surface.

04/30/2013: Tripped in hole with 10-5/8" PDC. Tagged cement at 22;458' MD and drilled/reamed cement to 23;784' MD.
