05/01/2013: Continued drilling cement from 23;784' MD to 24;005' MD. Drilled 11-7/8" FasDrill cement retainer from 24;005' MD to 24;008' MD. Washed down to the top of 11-7/8" cement plug at 24;275' MD and drilled same to 24;780' MD. Pumped a sweep and circulated bottoms up. Tripped out of hole to 14;094'.

05/02/2013: Washed BOPs and circulated sweep to surface. Tripped out of hole and racked back 10-5/8" BHA. Rigged up Schlumberger wireline and picked up Weatherford's Multi Sensor Caliper (60 arm caliper). Ran in hole with Multi Sensor Caliper to 22;700'. Troubleshoot Multi Sensor Caliper.

05/03/2013: Ran in hole and logged with Weatherford's Multi Sensor Caliper (60 arm caliper) from 24;750' to 6;200'. Pulled out of hole and rigged down wireline. Tested casing and BSRs to 250 psi low; 2;600 psi high with 14.8 ppg mud. Tripped in the hole with 8-1/2" Cleanout BHA to 1;061'.

05/04/2013: Tripped in hole with 8-1/2" Cleanout BHA to 24;753'. Washed and reamed cement to 26;421'.
"},{"   ":50,"WELL_NAME":"  001a","API12":608124007600,"WAR_START_DT":"2013-05-05","TEXT_REMARK":"05/05/2013: Washed and reamed cement from 26;421' MD to 27;506' MD. Tagged top of EZSV at 27;506' MD. Drilled through EZSV and washed and reamed cement to 27;875' MD. 

05/06/2013: Washed and reamed cement from 27;875' MD to 28;370' MD. Pumped a 100 bbl 14.8 ppg Hi-Vis sweep. Circulated bottoms up. Tripped out of hole to 17;056' MD. Began testing BOPs to 250 psi low/ 8400 psi high on 5-7/8" on Yellow pod from Driller's panel. 

05/07/2013: Finished testing BOPs on 5-7/8". Spaced out to test BOPs on 6-5/8". Tested BOPs to 250 psi low/ 8400 psi high with 14.8 ppg mud on Yellow pod from Driller's panel. Function tested BOPs on Blue pod from Toolpusher's panel. Begin tripping out of hole to 10;014' MD. 

05/08/2013: Finished tripping out of hole to surface. Rigged up and ran in hole with 3-1/2" cement stinger to 10;606' MD. 

05/09/2013: Continued to trip in hole with 3-1/2" cement stinger to 27;570' MD. Washed down from 27;570' MD to 28;370' MD. Circulated and pumped 85 bbl Class H 17.0 ppg balanced cement plug (478 cu ft / 473 sks) from 28;370' MD to 27;170' MD. 

05/10/2013: Pulled out of the hole to 26;541' MD. Pumped a 100 bbl sweep and circulated to surface. Continued tripping out of hole to 18;929' MD. Pumped a 100 bbl sweep and circulated to surface. Continued tripping out of hole to 12;903' MD.

05/11/2013: Finished tripping out of hole from 12;903' MD to surface. Picked up and ran in hole with 8.5" PDC and kick off bottom hole assembly. Trip in hole to 5;763' MD.
"},{"   ":51,"WELL_NAME":"  001a","API12":608124007600,"WAR_START_DT":"2013-05-12","TEXT_REMARK":"05/12/2013: Attempt casing pressure test to 2600 psi. Pressured up to 1440 psi and pressure broke over due to soft cement plug. Function tested BSRs and CSRs from Driller's panel on Yellow pod with successful test. Tripped in hole from 5;763' to 27;374' MD. Tagged cement at 27;374' MD. Washed and reamed cement to 27;690' MD. Hole packed off. Jarred pipe free.  

05/13/2013: Pulled out of hole to 27;668' MD. Washed and reamed cement from 27;668' MD to 27;874' MD. 

05/14/2013: Begin tripping out of hole to 27;154' MD. Function tested BOP pipe rams from Driller's panel on Yellow pod. Function tested diverter and upper and lower annular's from Driller's panel. Continue pulling out of hole with 8.5" rotary steerable BHA. Picked up and began tripping in hole with a 8.5" mud motor (1.5° bend) BHA.

05/15/2013: Continue tripping in hole to 5;834' MD. Function tested BSRs and CSRs from Driller's panel on Blue pod with a successful test. Continue tripping in hole to 27;867' MD.

05/16/2013: Washed and reamed cement to 27;915' MD. Began time drilling to kick off sidetrack from 27;915' MD to 27;995' MD. 

05/17/2013: Drilled sidetrack from 27;995' MD to 28;118' MD. Began tripping out of hole from 28;188' MD to 10;433' MD.

05/18/2013: Continue tripping out of hole with 8.5" mud motor BHA to surface. Pick up and began tripping in hole with 8.5" rotary steerable BHA to 2;310' MD. 
"},{"   ":52,"WELL_NAME":"  001a","API12":608124007601,"WAR_START_DT":"2013-05-12","TEXT_REMARK":"05/12/2013: Attempt casing pressure test to 2600 psi. Pressured up to 1440 psi and pressure broke over due to soft cement plug. Function tested BSRs and CSRs from Driller's panel on Yellow pod with successful test. Tripped in hole from 5;763' to 27;374' MD. Tagged cement at 27;374' MD. Washed and reamed cement to 27;690' MD. Hole packed off. Jarred pipe free.  

05/13/2013: Pulled out of hole to 27;668' MD. Washed and reamed cement from 27;668' MD to 27;874' MD. 

05/14/2013: Begin tripping out of hole to 27;154' MD. Function tested BOP pipe rams from Driller's panel on Yellow pod. Function tested diverter and upper and lower annular's from Driller's panel. Continue pulling out of hole with 8.5" rotary steerable BHA. Picked up and began tripping in hole with a 8.5" mud motor (1.5° bend) BHA.

05/15/2013: Continue tripping in hole to 5;834' MD. Function tested BSRs and CSRs from Driller's panel on Blue pod with a successful test. Continue tripping in hole to 27;867' MD.

05/16/2013: Washed and reamed cement to 27;915' MD. Began time drilling to kick off sidetrack from 27;915' MD to 27;995' MD. 

05/17/2013: Drilled sidetrack from 27;995' MD to 28;118' MD. Began tripping out of hole from 28;188' MD to 10;433' MD.

05/18/2013: Continue tripping out of hole with 8.5" mud motor BHA to surface. Pick up and began tripping in hole with 8.5" rotary steerable BHA to 2;310' MD. 
"},{"   ":53,"WELL_NAME":"  001a","API12":608124007601,"WAR_START_DT":"2013-05-19","TEXT_REMARK":"05/19/2013: Tripped in hole with 8.5" rotary steerable BHA from 14;484' to 17;583'. Spaced out on 5-7/8" pipe and began testing BOPs from Driller's panel on the Blue pod to 250/8400 psi with 14.8 ppg mud. Finished testing on 5-7/8" pipe and spaced out to begin testing on 6-5/8" pipe via the Driller's panel and Blue pod. Began testing BOPs to 250/8400 psi.

05/20/2013: Continued testing BOPs on 6-5/8" pipe from Driller's panel on Blue pod. Performed BOP function test from Toolpusher's panel on Yellow pod. Functioned diverter from Toolpusher's panel. Continued tripping in hole with 8.5" rotary steerable BHA from 17;844' to 27;570'. Washed and reamed from 27;570' to 27;915'. Shut down pumps and worked BHA through the sidetrack to ensure stability from 27;915' to 27;960;. Washed and reamed from 27;915' to 28;118'; then drilled from 28;118' to 28;566'.

05/21/2013: Directionally drilled from 28;566' to 29;695'.

Note: J. Freeman and C. Bernard of BSEE visited the rig and performed a drilling inspection. No INCs were issued.

05/22/2013: Directionally drilled from 29;695' to 30;820'.

05/23/2013: Directionally drilled from 30;820' to 31;915'.

05/24/2013: Directionally drilled from 31;915' to 32;025'. Took formation pressures with LWD at 31;770'. Note: At 10:50 hrs; Lindsay Hubbard of Chevron recived e-mail notification from Mr. Bobby Nelson of BSEE granting a 72 hour BSR/CSR function test extension. Continued to directionally drill from 32;025' to 32;429'.

05/25/2013: Directionally drilled from 32;429' to 33;295'.
"},{"   ":54,"WELL_NAME":"  001a","API12":608124007601,"WAR_START_DT":"2013-05-26","TEXT_REMARK":"05/26/2013: Directionally drilled from 33;295' to well TD at 33;522' MD/ 32;864' TVD. Pumped sweep and then performed static influx test. Circulated and conditioned mud and pumped 150 bbl 16.8 ppg hi-vis sweep. Circulated 150 bbls of 16.8 ppg hi-vis sweep at 415 gpm and began to lose mud as sweep was moving up the annulus. Adjusted rate to control losses.

05/27/2013: Continued circulating and conditioning. Losses ceased with 35 bbls total mud lost. TOH and took formation pressures. Function tested diverter from the Driller's panel and function tested BOPs from the Toolpusher's panel on the Blue pod.

05/28/2013: Tripped out of hole from 29;166' to surface. 

05/29/2013: Rigged up wireline and RIH with HTGC/HP-MDT wireline toolstring. Logged and took formation pressures from 27;300' to 33;422' MD.

Note: On 05/29/2013;Lindsay Hubbard (Chevron) received approval from Bobby Nelson (BSEE Houma District) for a 5 day extension on the casing pressure test originally due on 06/02/2013. 
 
05/30/2013: Continued taking pressures with HTGC/HP-MDT between 32;252' and 33;422' MD and took one fluid sample at 32;958' MD. POOH with HTGC/HP-MDT wireline toolstring and RIH with HTGC/HP-MSCT coring tool to 30;948' MD.

05/31/2013: Continued RIH with HTGC/HP-MSTC coring tool from 30;948' to 33;200' MD. Took core samples from 33;420' to 28;835' MD and POOH to surface with toolstring. RIH with HTGC/GPIT/HP-MSIP/HP-Dual OBMI wireline tool to 27;570' MD. POOH with tool to 26;400' MD to troubleshoot. 

06/01/2013: POOH with HTGC/GPIT/HP-MSIP/HP-Dual OBMI from 26;400' MD to surface. Troubleshot HTGC/GPIT/HP-MSIP/HP-Dual OBMI tool and RIH to 27;570' MD. Logged from 27;570' to 33;470' MD and POOH to surface. RIH with BSR test plug assembly and BOP test stands to 3;330'.
"},{"   ":55,"WELL_NAME":"  001a","API12":608124007601,"WAR_START_DT":"2013-06-02","TEXT_REMARK":"06/02/2013: RIH with BOP Dual-Cam test assembly and BOP test stands to 7;763'. Tested BSRs on the Blue pod from the Toolpusher's panel to 250 psi low/ 2;600 psi high for 5 mins. Function tested the BSRs/CSRs on the Yellow pod from the Toolpusher's panel. POOH from 7;763' to 6;282'. Pressure tested BOPs on 5-7/8" on the Yellow pod from the Toolpusher's panel. Tested rams to 250 psi low/ 8;400 psi high; tested annulars to 250 psi low/ 5;300 psi high; and choke manifold to 250 psi low/ 10;000 psi high.

06/03/2013: Finished pressure testing BOPs on 5-7/8" drill pipe. TIH from 6;282' to 6;625'. Pressure tested BOPs on 6-5/8" drill pipe on the Yellow pod from the Toolpusher's panel. Tested rams to 250 psi low/ 8;400 psi high; tested annulars to 250 psi low/ 5;300 psi high; and choke manifold to 250 psi low/ 10;000 psi high. Function tested the BOPs on 6-5/8" on the Blue and Yellow pod from the Driller's panel. Function tested the diverter from the Driller's and Toolpusher's panel. POOH with BOP test assembly. RIH with HTGC/QCNT/HLDS/ZAIT/HP-CMR+/HP-ECS wireline tools. Repaired damaged wireline. Continued RIH with wireline tools to 26;000' MD.

06/04/2013: Continue RIH with wireline tools to 27;300' MD. Logged from 27;370' to 33;497' MD. Performed acoustic pod test. POOH with wireline tools. TIH with 9-3/8" x 11-7/8" scraper assembly to 3;543' MD. Function tested BSRs/CSRs on Blue pod from Toolpusher's panel. Continue RIH to 11;229' MD. 

06/05/2013: Continue RIH to 19;100' MD. Worked scrapers inside 11-7/8" scab liner from 15;620' to 15;580' MD. TIH to 27;524' MD. Worked scrapers inside 9-3/8" liner from 27;470' to 27;510' MD. Pumped 100 bbl 14.8 ppg hi-vis sweep and circulated to surface. TOH from 27;524' to 22;259' MD.

06/06/2013: Continue TOH with scraper assembly to surface. TIH with 9-3/8" EZSV to 10;256' MD.

Note: On 06/06/2013; Lindsay Hubbard (Chevron) received approval from Bobby Nelson (BSEE Houma District) for a 24-hour extension to 06/08/2013 on the casing pressure test originally due on 06/02/2013. 

06/07/2013: Continue TIH with 9-3/8" EZSV to 27;500' MD. Set 9-3/8" EZSV @ 27;500' MD. Tested EZSV to 1;000 psi with good test. Pressure tested casing to 2;600 psi with 14.8 ppg SBM for 30 mins and charted same. Rigged up and tested cement lines. Mixed and pumped 40 bbls of 16.0 ppg lead spacer; 723 sks/137 bbls/1157 cu.ft of 16.6 ppg (1.06 cu.ft/sk) Class H cement; and 24 bbls of 16.0 ppg tail spacer. Displaced 100 bbls of cement below EZSV from 27;503' to 28;925' MD. Picked up above EZSV and spotted 37 bbls of cement above EZSV from 27;500' to 27;000 MD; POOH above cement plug to 26;672' MD. Pumped two 7" nerf balls and began circulating a 100 bbl nut plug pill to surface.

Note: On 06/07/2013; Lindsay Hubbard (CVX) received approval from Bobby Nelson (BSEE Houma District) to proceed with plugging and abandonment of WR98 #1 ST01 OCS-G 21841 according to the required changes per BSEE for final approval of the permit.

06/08/2013: Continued circulating pill to surface. TOH from 26;672' to 25;200' MD. Pumped and spotted a 40 bbl 14.8 ppg hi-vis pill from 24;700' to 25;200' MD. TOH from 25;200' to 24;700' MD. Mixed and pumped 70 bbls of 16.0 ppg lead spacer; 297 sks/56 bbls/315 cu.ft of 16.6 ppg (1.06 cu.ft/sk) Class H cement; and 15 bbls of 16.0 ppg tail spacer. Displaced and spotted cement from 24;200' to 24;700' MD. Pumped two 7" nerf balls and began circulating a 100 bbl nut plug pill to surface.
"},{"   ":56,"WELL_NAME":"  001a","API12":608124007601,"WAR_START_DT":"2013-06-09","TEXT_REMARK":"06/09/2013: TOH with 9-3/8" EZSV running tool to surface. Pick up 11-7/8" EZSV assembly. Functioned BSRs & CSRs from the Yellow pod on the Driller's panel. TIH with 11-7/8" EZSV assembly to 23;337' MD.

06/10/2013: TIH with 11-7/8" EZSV to 24;000' MD. Set 11-7/8" EZSV @ 24;000' MD. Tested EZSV to 1;000 psi for 15 min. Mixed and pumped 70 bbls of 16.0 ppg lead spacer; 588 sks/111 bbls/623 cu.ft of 16.6 ppg (1.06 cu.ft/sk) Class H cement; and 19 bbls of 16.0 ppg tail spacer. Displaced and spotted cement plug from 23;000' to 24;000' MD. TOH to 22;000' MD/TVD. Mixed and pumped 50 bbls of 16.0 ppg lead spacer; 784 sks/148 bbls/831 cu.ft of 16.6 ppg (1.06 cu.ft/sk) Class H cement; and 11.5 bbls of 16.0 ppg tail spacer. Displaced and spotted cement plug from 21;000' to 22;000' MD/TVD. Pumped two 7" nerf balls and began circulating a 100 bbl nut plug pill to surface. TOH from 21;000' to 6;414' MD/TVD.

06/11/2013: Continue POOH with 11-7/8" EZSV running tool to surface. Pick up and TIH with 11-7/8" EZSV assembly to 15;600' MD/TVD. Set 11-7/8" EZSV @ 15;600'. Tested EZSV to 1;000 psi for 15 min. Mixed and pumped 10 bbls of 16.0 ppg lead spacer; 118 sks/22.3 bbls/125 cu.ft of 16.6 ppg (1.06 cu.ft/sk) Class H cement; and 40 bbls of 16.0 ppg tail spacer. Displaced and spotted cement plug from 15;400' to 15;600' MD/TVD. TOH from 15;600' to 15;100' MD/TVD. Pumped two 7" nerf balls and began circulating a 100 bbl nut plug pill to surface. TOH to 10;342' MD/TVD. 

06/12/2013: Continue TOH with 11-7/8" assembly to 3;085'. Picked up and TIH with BOP test plug to 9;290' MD/TVD. Set BOP test plug in HPWH. Spaced out across BOP and conducted a negative pressure test on 11-7/8" EZSV and wellbore to 2;330 psi for 1 hour and charted same. Well static. Released BOP test plug and TOH from 9;290' to 7;586' MD/TVD. 

06/13/2013: Continue TOH with BOP test plug to surface. Picked up and TIH with riser brush assembly to 6;490' MD/TVD. Displaced choke; kill; boost lines with 50 bbls of riser wash and seawater. Pumped 200 bbls 16.8 ppg Duo Vis WBM spacer; 400 bbls of riser wash; and 2;220 bbls seawater surface to surface to displace 14.8 ppg SBM. Mixed and pumped 30 bbls of seawater lead spacer; 117 sks/22.4 bbls/126 cu.ft of 16.6 ppg (1.06 cu.ft/sk) Class H cement; and 5 bbls of seawater tail spacer. Displaced and spotted cement plug from 6;340' to 6;490' MD. Pumped two 7" nerf balls and began circulating @ 15 BPM.

06/14/2013: Continued circulating @ 15 BPM. POOH with riser brush assembly to surface. Rigged up to pull riser. Installed diverter running tool and pulled diverter. Unlatched BOPs from wellhead @ 18:15 hrs. Installed wellhead preservation fluid and TA cap. Laid out landing joint.
"},{"   ":57,"WELL_NAME":"  002","API12":608124008800,"WAR_START_DT":"2013-12-09","TEXT_REMARK":"12/09/2013: Continue waiting on Revised EP approval and received same at 12:00 hrs. Run 36". Run innerstring and latch 36" running tool to wellhead. 

12/10/2013: Continue run 36" on 6-5/8" V-150 DP to mudline at 5;853'. Jet 36" conductor to 317' BML and soak same. Release WHRT and pull above 36" LPWHH. TIH with 30" x 32" BHA from surface to 5;564' and stand by during soak time. Position rig and stab 30" x 32" BHA into LPWHH. Drill 30" x 32" from 6;170 to 6;388'. 

12/11/2013: Drilled 30" x 32" hole from 6;388' to TD at 7;377'. Pump lignite pil. Displace hole with 11.5 ppg PAD mud. Spot 16.0 ppg mud in rat hole. POOH with drilling assy. TIH with 28" casing.

12/12/2013: Continue TIH with 28" casing on landing string from 1;587' to 5;945' - hit obstruction with 28" shoe inside conductor at 104' below LPWHH. Work pipe attempting to free 28" casing - failed. Worked pipe; shearing 28" off at top of LPWHH. POOH with 28" casing on 6-5/8" landing string to surface. 

12/13/2013: Continue POOH and L/D 28" 218.20 ppf X-60 casing with S-60/MT connection at surface. TIH with 14-1/2" rockbit on slick BHA from surface to 4;911'.

12/14/2013: Continue TIH with 14-1/2" Mill Tooth Bit on slick BHA from 4;911' to 5;940'; stab into well; drill up 28" float shoe; TOH with 14-1/2" BHA. TIH with Cement stinger; place P&A plug from 6;600' to seabed; TOH with Cement stinger above LPWH. TOH with cement stinger to surface. 
"},{"   ":58,"WELL_NAME":"  003","API12":608124008900,"WAR_START_DT":"2013-12-15","TEXT_REMARK":"12/15/2013: Rig up 36" casing handling equipment. Position AFT rotary over well center. Perform clear bottom survey with ROV. Run in hole with 36" casing; LPHWH; and inner string on 6-5/8" DP to 5;325' (500' above ML).

12/16/2013: Wait on Revised Exploration Plan. Standby with 36" casing shoe @ 500' above ML. Service MDDM. Inspect all 36" connections and running tool with ROV. Position marker buoys at new spud location.

12/17/2013: Wait on Revised Exploration Plan. Slip and cut drill line. Received permission to spud WR 143 #3. Position ship. Tag mudline at 5;860' with 36" casing. Jet 36" from 5;860' to 5;962'. 

Note: On 12/17/2013 @ 18:47 PM; Lindsay Hubbard  (Chevron) received approval from Bobby Nelson (BSEE Houma District) to begin jetting operations; run and cement 28" casing on WR 143 #3: "You may proceed as requested. Abide by approval comments for the previously approved #2 well."  

12/18/2013: Jet 36" casing to 6;174' (314' below ML). Soak casing for 8 hrs. Release MHRT and trip out of hole with jetting BHA on AFT. Trip in hole with 30" x 32" drilling BHA to 4;550'.

12/19/2013: Trip in hole with 30" x 32" drilling BHA. Stab through LPWH with ROV monitoring. Drill from 6;174' to 6;448' with 8.6 ppg seawater and ROV monitoring. Discuss forward plan due to high inclination. Inspect bit above HPWH. Control drill to stop build. Flow check: static. Trip out of hole from 6;543' to surface to pick up directional BHA. Secondary Rotary: Run 28" casing on AFT.

12/20/2013: Trip in hole with 26" x 32" directional BHA to LPWH. Stab with ROV monitoring. Trip in hole to 6;543' with surveys. Control drill to 7;150' with 10.0 ppg mud; taking surveys as required. Secondary Rotary: Finish running 28" casing on AFT to 5;381' (500' above ML).

12/21/2013: Drill with 26" x 32" directional BHA to section TD at 7;432' with 10.0 ppg mud and ROV monitoring. Take surveys as required. Pump lignite caliper pill. Flow check: static. Trip out of hole and wash LPWH. Flow check: Static. Position AFT rotary over wellhead. Run in hole with 28" casing on 6-5/8" 50# landing string to 7;238'. Land out hanger and verify latch. Rig up for 28" cement job. Pump 783 bbls of 16.7 ppg Lead foamed to 13.7 ppg. Pump 121 bbls of 16.7 un-foamed Tail. Cement in place at 20:30 hrs. Wait on cement. Release 28" casing hanger running tool. Rig down cement head. Flow check: static. Move rig 100' north of LPWH. 
"},{"   ":59,"WELL_NAME":"  003","API12":608124008900,"WAR_START_DT":"2013-12-22","TEXT_REMARK":"12/22/2013: Wait on cement for 28" casing from 00:00 to 24:00 hrs. Trip in hole with 26" BHA to 5;770' (90' above ML). Secondary Rotary: Trip out of hole with 28" casing landing string and inner string on 6-5/8" drillpipe. Pick up 26" drilling BHA. 

12/23/2013: Wait on cement until 02:00 hrs. Shallow test 26" drilling BHA and stab into LPWH. Trip in hole and tag TOC at 7;234'. Drill cement and shoe track to 7;328' with 8.6 ppg seawater. Drill 26" hole to 7;800' with 8.6 ppg seawater. Swap to 10.5 ppg mud and drill to 8;147'. ROV on seafloor monitoring for shallow flow. No flow observed.

12/24/2013: Drill ahead with 26" drilling BHA to 9;275' with 10.5 ppg mud. Increase MW from 10.5 ppg to 11.5 ppg at 9;000'. ROV at seafloor monitoring for shallow flow during operations. No flow observed. Secondary Rotary: Pick up 22" shoe joint and confirm circulation. Run in hole with 23 joints of 22" casing from surface to 1;293'.

12/25/2013: Drill ahead with 26" drilling BHA to 10;284'. Increase MW to 12.0 ppg. ROV at seafloor monitoring for shallow flow during operations. Pump 13.0 ppg Hi-Vis sweeps to clean hole. Secondary Rotary: Run in hole with 22" casing to 4;806'; installing centralizers as per tally. Pick up and make up Dril-Quip 18-3/4" HPWH.

12/26/2013: Drill ahead with 26" drilling BHA to section TD of 10;700' with 12.0 ppg mud. ROV at seafloor monitoring for shallow flow. Circulate 100 bbl 13.0 ppg Hi-Vis sweep. Pump caliper pill and displace well to 13.0 ppg mud. Backream to 7;800' while pumping 13.0 ppg mud. Large amounts of gumbo observed at wellhead. Secondary Rotary: Trip in hole with 22" casing and Inner String on 6-5/8" landing string to 5;658'. 

12/27/2013: Backream with 26" drilling BHA to above 28" casing shoe at 7;328'. Pull out of hole to above LPWH at 5;848'. ROV clean gumbo off of bit; BHA and stabilizers. Slight flowback observed at wellhead while cleaning BHA. Monitor wellhead: no increase in flowback. Trip in hole with 26" drilling BHA to 7;955'. Wash through tight spots with 13.0 ppg mud. Wash and ream to 9;868' with 13.0 ppg mud. Apparent flow confirmed to be result of hole collapse rather then formation influx. Suspend reaming to maintain quantity of 16.0 ppg S2PAD mud onboard. Flow check: static. Backream to 8;082' with 13.0 ppg mud and trip out to LPWH. Wait on 16.0 ppg S2PAD mud. Secondary Rotary: Standby with 22" casing at 5;658'. 

12/28/2013: Inspect 22" casing and running tool with ROV. Take on 10;000 bbls of 16.0 ppg S2PAD mud. Stab 26" drilling BHA and trip in hole to 9;906'. Wash and ream to 10;452' with 13.5 ppg mud. Decision made to trip out of hole due to low mud stocks and difficulty to ream to bottom. Flow check: static. Pump out of hole to 9;868'; backreaming on tight spots. Trip out to 7;328'; filling stands and monitoring wellhead with ROV. Secondary Rotary: Standby with 22" casing at 5;658'.
"},{"   ":60,"WELL_NAME":"  003","API12":608124008900,"WAR_START_DT":"2013-12-29","TEXT_REMARK":"12/29/2013: Pulled 26" drilling BHA from 7;328' MD to above the LPWH and positioned the rig 50' from the well. ROV cleaned "gumbo" from the bit and stabilizers. Pulled 26" assembly to surface; inspected; and cleaned. Cut and slip drill line; serviced MDDM; traveling block; and dolly rollers. Began installation of in-line tensioners through the rotary and into moonpool.

12/30/2013: Finished the tensioner installations. Laid down tensioner handling tools and rigged up drill pipe handling tools. Re-initialized MWD tools and tripped in the hole with 26" assembly to 10;382' MD. Pulled out of hole from 10;382' MD to 7;315' MD. Waited for additional PAD mud to arrive to rig. Tripped in hole from 7;315' MD to 9;359' MD.

12/31/2013: Tripped in hole from 9;359' MD to 10;375' MD. Reamed through tight spots with 13.5 ppg PAD mud from 10;375' MD to 10;505' MD. Pulled out of hole from 10;375' MD to 5;663' MD with no restrictions. Moved rig 50' off location. ROV cleaned excess gumbo from stabilizers and bit. Repositioned rig over well center and tripped in hole from 5;663' MD to 10;252' MD. Washed and reamed from 10;252' MD to 10;700' MD. Made a short trip washing out to 10;380' MD. Washed and reamed down to 10;700' MD.

01/01/2014: Pumped 150 bbl 13.5 ppg Hi-Vis spacer and 13.5 ppg 300 bbl lignite hole-caliper pills and circulated to the seafloor. Displaced hole to 14 ppg PAD mud and spotted 16 ppg PAD mud in the rat hole. Pulled out of the hole and washed the LPWH. Pulled 26" BHA above the LPWH; positioned Aft Rotary over well; and ran 22" casing on landing string from 5;658' MD to 5;960' MD. Displaced casing to 14 ppg PAD mud. Continued to trip in hole with 22" casing from 5;960' MD to 9;708' MD.

01/02/2014: Continued to trip in the hole with 22" casing on landing string to 10;341' MD. Washed casing down from 10;341' MD to 10;535' MD. Made up the cement head and landed HPWH in LPWHH with the 22" shoe at 10;651' MD. Rigged up surface lines to the cement head. Circulated and conditioned the hole with 14 ppg PAD mud. Pumped 1;353 bbls of 14.5 ppg nitrogen foamed lead cement slurry and 225 bbls of 16.7 ppg un-foamed tail cement slurry; confirming cement returns to the seafloor. Displaced tail slurry with seawater; bled off pressure; verified the floats held. Locked down HPWH to LPWH. Racked back the cement head; inserted an 8" nerf ball; and displaced 22" casing with 14 ppg PAD mud. Pulled out of the hole on landing string and washed the HPWH with seawater.

Note: Thomas Ahlf (Chevron) gave 72 hour notification to Bobby Nelson and Josh Ladner (BSEE Houma District) for latching up and subsequent BOP testing.

01/03/2014: Secondary rotary pulled out of the hole with the MRLD and inner string to surface. Primary began riser rig up operations. Waited on weather due to rig motion and resumed when weather allowed. Picked up 2 joints of slick riser and made up to BOP in the moonpool. Splashed BOP and commenced pressure testing of Choke; Kill; and Boost lines.

01/04/2014: Ran BOP on riser from 192' to 1;017'. Encountered issues with the spider lock mechanism and replaced the assembly. Continued running BOP on riser from 1;017' to 2;217'. Tested Choke; Kill; Boost and Conduit at planned intervals. Encountered another issue with the spider lock mechanism and made repairs. Continued running riser from 2;217' to 3;417'. 
"},{"   ":61,"WELL_NAME":"  003","API12":608124008900,"WAR_START_DT":"2014-01-05","TEXT_REMARK":"01/05/2014: Run BOP on marine riser from 3;417' to 5;592'; pressure testing as per procedures. After 74 joints ran; pick up 10' pup. Ground fault observed on POD; decision to pull riser/BOP for troubleshooting. Pull riser from 5;592' to 4;017'.

01/06/2014: Pull BOP on riser from 4;017 ' to 792'. Wait on weather due to excessive rig motion. Continue BOP on riser from 792' to 267'. Wait on weather to continue operations.

Note: Thomas Ahlf (Chevron) sent notice to Bobby Nelson and Josh Ladner (BSEE - Houma District) as follows: "Please be aware that due to an intermittent 15v ground fault; the DID is pulling the BOP back to surface for troubleshooting and repair. Due to time constraints (approaching 30 days since last official stump test); the DID will be conducting a stump test of the BOP prior to re-running the BOP. Please consider this note a 72 hour notice of that stump test."

01/07/2014: Monitoring weather conditions; vessel movement and sea state to pull BOP into moonpool. Pulling slick riser from 267' to 192'. Pull BOP into moonpool on double of slick riser. Land BOP on Beams. Disconnect double of slick riser
and pull clear. Skid BOP to setback area. Troubleshoot 15V ground fault on BOP.

01/08/2014: Continue troubleshoot BOP ground fault on yellow pod. Begin stump test on BOP to 250 psi/ 14;700 psi on rams.

01/09/2014: Continue attempting to stump test BOP to 250 psi/ 14;700 psi on rams and 250 psi/ 7;000 psi on annular.  Troubleshoot BOP due to pressure anomalies on variable bore rams during stump test.

01/10/2014: Continue to toubleshoot BOP pressure anomolies. Change out ram packers and inspect wear plates.

01/11/2014: Complete change out of ram packers and inspection.  Resume stump test of BOP to 250 psi/ 14;700 psi on rams and 250 psi/ 7;000 psi on annular.
"},{"   ":62,"WELL_NAME":"  003","API12":608124008900,"WAR_START_DT":"2014-01-12","TEXT_REMARK":"01/12/2014: Continue to stump test BOPs; Rams to 250 psi low/ 14;700 psi high; Annular to 250 psi low/ 7;000 psi high. Replace Lower Variable Bore Ram upper seal plate and Subsea Test Valve soft goods. Electronic Technicians troubleshoot ground fault on Blue Pod.

01/13/2014: Electronic Technicians troubleshoot ground fault on Blue Pod. Complete stump testing BOPs/Rams; tested to 250 psi low/ 14;700 psi high. BOP function test from Toolpusher's panel/Blue Pod. Prepare BOP for soak test. 

01/14/2014: Perform BOP control system soak test as per Transocean procedure on Yellow Pod and Blue Pod. Inadvertently closed the BSRs on a test joint. Remove sheared test joint. Open Blind Shear Ram bonnets and perform required inspection of Blind Shear Rams. Installed Ram Blocks in the BOPs. Closed bonnet doors and torqued as required.

Note: On 01/14/2014; Thomas Ahlf (Chevron) informed Bobby Nelson (BSEE -  Houma District) of required 72 hour notification of BOP test after latch up. Return reply received from Josh Ladner (BSEE-  Houma District).

Note: On 01/14/2014; Frank Hillman (Chevron) informed Bobby Nelson of a delay in splashing BOP and an expected latch up date of 01/18/2014.

01/15/2014: Install test stump and fill BOPs with drill-water in preparation for BSR stump test. Perform BSR stump test at 250 psi low/ 14;700 psi high. Splash BOP and pressure test Choke and Kill lines at 250 psi low/ 10;000 psi high. Test Boost/Rigid Conduit lines to 4;700 psi high. Pull BOP back to surface due to pod mismatch alarm on Yellow Pod. Land BOP on beams and find fault; rectify pod mismatch alarm problem. Electronic Technicians troubleshoot ground fault on Blue and Yellow Pods.

Note: On 01/15/2014; Frank Hillman informed Josh Ladner of expected pressure test on 01/19/2014.

01/16/2014: Electronic Technicians troubleshoot and repair ground fault on Blue Pod. Perform dry fire on Blue and Yellow Pods. Re-apply hydraulics to BOP stack and perform 20 min soak test on Blue and Yellow Pods. 

01/17/2014: Lower BOP into splash zone to 192'. Land out double in gimbal. Test Choke and Kill lines with Halco to 250/ 10;000 psi. Test Boost/Rigid Conduit to 4;700 psi. Run BOPs on riser from 192' to 1;167'. Improper pressure reading from subsea manifold regulator readback on Blue pod - faulty pressure transducer. Trip out of hole with BOP from 1;167' to surface; setting same on beams. Move BOP to setback area. Troubleshoot pressure transducer problem on Blue Pod.

Note: On 01/17/2014; Frank Hillman informed Bobby Nelson of the BOP issues and a possible latch up and pressure testing date of 01/21/2014.

01/18/2014: Troubleshoot and evaluate transducer problem. 
"},{"   ":63,"WELL_NAME":"  003","API12":608124008900,"WAR_START_DT":"2014-01-19","TEXT_REMARK":"01/19/2014: Troubleshoot and repair subsea manifold regulator readback transducer on Blue Pod. Soak test; skid; splash; and run BOP on marine riser to 1;167'.

01/20/2014: Run BOPs on marine riser from 1;167' to 5;607'. Test Choke and Kill lines to 250 psi low/ 10;000 psi high. Test Rigid Conduit and Boost lines to 4;700 psi.

Note: On 01/20/2014; Frank Hillman (Chevron) informed Bobby Nelson (BSEE - Houma District) of 72 hours notice for latching and subsequent BOP testing.

01/21/2014: Install termination joint; intermediate flex joint; and slip joint. Install drape hoses on termination joint. Test Choke and Kill lines to 11;700 psi. Test Boost line and Rigid Conduit to 4;700 psi. Land and latch BOPs in HPWH. Install the Diverter. Test 22" casing to 2;730 psi for 30 minutes. Rig down riser handling equipment. Perform BOP ROV intervention tes;t functioning BSR closed with ROV hot stab. Pressure test BSR to 1;000 psi for 5 minutes.

01/22/2014: Slip/cut drill line. Rig up drilling handling equipment. Perform Diverter function/flow test. Perform Deadman test and pressure test BSR to 1;000 psi. Trip in hole with 18-1/8" x 21" drilling BHA and dual cam BOP test tool; landing same in wellhead. Function test BOPs from CCU/ Blue Pod to check/confirm subsea manifold readback tracking. Pressure test BOP from Driller's panel on Blue Pod. Pressure test surface equipment and Rams to 250 psi/ 11;700 psi and annular 250 psi/ 7;000 psi. 

Note: On 01/22/2014; Dewayne Johnson (Chevron) informed Bobby Nelson that BOPs are latched. Dead Man test and pressure testing BOPs to occur this afternoon.

01/23/2014: Perform BOP function test from Toolpusher's panel/ Yellow Pod and accumulator drawdown test from CCU on Yellow Pod. Pressure test BSR to 250 psi/ 11;700 psi from Driller's panel on Blue Pod. Function test BSR from Toolpusher's panel on Yellow Pod. Trip out of hole with dual cam and BOPTT. Function CSR from Driller's panel on Blue Pod and again from Toolpusher's panel on Yellow Pod. Pick up wear sleeve assembly and trip in hole with 18-1/8" x 21" drilling assembly. Set wear sleeve and TIH to 10;477'. Wash down and tag top of cement at 10;510'. Change out swivel packing on Forward MDDM.

01/24/2014: Displace wellbore from 14.0 ppg PAD mud and riser from seawater to 10.7 ppg SBM. Take slow circulating rates; choke line friction; and perform diverter drill followed by choke drill. Drill shoe track. Cleanout rathole and drill 10' new formation. Circulate high viscosity and heavy weight pill around to above BOP. Attempt FIT/ LOT unsuccessfully. Discuss options and monitor well. 97 bbls of 10.7 ppg SBM lost to hole during drilling shoe track; circulation; and FIT/ LOT tests. While monitoring well; record increase to trip tank. Shut in annular. No pressure build. Opened well to balloon back. Shut in as necessary and record pressures to ensure no influx. No pressure build.

01/25/2014: Continue monitoring well at 10;631'. Gains during monitoring = 58.8 bbls (ballooned back). Shut in well. No pressure build. Open well; wash to bottom; and circulate bottoms up. Pull bit into shoe and circulate bottoms up halfway up hole and flow check. Gains at 0.2 barrels per minute. Resume circulation and again flow check with bottoms up 1;000' below BOP. Gains at 0.2 barrels per minute. Close annular and circulate up choke and kill lines while evaluating returns and presence of any contamination. Bottoms up sample showed no sign of influx. Lost additional 36 bbls during this circulation. Net loss to hole 74.2 bbls. Monitor closed well on mini trip tank while boosting riser volume. No gains to mini trip tank. Open well and monitor well on main trip tank. Gain/ ballooning rate decreased from initial 4.4 barrels per hour to final 2.5 barrels per hour.

Note: On 01/25/2014; Lindsay Hubbard (Chevron) informed Bobby Nelson that the 22" shoe was drilled and although competent cement was observed in the shoe track; a satisfactory LOT was not achieved. Losses were experienced while drilling 10 feet of new formation for the LOT and circulating with subsequent ballooning back. Currently working to get the well stabilized and will move forward with plans for a remedial cement squeeze at the shoe.
"},{"   ":64,"WELL_NAME":"  003","API12":608124008900,"WAR_START_DT":"2014-01-26","TEXT_REMARK":"01/26/2014: Continue to monitor ballooning on trip tank with annular open with total volume ballooned back of 56.8 bbls during this monitoring period. Circulate bottoms up with 10.7 ppg SBM at loss free rate stopping to flow check with bottoms up halfway up casing; 1;000' below wellhead; halfway up riser; and bottoms up. Gains at any flow check were .1 barrels per minute or less during flow checks. Shut in well with annular and prepare pill for riser cap. Spot 200 bbl 12.5 ppg pill in riser to 1;000' below surface. Open annular and monitor well on trip tank with slight loss. 

01/27/2014: Continue monitoring trip tank with riser cap spotted and annular open until well is static for 30 minutes. Pull out of hole from 10;638' to 9;934' wet. Pump slug and pull out of hole with 18-1/8" x 21" assembly with proper displacement. Pick up cement stinger and trip in the hole on drill pipe for remedial cement squeeze operations to 7;226' with proper displacement.

01/28/2014: Continue to trip in hole with the cement stinger to 8;637' with proper displacement. Perform Diverter function test from Driller's panel. Trip in hole with the cement stinger to 10;651' with proper displacement. Make up cement stand; position stinger at 10;705'; and rig up for cement operations. Close annular and boost 12.5 ppg riser cap to surface with 10.7 ppg SBM while monitoring well on trip tank. Well static during riser displacement. Perform remedial cement operations spotting 172 bbl 16.4 ppg cement plug from 10;705 to 10;300'. Close annular and perform hesitation squeeze with 10.7 ppg SBM. Squeezed 70 bbl total with final applied pressure 544 psi. Wait on cement and monitor pressure with annular closed. 

01/29/2014: Continue waiting on cement while monitoring pressure. Wait on weather due to onshore conditions preventing emergency flight availability. Bleed off remaining squeeze pressure through choke line; monitor well on trip tank (10 minutes - static); open annular and monitor on trip tank (15 minutes - static). Circulate 1-1/2 drill string volume with 10.7 ppg SBM. Flow check well on trip tank (60 minutes - static). Pull out of hole with cement stinger to surface. Slip and cut drill line.

01/30/2014: Finish slip and cut drill line. Function BSR/CSR from Toolpusher's panel on Yellow Pod. Trip in hole with 18-1/8" x 21" drilling assembly with proper displacement to 10;349'. Wash down and tag top of cement at 10;371' with 10 klb weight on bit. Circulate cement spacer to surface with 10.7 ppg SBM. Perform baseline pressure test to 817 psi with 10.7 ppg SBM (12.2 ppg equivalent surface mud weight). Drill cement from 10;371' to 10;661' (10' below 22" casing shoe). Circulate cement cuttings to surface and until 10.7 ppg mud weight in and out.

01/31/2014: Attempt to pressure test to target 554 psi (10' of cement drilled below 22" casing shoe) with 10.7 ppg SBM for 11.7 ppg equivalent surface mud weight. Test was not successful to target pressure. Deflection from pressure ramp seen at 465 psi. Flow check well (1 hour - static) and pull out of hole to surface with 18-1/8" x 21" BHA with proper displacement. Trip in hole with cement stinger to 10;656' and rig up cement head. Perform remedial cement operations; pumping 140 bbl 16.4 ppg cement plug. Displace cement with 10.7 ppg SBM. 

02/01/2014: Spot cement plug from 10;656' to 10;300'. Pull out of hole to 9;645'; close annular; and perform hesitation cement squeeze. Squeezed 40.5 bbls total with final applied pressure to 608 psi. Wait on cement for 18 hours while monitoring pressure with annular closed (579 psi at initial shut in). Bleed off pressure; open annular and flow check (15 minutes - static). Drop nerf ball and circulate 1.5 drill string volume with 10.7 ppg SBM. Pull out of hole with cement stinger from 9;645' to 6;012'. 
"},{"   ":65,"WELL_NAME":"  003","API12":608124008900,"WAR_START_DT":"2014-02-02","TEXT_REMARK":"02/02/2014: Pull out of hole with cement stinger from 6;012' to surface. Function test blind shear and casing shear rams from Driller's panel; Blue Pod. Trip in hole with 18-1/8" x 21" BHA and tagged top of cement at 10;323'. Drill cement from 10;323' to 10;710'. Drill 10' of new formation from 10;710' to 10;720'. Well static after flow check. Pump 50 bbl sweep. 

02/03/2014: Continue to pump 50 bbl sweep. Space out to perform formation integrity test to 11.7 ppg at casing shoe. Test unsuccessful. Open annular to monitor well; observe gains at trip tank at constant rate of 0.2 bbls/min. Shut in well with annular and monitor pressures. Open well to trip tank via choke and kill lines and observe gains at 0.16 bbls/min. Shut in well with annular with total gain of 8.0 bbls. No pressure build. Open annular and start washing to bottom while circulating bottoms up to 1;000' below wellhead. Close annular and circulate bottoms up from 1;000' below wellhead to surface via choke and kill lines. Spotted 200 bbl 12.5 ppg riser cap for 10.8 ppg EMW. Perform BOP control system function test from Toolpusher's panel; Yellow Pod. Trip out from 10;630' to 9;968'.

Note: On 02/03/14; Bobby Nelson (BSEE) gave approval to Al Lindsey (Chevron) for a 24 hr extension on the BOP test due on 02/05/14; provided a full function test is performed in the meantime.

02/04/2014: Trip out of hole wet from 9;968' to surface. Function test diverter from Toolpusher's panel; Yellow Pod; on trip out of hole. Function test blind shear and casing shear rams from Toolpusher's pane; Yellow Pod. Trip in hole with cement diverter. Slip and cut drill line. Trip in hole with diverter/cement stinger from 5;191' to 8;887'. 

02/05/2014: Trip in hole with cement stinger from 8;887' to 10;715'. Close annular and boost 12.5 ppg riser cap from riser. Flow check riser with annular closed (15 minutes - well static). Perform remedial cement operations; spotting 157 bbls of 16.4 ppg cement. Close annular and perform hesitation squeeze with 10.7 ppg SBM. Squeezed 27 bbls total with final applied pressure 619 psi. Wait on cement and maintain final squeeze pressure. 

02/06/2014: Continue to wait on cement and maintain final squeeze pressure. Bleed off squeeze pressure at cement unit. Open annular and monitor well (15 min. - static). Circulate 1.5x drill string volume volume. Trip out of hole to 9;395'. Pressure test BOPs from Toolpusher's panel; Yellow Pod (250 psi low/ 5;600 psi high). Function test BOP from Driller's panel; Blue Pod. Trip out of hole from 9;395' to surface. Trip in hole with 18-1/8" x 21" drilling BHA to 1;995'.

02/07/2014: Function Blind Shear and Casing Shear rams from Driller's panel; Blue Pod. Trip in hole with 18-1/8" x 21" BHA from 1;995' to 10;292' and tag top of cement 10k down. Drill cement from 10;292' to 10;666'. Flow check well for 15 min. - well static. Circulate bottoms up. Space out and perform pressure integrity test to 11.3 ppg EMW (333 psi surface pressure) with a 10.7 ppg mud weight. Drill cement from 10;666' to 10;705'. Pull bit into 22" casing shoe and flow check (15 min. - well static). Circulate bottoms up 1;000' above BOP. 

02/08/2014: Continue circulating bottoms up 1;000' above BOP. Flow check (26 min. - 5.5 bbl gain). Shut in and monitor pressures for 1.5 hours; no pressure build up. Open well to mini trip tanks with annular closed and flow check (15 min. - no gains). Open annular and monitor on trip tank (15 min. - 3.5 bbl gain). Circulate bottoms up to 1;615' below wellhead. Close annular and circulate bottoms up from 1;615' below wellhead to surface via choke/kill lines. Perform pressure integrity test to 11.1 ppg EMW (250 psi surface pressure) with 10.7 ppg mud weight. Open annular and bleed back 10 bbls to trip tank at .06 bbls/min. Wash down to 10;705' and back to 10;630'. Circulate bottoms up to 1;770' below wellhead. Close annular and circulate bottoms up from 1;770' below wellhead to surface via choke/kill lines.
"},{"   ":66,"WELL_NAME":"  003","API12":608124008900,"WAR_START_DT":"2014-02-09","TEXT_REMARK":"02/09/2014: Continue to circulate bottoms up from 1;770' below BOP to surface through choke and kill lines. Open annular and monitor well on trip tank: Allow 20 bbl bleedback over 3 hrs. Wash from 10;630' to 10;705' and back to 10;630'. Circulate bottoms up to 1;000' below wellhead. Close annular and circulate bottoms up from 1;000' below wellhead to surface through choke and kill lines. Boost riser. Open annular and monitor well on trip tank: Allow 25 bbl bleedback over 3 hrs. Wash from 10;630' to 10;705' and back to 10;630'. Circulate bottoms up to 1;000' below wellhead. Close annular and circulate bottoms up from 1;000' below wellhead to surface through choke and kill lines.

02/10/2014: Circulate bottoms up through choke and kill lines. Pump 200 bbls of 12.5 ppg riser cap. Flow well - 15 min. - well static. Wash and ream from 10;630' to 10;706'; tagging cement at 10;706'. Drill cement from 10;706' to 10;720'. Pull back inside 22" shoe to 10;630'. Circulate bottoms up to 1;500' below wellhead. Continue to circulate bottoms up from 1;500' below BOP to surface through choke and kill. 

02/11/2014: Continue to circulate bottoms up from below BOP to surface through choke and kill. Pump 140 bbls of LCM. Open annular and monitor well: Static. Spot LCM pill at TD. Close annular and squeezed LCM. Boost out riser cap. Pump 200 bbls of 12.5 ppg riser cap and circulate into place. Monitor well: Static. Wash from 10;650' to 10;720' and back to 10;630'. Circulate bottoms up to 1;500' below BOP.

02/12/2014: Complete circulating bottoms up to 1;500' below BOP. Close annular and circulate bottoms up from 1;500' to surface. Close lower pipe rams and pump down choke and kill lines to flush cuttings. Perform pressure integrity test with 10.7 ppg SBM to an EMW of 11.3 ppg. Boost out riser cap. Pump 200 bbls of 12.5 ppg riser cap and circulate into place. Monitor well: Static. Wash from 10;650' to 10;720' and pump back out to 10;630'. Circulate bottoms up from 1;000' below BOP to surface through choke and kill lines.

02/13/2014: Continue to circulate bottoms up from 1;000' below BOP to surface through choke and kill lines. Monitor well: Static. Displace well from 10.7 ppg to 10.8 ppg while washing to TD. Monitor well: Observe increase of 0.1 bbls/min. Close annular and monitor on trip tank: No flow. Open annular and flow check: Increase at 0.1 bbls/min. Pump 200 bbls of 12.5 ppg riser cap and circulate into place. Open annular and flow check: Static. Trip out of the hole with 18-1/8" x 21" BHA. Pick up cement diverter and trip in hole with cement stinger.

02/14/2014: Continue trip in hole with cement stinger to 10;720'. Perform remedial cement operations spotting 140 bbl of 16.4 ppg cement. Close annular and perform hesitation squeeze. Squeezed 40.5 bbls with a final pressure of 575 psi. Wait on cement and monitor pressure. 

02/15/2014: Continue to wait on cement. Monitor well on trip tank: Static. Trip in hole with cement stinger and tag top of cement at 10;448'. Circulate out spacer; taking riser cap returns to separate pits. Flow check well: Static. Pump slug and trip out of hole. Monitor well on trip tank: Static. 

"},{"   ":67,"WELL_NAME":"  003","API12":608124008900,"WAR_START_DT":"2014-02-16","TEXT_REMARK":"02/16/2014: Trip in hole with 18-1/8" x 21" BHA from surface to 495'. Monitor well: static. Function test BSR and CSR from Driller's panel; Blue Pod. Continue to trip in hole to 10;253'. Perform BOP pressure tests from Driller's panel; Blue Pod (250 psi low/ 5;600 psi high with a 10.8 ppg mud weight). 

02/17/2014: Complete BOP pressure tests. Perform BOP function test from Toolpusher's Panel; Yellow Pod. Flow check well: static. Function Diverter from Toolpusher's panel. Trip out of hole with 18-1/8" x 21" BHA from 10;253' to surface. Perform casing pressure test to 250 psi low and 2;850 psi high for 30 min from Toolpusher's panel; Yellow Pod. Perform BSR pressure test to 250 psi low and 2;850 psi high for 5 min. Function test BSR and CSR from Toolpusher's panel; Yellow Pod. Trip in hole with 18-1/8" x 21" BHA and tag top of cement at 10;442'. Displace well from 10.8 ppg SBM to 10.9 ppg WBM.

02/18/2014: Continue displacing wellbore from 10.8 ppg SBM to 10.9 ppg WBM. Drill cement with 18-1/8" x 21" BHA from 10;442' to 10;550' with 10.9 ppg WBM. Circulate and condition 10.9 ppg WBM to achieve desired properties.

02/19/2014: Continue to circulate and condition 10.9 ppg WBM. Perform baseline pressure test with 10.9 ppg WBM to an 11.8 estimated mud weight. Drill cement with 18-1/8" x 21" BHA from 10;550' to 10;660' with 10.9 ppg WBM.

02/20/2014: Drill cement with 18-1/8" x 21" BHA from 10;600' to 10;720' with 10.9 WBM. Drill 10' of new formation to 10;730'. Pump sweep and circulate bottoms up. Flow check: static. Pull bit to the 22" casing shoe at 10;651'. Perform FIT with 10.9 ppg WBM and achieved an 11.5 ppg equivalent mud weight (350 psi). Drill from 10;730' to 10;808' with 10.9 ppg WBM. Activate reamer and ream hole open from 10;793' to 10;808'. Drill ahead from 10;808' to 10;845'. 

Note: On 02/20/2014; Robert Nelson (BSEE; Houma) gave approval to Al Lindsey (Chevron) to drill the 18-1/8" x 21" hole section with a 0.3 ppg drilling margin if wellbore conditions require. 

02/21/2014: Drill with 18-1/8" x 21" BHA from 10;845' to 10;913' with 10.9 ppg WBM. Flow check and observed an increase in the trip tank. Close annular and monitor for pressure increase: Static. Circulate bottoms up to 1000' below BOP. Close annular and circulate bottoms up through choke and kill lines. Flow check well and observed an increase in the trip tank. Shut-in and observed a pressure build on kill line. Weight up active system to 11.1 ppg. Displace well from 10.9 ppg WBM to 11.1 ppg WBM while pumping down drill string and taking returns up choke and kill.

02/22/2014: Continue displacing wellbore from 10.9 ppg WBM to 11.1 ppg WBM with 18-1/8" x 21" at 10;913'. Monitor well on stripping tank and observed an increase. Shut-in and observed a pressure build on kill line. Displace well to 11.2 ppg WBM; pumping down drill string and taking returns up choke and kill lines. Monitor well on stripping tank: static. Displace riser from 11.1 ppg WBM to 11.2 ppg WBM. Monitor well: static. 
"},{"   ":68,"WELL_NAME":"  003","API12":608124008900,"WAR_START_DT":"2014-02-23","TEXT_REMARK":"02/23/2014: Displace riser from 11.1 to 11.2 ppg water based mud. Open annular and flow check well - static. Circulate and condition mud to required lost circulation material concentration. Pull out of hole from 10;900' to 138' with 18-1/8" x 21" assembly to inspect and re-configure BHA. Trip in hole with 18-1/8" x 21" assembly from 138' to 5;323'. Function test Diverter from Driller's panel. Function Blind Shear Rams and Casing Shear Rams from Driller's panel on Blue pod. 

02/24/2014: Trip in hole with 18-1/8" x 21" assembly from 5;323' to 10;552'. Circulate bottoms up and flow check well - static. Wash to bottom at 10;914'. Perform open hole formation integrity test to 11.8 ppg surface equivalent mud weight with 11.2 ppg water based mud and a surface pressure of 355 psi (22" casing shoe is at 10;651' TVD and the 18-1/8" hole depth was 10;914' TVD). Drill from 10;914' to 10;947'.

02/25/2014: Drill 18-1/8" x 21" hole from 10;947' to 10;948'. Flow check well - static. Circulate bottoms up and flow check well - static. Pull out of hole from 10;948' to surface to replace bit and clean bottom hole assembly. Trip in hole with 18-1/8" x 21" assembly from surface to 4;950'.

02/26/2014: Trip in hole with 1- 1/8" x 21" assembly from 4;950' to 10;811'. Ream down from 10;811' to 10;948'. Drill ahead from 10;948' to 11;140' with 11.2 ppg water based mud.
	
02/27/2014: Drill 18-1/8" x 21" hole from 11;140' to 11;191'. Flow check prior to short trip - 10 barrels gained while monitoring ballooning trend on trip tank. Shut in and circulate bottoms up. Increase mud weight from 11.2 ppg to 11.3 ppg water based mud. Flow check well - static. Perform short trip into 22" casing shoe from 11;028' to 10;640'. Flow check well - static. Trip in hole from 10;640' - 11;120'. Wash and ream from 11;120' to total depth at 11;191'. Drill ahead from 11;191' to 11;280'.

02/28/2014: Drill 1- 1/8" x 21" hole from 11;280' to 11;560' with 11.3 ppg water based mud. 

03/01/2014: Drill 18-1/8" x 21" hole from 11;560' to 11;660' with 11.3 ppg water based mud. Flow check - static. Perform wiper trip from 11;660' into 22" casing shoe at 10;640'. Perform diverter function from Toolpusher's panel. Trip in hole from 10;640' to 11;660'. Drill 18-1/8" x 21" hole from 11;660' to 11;810'.
"},{"   ":69,"WELL_NAME":"  003","API12":608124008900,"WAR_START_DT":"2014-03-02","TEXT_REMARK":"03/02/2014: Drill 18-1/8" x 21" hole to section total depth at 11;970'. Circulate 11.3 ppg WBM bottoms up. Wiper trip to 22" shoe. Continue trip out of hole with drilling assembly to 10;263' (BOP test depth). Space out test stands across BOP. Started pressure test of choke manifold and BOPs on 6-5/8" drill pipe.

03/03/2014: Complete pressure tesing of Choke Manifold (250 psi low/ 5;500 psi high) and BOPs from Toolpusher's panel; Yellow Pod (250 psi low/ 5;500 psi high). Flow checked well on minitrip tank - static. Function BOPs from Driller's panel; Blue Pod. Perform wiper trip to total depth. Monitored well on trip tank - static. Tripped in hole to 10;263' to 10;640'; well static. Continued trip in hole from shoe to 11;970'. Well static. Circulate and condition mud for casing. Flow checked well on trip tank; 2.5 bbls to hole. Monitored 30 minutes after well static. Pick up to 11;792'. Spot 16.5 ppg mud in pilot hole. Trip out of hole with 18-1/8" x 21" BHA from 11;970' to 10;900'. Hole taking proper fill ups.

03/04/2014: Continue trip out of hole with 18" x 21" drilling BHA from 10;900' to 10;640'. Flow check - static. Washed wellhead before another static flow check and pulling bottom hole assembly through surface bottom hole assembly. Rig up 18" casing handling equipment. Run in hole with 17-7/8" casing from surface to 127'.

03/05/2014: Run in hole with 17-7/8" x 18" casing string from 127' to 1;583'. Pick up/ run hanger to 1;593'. Run inner string. Make up hanger running tool to inner string and run in hole with 17-7/8" x 18" casing on 6-5/8" landing string to 11;773'. Make up cement head before landing out hanger in 18" supplemental adaptor. Circulate and condition mud prior to cement job. Mix and pump (87 bbls/ 428 sks/ 489 cu ft) of 16.0 ppg cement at 5 bpm followed by 7 bbls 13.5 ppg tuned spacer. Shut down release 2.5" DP wiper dart; pump additional 3 bbls 13.5 ppg tuned spacer followed by 7 bbls 11.3 ppg WBM. Displaced with 346 bbls of WBM; leaving 28 bbls (157 cu ft) in the annulus and 59 bbls (331 cu ft) in the annulus. No returns throughout job; Saw dart land; 340 psi dynamic lift pressure noted; released pressure and confirmed floats holding. 

03/06/2014: Attempted to release casing hanger running tool from seal assembly.

03/07/2014: Continue to attempt to release casing hanger running tool from seal assembly. 

NOTE: On March 7; 2014; Lindsay Hubbard requested; and received approval; from Bobby Nelson (BSEE) to delay diverter functioning until liner hanger running tool can be released. 

03/08/2014: Run in hole with wireline free point assembly and establish free point in pipe. Pipe came free during free point run. Pull out of hole with wireline and rig down wireline equipment. Function diverter from Driller's panel. Circulate bottoms up. 
"},{"   ":70,"WELL_NAME":"  003","API12":608124008900,"WAR_START_DT":"2014-03-09","TEXT_REMARK":"03/09/2014: Circulate bottoms up through open choke and kill lines from 11;551' to surface with 18" casing hanger running tool in hole; losing 14 bbls to hole. Monitor well on mini-trip tank: 0.8 bbl gain; then static. Close annular and circulate riser with boost line. Flow check well: static. Function test BOP on Toolpusher's panel; Yellow Pod. Spot 200 bbls of 13.0 ppg WBM riser cap via boost line. Trip out of hole from 11;551' to surface with 18" casing running tool assembly; monitoring displacement. Flow check well: static. 

03/10/2014: Function test BSR and CSR from Toolpusher's panel; Yellow Pod. Trip in hole with 18" casing hanger running tool on 6-5/8" landing string and inner string to 11;220'; landing on seal assembly. Test seal assembly to 2;200 psi with 11.3 ppg WBM in hole. Attempt to shear out of seal assembly. Retest seal assembly to 2;200 psi. Shear off of seal assembly. Monitor well on trip tank: static. Trip out of hole with casing running tool assembly to surface. 

03/11/2014: Perform 18" casing pressure test to 250 psi low and 2;200 psi high for 30 min from Driller's panel; Blue Pod. Trip in hole with 16-1/2" x 19" BHA from surface to 5;311' in 11.3 ppg WBM. Re-test and perform 18" casing pressure test to 250 psi low and 2;200 psi high for 30 min from Driller's panel; Blue Pod. Perform BSR test to 250 psi low and 2;200 psi high for 5 min. Function test BSR and CSR from Driller's panel; Blue Pod. Trip in hole and tag top of cement at 11;635'. Weight up SBM and prepare wellbore for displacing from 11.3 ppg WBM to 11.5 ppg SBM.

03/12/2014: Prepare rig pits for displacement from 11.3 ppg WBM to 11.5 ppg SBM. Displace surface lines; surface equipment; and wellbore to 11.5 ppg SBM with all discharge lines under lock-out and tag-out. Circulate and condition mud. Drill cement in shoe track from 11;635' to 11;779' with 16-1/2" x 19" BHA and 11.5 ppg SBM. Wash and ream rathole from 11;779' to 11;800'. 

03/13/2014: Wash and ream rathole from 11;779' to 11;970' with 16-1/2" x 19" BHA and 11.5 ppg SBM. Drill 10' new formation from 11;970' to 11;980'. Perform FIT on 17-7/8" casing shoe to 14.5 ppg EMW with 11.5 ppg SBM and 1;850 psi surface pressure. Function test BOP from Driller's panel; Blue Pod; and Diverter from Toolpusher's panel. Drill ahead with 16-1/2" x 19" BHA from 11;980' to 12;755' with 11.5 ppg. Increase mud weight to 11.8 ppg.

03/14/2014: Drill ahead from 12;755' to 14;100' with 16.5" x 19" BHA with 12.0 ppg SBM; performing flow check and taking survey at each connection. Increase MW to 12.2 ppg at 14;100'. Drill ahead from 14;100' to 14;308'; performing flow check and taking survey at each connection.

NOTE: BSEE Visit: Mr. J. Ladner and Mr. S. Ozaral (BSEE - Houma District) arrived on rig at 09:15 hrs and departed at 15:00 hrs. No INCs or warnings issued.

03/15/2014: Drill ahead from 14;308' to 15;100' with 16.5" x 19" BHA with 12.2 ppg SBM; performing flow check and taking survey at each connection. Increase MW to 12.4 ppg at 15;100'. Drill ahead from 15;100' to 16;100'. Increase MW to 12.6 ppg at 16;100'. Drill ahead from 16;100' to 16;335'; performing flow check and taking survey at each connection.

"},{"   ":71,"WELL_NAME":"  003","API12":608124008900,"WAR_START_DT":"2014-03-16","TEXT_REMARK":"03/16/2014: Drill 16.5" x 19" hole section to TD at 17;150' with 12.6 ppg mud. Flow check: well static. Circulate two bottoms up with high-viscosity 12.6 ppg pill to clean hole. Trip out of hole to 16;080'.

03/17/2014: Trip out of hole with 16.5" x 19" drilling assembly from 16;080' to 11;637'. Flow check: well static. Pressure test BOP from Driller's panel/ Blue Pod on 6-5/8" drill pipe using 12.6 ppg mud. Tested pipe rams and surface equipment to 250 psi low/ 7000 psi high. Tested annular to 250 psi low/ 5900 psi high. Function BOP from Toolpusher's panel/ Yellow pod. Testing interpreted using IPT SureTec software. Trip out of hole to 8;195'.

03/18/2014: Trip out of hole with 16.5" x 19" drilling assembly from 8;195' to surface. Function test Diverter from Driller's Panel. Function test Blind Shear Rams and Casing Shear Rams from Toolpusher's panel on Yellow Pod. Run 16" casing from surface to 269'. 

03/19/2014: Run 16" casing from 269' to 10;901'.

03/20/2014: Trip in hole with 16" casing on 6-5/8" 50# landing string from 10;901' to 16;990'. Land out 16" casing hanger in 16" supplemental adapter. Circulate and condition 12.6 ppg mud prior to cement job with partial losses (84 bbls lost). Flow check well - static. Pump 1;466 cu ft of 16.4 ppg cement with partial losses (36 bbls lost). Displace cement with 12.6 ppg mud.

Note: On March 20; 2014 at 14:37 hrs.; Lindsay Hubbard (Chevron) informed Bobby Nelson (BSEE) of a change in procedure as documented in the APD regarding verification of proper installation of the 16" liner hanger (30 CFR 250.423(b)).

03/21/2014: Continue to displace 1;466 cu ft of 16.4 ppg cement with 12.6 ppg SBM. Bumped plug placing 1130 cu ft in annulus and leaving 336 cu ft in casing. Losses sustained during displacement: 140 bbls. Check floats: not holding. Close rams and re-apply 500 psi to the plugs. Hold pressure and monitor pressure increase while waiting on cement.

03/22/2014: Open rams and perform flow check - 3 bbl/hr losses observed to hole. Set and pressure test 16" seal assembly to 6;150 psi with 12.6 ppg mud. Flow check well - static. Release from 16" casing hanger and trip out of hole. Pick up 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" bottom hole drilling assembly and trip in hole to 5;318'.
"},{"   ":72,"WELL_NAME":"  003","API12":608124008900,"WAR_START_DT":"2014-03-23","TEXT_REMARK":"03/23/2014: Perform 16" casing and Blind Shear Ram pressure test to 6150 psi with 12.6 ppg mud from Toolpusher's panel; Yellow Pod. Function test Blind Shear Rams and Casing Shear Rams from Driller's panel on Blue Pod. Continue to trip in hole with 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" Powerdrive Assembly from 5;318' to top of cement in 16" casing at 16;786'. Drill cement and shoe track from 16;786' to 16;887'. Increase mud weight from 12.6 ppg to 13.5 ppg SBM. 

03/24/2014: Drill cement and shoe track from 16;887' to 16" casing shoe at 16;990'. Clean out rathole from 16;990' to 17;150'. Drill 14-1/2" hole from 17;150' to 17;160' (10' of new formation). Perform FIT to 15.7 ppg equivalent mud weight (1;950 psi surface pressure) with 13.5 ppg SBM. Function test BOP from Driller's panel; Blue Pod. Function test Diverter from Toolpusher's Panel. Drill ahead with 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" Powerdrive Assembly from 17;160' to 17;245' with 13.5 ppg SBM.

03/25/2014: Drill 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" hole section from 17;245' to 17;377'. Circulate bottoms up. Flow check - well static. Pull out of hole from 17;377' to surface due to low ROP. Replace bit and bottom hole assembly tools and trip in hole to 219'.

03/26/2014: Trip in hole with 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" Powerdrive Assembly from 219' to above BOP. Perform Blind Shear Ram and Casing Shear Ram function tests from Toolpusher's panel; Yellow Pod. Continue to trip in hole from above BOP to 17;377'. Drill 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" hole to 18;035' with 13.5 ppg SBM.

03/27/2014: Drill 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" hole section from 18;035' to 18;501' while raising mud weight to 13.8 ppg. Encountered pack off and losses while back reaming. Shut pumps down and began taking gains; shut annular. Net loss of 44 bbls to formation. With annular closed; circulate bottoms up through choke at 30 strokes per minute. Shut down and monitor pressures. Bleed off pressure in increments through choke to mini trip tank and confirmed ballooning.

03/28/2014: Flow check well - well static. Work string until free and pull out of hole from 18;471' to 18;391'. Circulate bottoms up to 1;000 feet below BOP; shut in on annular. Continue to circulate bottoms up through choke and kill lines. Flow check well - well static. Weight up mud from 13.8 ppg to 14.0 ppg. Pull out of hole with 14-1/2 x 16-1/2" Powerdrive Assembly from 18;391' to 375'.

03/29/2014: Pull out of hole with 14-1/2 x 16-1/2" Powerdrive assembly from 375' to surface. Inspect reamer and bit. Function test Blind Shear Rams and Casing Shear Rams from Driller's panel on Blue Pod. Install new float above reamer. Trip in hole with 14-1/2 x 16-1/2" Powerdrive Assembly from surface to 16;648'. Pressure test BOP from Toolpusher's panel; Yellow Pod on 6-5/8" drill pipe using 14.0 ppg mud. Tested pipe rams and surface equipment to 250 psi low/ 7;000 psi high. Tested annular to 250 psi low/ 5;450 psi high. Testing interpreted using IPT SureTec software.
"},{"   ":73,"WELL_NAME":"  003","API12":608124008900,"WAR_START_DT":"2014-03-30","TEXT_REMARK":"03/30/2014: Pressure test BOP from Toolpusher's panel; Yellow Pod; on 6-5/8" drill pipe using 14.0 ppg mud. Tested pipe rams and surface equipment to 250 psi low/ 7;000 psi high. Tested annular to 250 psi low/ 5;450 psi high (equivalent to 5;900 psi with 12.5 ppg SBM). Function BOP from Driller's panel; Blue Pod. Testing interpreted using IPT SureTec software. Function test diverter from Driller's panel. Trip in hole to 18;247'.  Wash from 18;247' to 18;405'. Wash and ream from 18;405' to 18;501'. Increase mud weight from 14.0 ppg to 14.2 ppg. Drill 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" hole from 18;501' to 18;740'. 

03/31/2014: Drill 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" hole from 18;740' to 19;327'. Encountered drilling break at 19;327'; encountered 13 bbl losses; performed precautionary flow check at 19;333' - well static on trip tank. Drilled from 19;333' to 20;255'; noted 10 to 16 bbl/hr losses.

04/01/2014: Drill 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" hole from 20;255' to 21;313' with 14.2 ppg SBM. Lost 22 bbls of mud; pulled up and pumped loss control pill. Flow checked before resuming drilling - well static.

04/02/2014: Drill 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" hole from 21;313' to 21;930'. Weight up active system from 14.2 ppg to 14.3 ppg SBM. Flow checked - well static. Drill 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" hole from 21;930' to 22;150'.

04/03/2014: Drill 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" hole from 22;150' to 23;706' with 14.3 ppg SBM.

04/04/2014: Drill 14-1/2" x 16-1/2" hole from 23;706' to 24;650' with 14.3 ppg SBM. Spot high viscosity sweep and circulate bottoms up. Spot 50 bbls 16 ppg SBM in rathole. Trip out of hole from 24;650' to 24;465'. Pump out of hole from 24;465' to 23;579'; staging up pumps intermittently and working pipe through tight spots.

04/05/2014: Continue to pump out of hole from 23;579' to 22;690'. Attempt to pump out of hole from 22;690' to 22;638' without success; observed hole pack off. Worked string and established circulation; increased mud weight from 14.3 ppg to 14.4 ppg; no losses observed. Washed back to the bottom 22;638' to 23;195'; trip in hole from 23;195' to 24;540'; fill drill string; shut down pumps; well static. Trip out of hole from 24;540' to 18;630' with pumps; well static.
 
Note: On 04/05/2014 at 11:24 AM; Mr. Bobby Nelson (BSEE) gave Lindsay Hubbard (Chevron) approval for a 24 hour extension on the Blind Shear Ram test; originally due by 0:00 hrs on 04/06/2014. "},{"   ":74,"WELL_NAME":"  003","API12":608124008900,"WAR_START_DT":"2014-04-06","TEXT_REMARK":"04/06/2014: Tripped out of hole with 14.5" x 16.5" drilling BHA in 14.4 ppg mud pumping from 18;630' to 17;150'. Functioned BOP from Toolpusher's panel; Yellow Pod. Tripped out of hole to 81'.

04/07/2014: Completed trip out of hole with 14.5" x 16.5" drilling BHA in 14.4 ppg mud from 81' to surface. Picked up Telescope; ARC tool and mashburn filter sub and tripped in the hole with 14.5" x 16.5" cleanout assembly on 6-5/8" drill pipe to 18;475'. Washed through suture zones from 18;475' to 18;992'. Tripped in hole to 22;133'. Washed through suture zones from 22;133' to 22;289'.

04/08/2014: Washed through suture zones from 22;289' to 22;669'. Tripped in hole to 23;812'. Washed through suture zones from 23;812' to 24;065'. Tripped in hole to 24;445'. Washed from 24;445' to 24;550'. Pumped 100 bbl 16.0 ppg Hi-Vis weighted sweep followed by 100 bbl rope sweep to caliper the hole; circulated and conditioned mud until wellbore clean. Flow checked wellbore; static. Attempted to trip out of hole from 24;550' to 24;318' and noticed swabbing occurring. Flow checked wellbore; static. Pumped out of hole from 24;318' to 16;952'. Inserted bypass jet sub activation ball and pick up to 16;939'. Activated bypass jet sub and washed 14" hanger setting area from 16;744' to 16;670'. Flow checked; pumped slug and tripped out of the hole from 16;952' to 16;442'.

04/09/2014: Continued trip out of hole; then positioned bypass jet sub across 14" tieback landing profile in the wellhead. With sub activated; washed landing profile. Pulled bit above BOP. Deactivated bypass sub and pumped a slug. Completed trip out of hole with 14.5" x 16.5" cleanout assembly. Prepared to run 14" liner. Ran 14" liner from surface to 309'.

04/10/2014: Completed running 14" magnetic casing to 1;238'. Ran 14" liner to 7;774'. Picked up and made up Versaflex hanger. Continued to run 14" liner on landing string to 10;349'.

04/11/2014: Ran 14" liner on landing string to 24;445'. Picked up cement head before spacing out liner on depth at 24;498'. Started cementing 14" liner.

04/12/2014: Cemented 14" liner; placing 1;791 cu ft in the annulus and 169 cu ft in the shoe track. Set liner hanger. Circulated bottoms up. Pulled up to BOP test depth. Tested BOPs upper; middle; lower and associated outlet valves; and associated valves on choke manifold and top drive internal blowout preventers to 250 psi low/ 8;700 psi high. Tested annular; kelly hose and associated outlet valves to 250 psi low/ 5;400 psi high. 
"},{"   ":75,"WELL_NAME":"  003","API12":608124008900,"WAR_START_DT":"2014-04-13","TEXT_REMARK":"04/13/2014: Complete pressure testing of BOPs from Driller's panel; Blue Pod; with 14.4 ppg mud (pressure test rams to 250 psi low / 8;700 psi high and annular to 250 psi low / 5;400 psi high). Function test BOPs from Toolpusher's panel; Yellow Pod. Function test diverter from Driller's panel. Flow check - static. Trip out of the hole with 6-5/8" landing string from 14;749' to surface. Conduct pressure test of BSRs x 14" liner with 14.4 ppg mud to 4;550 psi for 15 min. Pressure test choke manifold to 250 psi low / 10;500 psi high. Run in hole with 13-3/4" x 14" tieback from surface to 2;243'. 

04/14/2014: Run in hole with 13-3/4" x 14" tieback from 2;243' to 10;745' in 14.4 ppg mud; monitoring on trip tank for correct displacement.

04/15/2014: Pick up 18-3/4" x 14" casing hanger. Run tieback on landing string from 10;745' to 16;607' in 14.4 ppg mud; monitoring on trip tank for correct displacement. Circulate wellbore with 14.4 ppg SBM prior to cementing.

04/16/2014: Complete circulation with 14.4 ppg SBM prior to cementing. Commence 13-3/4" x 14" tieback cement job; pumping 1;356 cu ft of cement. Displace with 14.4 ppg SBM. Stop pumping displacement prior to cement turning corner of 13-3/4" tieback shoe due to increase in pump pressure. Close annular and monitor pressure while waiting on cement. Set and test seal assembly to 3;000 psi with 14.4 ppg SBM. Trip out of hole on landing string from 5;850' to 2;309'.

04/17/2014: Pull out of hole with 14" hanger running tool from 2;309' to surface. Trip in hole with 18-3/4" x 13-3/8" wear bushing and set in wellhead. Pull out of hole with wear bushing running tool to surface. Trip in hole with 13-3/4" tieback cleanout assembly with 12-1/4" bit from surface to 536' in 14.4 ppg mud.

04/18/2014: Trip in the hole with 12-1/4" cement cleanout assembly from 536' to 1;026'. Function test Blind Shear Rams and Casing Shear Rams from Driller's panel; Blue Pod. Continue to TIH from 1;026' to 14;100' in 13-3/4" tieback; monitoring well on trip tank for proper displacement. Wash down to tag top of cement at 14;525' and drill cement to 15;095' with 14.4 ppg SBM.

04/19/2014: Drill cement in 13-3/4" tieback from 15;095' to 16;004' with 12-1/4" cement cleanout assembly in 14.4 ppg SBM. Exit base of cement at 16;004'. Flow check well - static.
"},{"   ":76,"WELL_NAME":"  003","API12":608124008900,"WAR_START_DT":"2014-04-20","TEXT_REMARK":"04/20/2014: Wash down and drill float equipment inside 13-3/4" x 14" tieback from 16;004' to shoe at 16;607' (14.4 ppg mud weight) with 12-1/4" cleanout assembly. Wash down through 14" liner hanger to 16;857'. Circulate wellbore clean. Trip out of hole to surface. Make up tieback scraper assembly. Function Diverter from Toolpusher's panel. Function test BOP from Driller's panel; Blue Pod.

04/21/2014: Trip in hole with tieback scraper assembly from surface to 14;327'. Scrape 13-3/4" x 14" tieback from 14;327' to 16;450'. Circulate wellbore clean. Trip out of hole with scraper assembly from 16;450' to 5;719'.

Note: Al Lindsey (Chevron) received written permission from Bobby Nelson (BSEE; Houma District) for a 72 hr extension for BSR/Casing pressure test to facilitate cementing operations of the 14" tieback.

04/22/2014: Trip out of hole with scraper assembly from 5;719' to surface. Function blind/casing shear rams from Toolpusher's panel; YellowpPod. Trip in hole with 13-3/4" FasDrill to 16;386'. Set and test FasDrill to 4;550 psi. Spot 50 bbl 16.4 ppg high viscosity pill on top of FasDrill packer.

04/23/2014: Trip out of hole from 16;382' to 8;774'. Make up Dril-Quip Multi Purpose Tool and trip in hole with it to 5;846'. Retrieve wear bushing and trip out of hole with wear bushing to surface. Re-dress Dril-Quip Multi Purpose Tool and trip in hole with it to 5;850'. Retrieve 14" x 18-3/4" seal assembly and trip out of hole with seal assembly to surface. Lay out Multi Purpose Tool with seal assembly and trip in hole with FasDrill stinger from 8;774' to 12;097'.

04/24/2014: Trip in hole with FasDrill stinger from 12;097' to top of 13-3/4" FasDrill and sting into packer to 16;382'. Cement 13-3/4" x 14" tieback casing; placing 1;086 cu ft 15.8 ppg cement in 13-3/4" x 16" annulus and 296 cu ft 15.8 ppg cement in the shoe track. Pull out of hole to 15;514'; circulate bottoms up with 14.4 ppg mud. Trip out of hole with FasDrill stinger from 15;514' to 4;200'.

04/25/2014: Pull out of hole with the Fasdrill running tool from 4;200' to surface. Trip in hole with Dril-Quip mill and flush assembly to the wellhead at 5;850'. Perform mill and flush operations. Pull out of hole with mill and flush from 5;850' to surface. Trip in hole with 14" x 18-3/4" seal assembly to the wellhead at 5;850'. Set and test the seal assembly to 10;000 psi. Pull out of hole with seal assembly running tool from 5;850' to surface.

Note: Al Lindsey (Chevron) received written approval from Bobby Nelson of additional 24 hr extension on performing BSR/CSG pressure test until 04/26/14.

04/26/2014: Perform Blind Shear Ram and 13-3/4" x 14" tieback casing pressure test to 5;300 psi (function rams from Driller's panel; Blue Pod). Function blind/casing shear rams from Driller's panel; Blue Pod. Trip in hole with Lead Impression Tool assembly from surface to 5;850'. Perform lead impression operations. Pull out of hole from 5;850' to surface with Lead Impression Tool. Trip in hole with Lock Down Sleeve assembly to 5;850'. Set and verify lock down. Pull out of hole with Lock Down Sleeve running tool from 5;850' to surface."},{"   ":77,"WELL_NAME":"  003","API12":608124008900,"WAR_START_DT":"2014-04-27","TEXT_REMARK":"04/27/2014: Trip in hole with Dril-Quip seat protector from surface to 5;844'. Set seat protector and trip out of hole to surface. Trip in hole with 12-1/4" drilling assembly from surface to 5;153'. Function test diverter from Driller's panel. Function test blind/casing shear rams from Toolpusher's panel; Yellow Pod. Trip in hole with 12-1/4" drilling assembly to 8;891'. Begin pressure testing BOPs from Toolpusher's panel; Yellow Pod; with 14.4 ppg mud (pressure test rams to 250 psi low/ 8;700 psi high; annular to 250 psi low/ 5;400 psi high; surface equipment to 250 psi low/ 10;500 psi high). 

04/28/2014: Trip in hole with 12-1/4" drilling assembly from 8;891' to 14;599'. Continue pressure testing BOPs from Toolpusher's panel; Yellow Pod; on 5-7/8" and 6-5/8" drill pipe with 14.4 ppg mud (pressure test rams to 250 psi low/ 8;700 psi high; annular to 250 psi low/ 5;400 psi high). Function test BOPs from Driller's panel; Blue pod. Trip in hole and tag top of cement in 13-3/4" x 14" tieback shoe track at 16;265'. Drill out cement and cement retainer from 16;265' to 16;378'. 

04/29/2014: Continue drilling out 13-3/4" x 14" tieback shoe track from 16;378' to 16;607'. Trip in hole and tag upper float collar in 14" liner shoe track at 24;310'. Circulate and condition hole and pressure test casing to 5;300 psi with 14.4 ppg SBM. Continue to drill out 14" liner shoe track while raising mud weight to 15.0 ppg. 

04/30/2014: Drill out 14" liner shoe track and cement beneath shoe to 24;502'. Wash and ream rat hole and drill 10 feet of new formation from 24;650' to 24;660'. Circulate bottoms up to 1;000' above BOP; trip out of hole into 14" casing shoe and perform FIT to 1;911 psi/ 16.5 ppg EMW with 15.0 ppg MW.

Note: At 10:11 hrs on 4/30/2014; Muhammad Saleh (Chevron) notified Bobby Nelson (BSEE - Houma District) that the lower touch screen on the Driller's BOP control panel froze and will not update when a function is made. Diagnostics show that it is not a node lockup. The upper screen is 100% functional and works as designed. We maintain full control of the stack from the remaining MMI on the Driller's panel as well as the two screens on the Toolpusher's panel.

05/01/2014: Drill ahead with 12-1/4" assembly from 24;660' to 25;187'. Continue to drill ahead from 25;187' to 25;269'. Flow check drilling breaks; well static on every flow check. 

05/02/2014: Drill ahead with 12-1/4" assembly from 25;269' to 26;228'. Flow check drilling breaks; well static on every flow check.

Note: At 16:46 hrs on 05/02/2014; Muhammad Saleh (Chevron) received email confirmation from Paul Nelson (BSEE - Houma District) that the request for a 72 hr extension for function test of BSR/CSR (due by 24;00 hrs on 05/04/2014) was approved.

05/03/2014: Drill ahead with 12-1/4" assembly from 26;228' to 27;400'. Flow check drilling breaks; well static on every flow check.
"},{"   ":78,"WELL_NAME":"  003","API12":608124008900,"WAR_START_DT":"2014-05-04","TEXT_REMARK":"05/04/2014: Drill ahead with 12-1/4" drilling assembly from 27;400' to final well depth at 28;430' with 15.0 ppg SBM; taking surveys and flow checking every connection.

05/05/2014: Circulate hole clean at 28;312' with 15.0 ppg SBM. Flow check well - static. Trip out of hole from 28;312' to 25;638'; working through tight spots. Backream from 25;638' to 25;128'. Trip out of hole from 25;128' to 24;355'. Function BOPs from Toolpusher's panel; Yellow Pod. Flow check well - static. Trip out of hole to 11;937'; monitoring well on trip tank. 

05/06/2014: Trip out of hole with 12-1/4" drilling assembly from 11;937' to surface with 15.0 ppg SBM. Function test BSR and CSR from Driller's panel; Blue Pod. Run USIT wireline tool to 24;488'. USIT tool not functioning. Pull out of hole to 9;000'. 

Note: At 06:41 hrs on 05/06/2014; Muhammad Saleh (Chevron) informed Bobby Nelson (BSEE - Houma) that the lower touch screen on the Driller's panel is functional as of 05/06/2014. It has been rebooted in conjunction with the BSR/CSR function this morning and everything is back to normal. 

05/07/2014: Pull out of hole with wireline from 9;000' to surface. Run in hole with USIT wireline tools to 24;470' and up-log to 21;689'. USIT tool not working. Pull out of hole with wireline from 21;689' to surface. Trip in hole with 14" scraper assembly to 9;614' in 15.0 ppg SBM; monitoring displacement on trip tank.

05/08/2014: Trip in hole with 14" scraper assembly from 9;614' to 24;352' with 15.0 ppg SBM; monitoring displacement on trip tank. Wash down to 24;474' and reciprocate scraper across EZSV setting depth. Trip out of hole with 14" scraper to 16;376' and reciprocate scraper across upper EZSV setting depth. Flow check well - static. Trip out of hole from 16;376' to 6;447'; monitoring displacement on trip tank.

05/09/2014: Trip out of hole with 14" scraper assembly from 6;447' to surface. Function check BSR and CSR from Toolpusher's panel; Yellow Pod. Trip in hole with EZSV from surface to 24;417'. Set lower EZSV. Test EZSV and release running tool.

05/10/2014: Pressure test EZSV to 1;000 psi. Squeeze 500' cement plug below EZSV. Spot 300' cement plug above EZSV. Trip out of hole to 16;900' and spot 500' balanced plug across 14" liner top; exposed 16.15" casing; and 13-3/4" tieback liner shoe. Trip out of hole to 15;000'. Flow check well- static. Trip out of hole to 9;013' with 15.0 ppg SBM; monitoring displacement on trip tank.
"},{"   ":79,"WELL_NAME":"  003","API12":608124008900,"WAR_START_DT":"2014-05-11","TEXT_REMARK":"05/11/2014: Trip out of hole with 13-3/8" EZSV running tool from 9;013' to surface. Function BSR/CSR from Driller's panel; Blue Pod; and diverter from Driller's panel. Trip in hole with 13-3/8" EZSV to 15;283'. Encounter resistance and attempt to clear without success; setting EZSV pre-maturely. Shear running tool off of EZSV and commence circulating bottoms up with 15.0 ppg synthetic based mud.

05/12/2014: Circulate bottoms up with 15.0 ppg synthetic based mud; flow check static; and trip out of hole from 15;283' to surface with EZSV running tool. Function test BOPs on Driller's panel; Blue Pod; and function test BSR/CSR from Toolpusher's panel; Yellow Pod. Trip in hole with back-up 13-3/8" EZSV to 15;150' and set same. Positive test to 1;000 psi. Pump 75 bbls cement to spot plug above EZSV from 15;150' to 14;650'.

Note: At 09:45 hrs; Bobby Nelson (BSEE) informed Lindsay Hubbard (Chevron) via email that permission to extend BOP testing 72 hours was granted due to current level of wellbore isolation. 

05/13/2014: Displace to spot 75 bbl cement plug between 15;150' and 14;650'. Trip out of hole from 15;148' to 13;473' with EZSV running tool. Circulate full surface to surface volume of 15.0 ppg synthetic based mud. Conduct negative test to 2;178 psi. Monitor well for 60 minutes - well static. Trip out of hole from 13;473' to 6;474'; monitoring well on trip tank. Monitor well - static. Pick up seat protector retrieval tool and trip in hole to wellhead. Retrieve seat protector and pull out of hole to surface; with tailpipe at 6;474'.

05/14/2014: Trip in hole with lockdown sleeve retrieval tool. Monitor well on trip tank - static. Retrieve lockdown sleeve from wellhead and recover lockdown sleeve to surface (tailpipe at 6;480'). Spot high viscosity pill from 6;400' to 6;100'. Displace riser and well from 15.0 ppg synthetic based mud to 8.6 ppg seawater down to 6;100'. Trip out of hole with EZSV running tool to 1;776'.

05/15/2014: Trip out of hole from 1;776' to surface and laydown EZSV running tool. Trip in hole with cement stinger and riser brush cleaning assembly to 6;100'. Pump 23 bbls of 16.4 ppg cement to set surface plug from 6;100' to 5;950'. Pull out of hole to 5;840' and circulate seawater. Monitor well on trip tank: static. Trip out of hole with riser brush assembly from 5;840' to surface. Rig up riser handling tools.

Note: At 12:53 hrs; Bobby Nelson informed Lindsay Hubbard via email that permission to extend BOP testing a further 12 hours was granted.

05/16/2014: Pull diverter. Unlatch BOP and pull riser from 5;608' to 4;108'.

05/17/2014: Pull riser from 4;108' to surface. Park BOP and commence between well maintenance workscope.
"}]
